1b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa stong phrag brgya pabam po dang po'o/
1b2('bum): xxx
1b3('bum): xxx
1b4('bum): xxx
1b5('bum): xxx
1b6('bum): xxx
1b7('bum): xxx
1b8('bum): xxx
2a1('bum): yongs su spyod pa myed do// phyi nang gi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams la yongs su
2a2('bum): spyod pa myed do// 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// gzugs la yongs su spyod pa myed do// tshor ba la yongs su spyod
2a3('bum): pa myed do// 'du shes la yongs su spyod pa myed do// 'du byed la yongs su spyod pa myed do// rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// myig la yongs su
2a4('bum): spyod pa myed do// rna ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do// sna la yongs su spyod pa myed do// lce la yongs su spyod pa myed do// lus la yongs su spyod pa myed do//
2a5('bum): yid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// gzu gas la yongs su spyod pa myed do// ska la yongs su spyod pa myed do// dri la yongs su spyod pa myed do/
2a6('bum): rol yongs su spyod pa myed do// reg la yongs su spyod pa myed do// chos la yongs su spyod pa myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// rna ba'i
2a7('bum): rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa sdud do// sna'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la
2a8('bum): yongs su spyod pa myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa la yongasu spyod pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su
2b1('bum): spyod pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// sde'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa byed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su spyod pa myed do//
2b2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor pa
2b3('bum): la yongs su spyod pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do// lus
2b4('bum): kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la yongs su sgo da ba myed do// sod kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa myed de//
2b5('bum): khams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// chu'i kham sa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// mye'i khams las ngas su spyod pa myed do// rlung gi khams la yongs su
2b6('bum): spyod pa myed do// nam mkha'i 'ams la yongs su spyod bgyid do// rnam par shes pa'i khams la yongs su spyod pa byed do// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la yongs
2b7('bum): su spyod pa myed do// ma rig pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// 'du byed la yongs su spyod pa myed do// rnam par shes pa' la yongs su spyod pa myed do// mying dang gzugs la yongs
2b8('bum): su spyod pa myed do// skye mched drug la yongs su spyod pa myed do// reg pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do// sred pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do//
3a1('bum): le nad pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// srid pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// skye ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do// rga shi la yongs su spyod pa myed do//
3a2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yongs su spyod pa
3a3('bum): myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la
3a4('bum): yongs su spyod pa myed do// nang stong pa nyed la yongs su spyod pa myed do// phyi stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// phye nang stong pa nyid la
3a5('bum): yongs su spyod pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// don dam pa
3a6('bum): stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// mtha' las 'das
3a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// dor ba myed pa stong po nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// rang
3a8('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su smod pa myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa byed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// mi dmyigs
3b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo
3b2('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// yang dag par sbyong ba rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do//
3b3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// dbang po rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// stobs rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
3b4('bum): la yongs su spyod pa myed do// 'phags pa'i lam/ yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa
3b5('bum): myed do// bsam gtan rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// tshad myed pa rnams la yongs su spyod pamyed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
3b6('bum): rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la yongs su spyod pa myed do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yongs su spyod pa myed do//
3b7('bum): rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// ti
3b8('bum): nge 'dzind rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yongs su spyod pa myed do// myi 'jigs
4a1('bum): pa bzhi la yongs su spyod pa myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs su spyod pa myed do// byams pa chen po la yongs su spyod pa myed do//
4a2('bum): snying rje chen po la yongs su spyod pa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su spyod pa myed do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa
4a3('bum): myed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa myed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa myed do// dgra bcom pa nyid la yongs su spyod
4a4('bum): pa myed do// rang byang chub la yongs su spyod pa myed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la yongs su spyong
4a5('bum): pa myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa myed de/ rab 'byor da de
4a6('bum): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pas lam bsgom pa la
4a7('bum): brtend kyang / kund nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur la/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na yang mye gad lan/ lam ba sgom du ci mchis/ bcom
4a8('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor da de'i snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dngos po la la zhig la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am
4b1('bum): rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/
4b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la zhig la brtend te/ kund nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'gro ba
4b3('bum): lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
4b4('bum): dpa' chen pos chos rnas kyi sa kyi tshul rab tu rtogs pa yin/ no// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das lags/ gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu la
4b5('bum): lags sam/ tshor ba thams cad sprul pa lta bu la gas sam/ 'du shes thams cad sprul pa lta bu la gas sam/ 'du byed thams cad sprul pa lta bu
4b6('bum): lags sam/ rnam par shes pa thams cad sbrul gagralags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// tsho
4b7('bum): ba thams cad ni sprul du pa lta bu'o// 'du shes thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// 'du byed thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// rnam par shes pa thams cad ni sprul po lta bu'o//
4b8('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba thams cad sprul de pa lta bu/ 'du shes thams cad sprus dpas su/ 'du byed thams cad sprul
5a1('bum): pa lta bu rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa la ni gzugs ma mchis/ tshor ba ma mchis/ 'du shes ma mchis
5a2('bum): 'du byed ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa ma mchis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis rnam par byang ba ma mchis/ gang las 'grol bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba ma mchis
5a3('bum): na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems byang chub sems dpa'
5a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnam
5a5('bum): lha'am/ myi dag las yongs su grol bar bya/ ba'i sems can gang yang dmyigs sam/ gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//
5a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum nas/ yongs su grol bar
5a7('bum): ba'i sems can gang yang myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes so// mthong ngo // rtogs so// sprul pa lta bur shes so//
5a8('bum): mthong ngo // rtogs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste/
5b1('bum): rtogs la/ sprul pa lta bur 'tshal cing / mthong ste rtogs pa lags na/ gang gi dond tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod pa lags
5b2('bum): bsam gtan bzhi la spyod pa lags tshad myed pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ mngon par shes pa lnga la spyod pa lag
5b3('bum): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la spyod pa lags/ mthard kyis
5b4('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa la gas/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la spyod pa lags
5b5('bum): ting nge 'dzind thams cad la spyod pa lags/ ga zungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyod pa lags/ de bzhi na gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa lags mye
5b6('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ byams pa chen po la spyod pa lags/ snying rje chen po la spyod pa lags/ sangs
5b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa lags/ de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam gyi bar la spyod pa lags sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
5b8('bum): dag par bgyid pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su sbyind par bgyid pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor da gal te sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams
6a1('bum): cad sprul pa lta bur shes su zan na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can rnams kyi don tu bskal pa grangs myed par/ byang chub sems dpa'
6a2('bum): spyad pa myi spyod de/ rab 'byor de sems can rnams rang rang gi chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur myi shes pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs myed par
6a3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod do// sems can rnams yongs su smyind par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// rab 'byor da kyis gsol
6a4('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmyi lam// lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ myig/ yor lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu/ sprul pa lta bu lags na/
6a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ci la gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams
6a6('bum): gyen tu spyod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor da sems can rnams ni mying dang mtshan ma yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa la gnas pas na
6a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / de dag mying dang mtshan ma las bye nad tu spyod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mying ni gang
6a8('bum): lags/ mtshan ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste mying zhes bya ba'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'di ni glo zung gi mying gis sgro btags
6b1('bum): pa'o// 'di lta ste/ myang zhes bya ba'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba'am/ gzugs shes bya ba'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba'am/ 'du shes shes bya ba'am/ 'du byed ces bya ba'am/ rnam
6b2('bum): par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ bud myed ces bya ba'am/ skyes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ khye'u zhes bya ba 'am/ bu mo zhes bya ba 'am/ sems can dmyal ba pa zhes bya ba 'am/ byol song ga
6b3('bum): skye gnas shes bya ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtend pa zhes bya ba'am/ lha zhes bya ba'am/ myi zhes bya ba'am/ 'dus byas kyi chos shes bya ba'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya ba'am
6b4('bum): rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ lan/ cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ phyir myi 'ong po'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid
6b5('bum): ces bya ba'am/ rang byang chub ces bya ba'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni/ sgyu ma 'i mying gis sgro btags ste/ rab 'byor da myang ni thams
6b6('bum): cad mying gi don gyis btags pa ke/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyu ra pa'i/ 'dus byas thams cad ni mying tsam b+he/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
6b7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ mying thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin gyis/ yongs su brtags pa dngos po myed pa ngo bo nyid
6b8('bum): kyis song ba la khyed chags par ma byed cig/ chos thams cad stong pa la mkhas pa rnams ni mngon par zhend par gyi byed do zhes skul pa byed de/ rab 'byor da de sa pan byang chub ses
7a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa yin no// rab
7a2('bum): 'byor dang mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gnyis po 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur pa'i mtshan ma ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma
7a3('bum): dang gzugs myed pa'i mtshan ma'o// rab 'byor da gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs rags pa 'am/ phrab
7a4('bum): 'am bzang ba'am/ ngan pa'am/ rgyang rang ba'am/ thag nye ba gang chos thams cad skad cig ma la kund turtog pas gzung ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma
7a5('bum): zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzugs myed pa 'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gzugs myed pa'i chos gang la yang rung ste/ mtshan mar gzung bas yongs su la
7a6('bum): brtags shing nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs myed pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
7a7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshethabs mkhas pas/ mtshan ma de dag las bkrol zhing / mtshan ma myed pa'i dbyings su 'god cing / rab tu gzhog ste/ ci nas kyang 'di ni mtshan ma myed
7a8('bum): pa'o zhes bya ba gnyis su myi ltung ba de ltar 'god cing gzhog ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
7b1('bum): mkhas pas/ sems can rnams mtshan ma las rnam par dkrol zhing / mtshan ma myed pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god do// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag
7b2('bum): thams cad ni de tsam du bas te myong dang mtshan mar bas la btags pa tsam du bas te/ yongs su btags pa las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' ses
7b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob la/ gzhan yang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob pa la gzhog cing / dge ba'i rtsa
7b4('bum): ba de dag gis sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/
7b5('bum): rab 'byor da gal te dngos po 'am/ dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor da byang chub sems dang/ la sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
7b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ khyad par thob par yang myi 'gyur te/ gzhan yang khyad par 'thob pa la sbyor bar myi 'gyur gyi 'di ltar dngos po'i mtshan ma yang myed/ dngos po yang myed pas na
7b7('bum): rab 'byor de de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yong
7b8('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang
8a1('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis
8a2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis tshad
8a3('bum): myed pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ yang dag
8a4('bum): par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ma tshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul
8a5('bum): gyis dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ byang
8a6('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/
8a7('bum): nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs
8a8('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
8b1('bum): par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed//
8b2('bum): mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
8b3('bum): mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
8b4('bum): mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
8b5('bum): par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed/ do/ mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ myi dmyigs pa
8b6('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ ngo
8b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul
8b8('bum): gyis rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan
9a1('bum): ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
9a2('bum): ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis
9a3('bum): tangang 'jand rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed da mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ gzungs kyi
9a4('bum): sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i
9a5('bum): tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/
9a6('bum): mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis/ sU rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed
9a7('bum): bu'i dus kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chom sa 'dres pa bco brgyad songs su rdzogs par byed do// de dag pa chos de drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul
9a8('bum): gyis gzhan yang dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor te/ rab 'byor dgal te chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam gyi khyon cig/ mtshan ma yod na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
9b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos mtshan ma myed pa/ dran pa myed pa/ yid la byed pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyur te/ sems
9b2('bum): can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams la gzhog par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor du zag pa myed pa'i chos thams cad ni mtshan ma myed pa dran pa myed pa yir la
9b3('bum): bya ba myed pa ste/ rab 'byor da de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi
9b4('bum): don byed do// gsol pa bcom ldan ngas gal te de ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma mchis shing / dran pa ma mchis te/ yid la bgyi ba ma mchis na
9b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/ 'di dag ni myi dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa las 'das pa'i/
9b6('bum): chos so 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa myed pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni
9b7('bum): thun mong gi chos so/ 'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so// 'di dag na rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos so
9b8('bum): 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma myed pa yang gzhan
10a1('bum): la nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan namagasol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la dra ba rab 'byor
10a2('bum): di ji snyam du sems mtshan ma myed pa yang gzhan la rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam mtshan ma myed pa yang gzhan la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang
10a3('bum): gzhan nam mtshan ma myed pa yang gzhan la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
10a4('bum): kyis bka' stsal da pa rab 'byor da mtshan ma myed pa nye dra rgyu nang du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyira'o/ pa ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/
10a5('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid do/ rang byang chub bo/ byang chubasems dpa'i chos so// sangs rgyas kyi chos so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so//
10a6('bum): bde bar gshegs pa re re lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma myed par rig par bya ste/
10a7('bum): rab 'byor nga chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dge ba'i chos mang pos rnam par 'phel te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
10a8('bum): phyi nad pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang
10b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam
10b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed
10b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa
10b4('bum): nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
10b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / sto bas lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 2pags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags
10b6('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i
10b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang /
10b8('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang
11a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu myed pa dag gis rnam par 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
11a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab par bya ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
11a3('bum): rnam par thard pa'i sgo 'di gsum du dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa myed de/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid rnam par thard pa'i sgo'o// mtshan ma dang bral ba ni mtshan
11a4('bum): ma myed pa rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo'o// mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa ni smond pa myed pa rnam par tha rad po'i sgo ste/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum po 'di la slob pa'i byang chub
11a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na phung po lnga la slo'o pa yin/ skye mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin khams bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ rtend cing 'brel
11a6('bum): par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin
11a7('bum): pa slob pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa yin/
11a8('bum): nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/
11b1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin
11b2('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dor ba myed pa stong po nyid la slob pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rang
11b3('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po
11b4('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ yang ga par spong ba bzhi la slob pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
11b5('bum): pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ dbang po lnga la slob pa yan stobs lnga la slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag pa dun la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
11b6('bum): brgyad pa la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi la slob pa yin/ tshad myed pa bzhil slob pa yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
11b7('bum): bzhi la slob pa yin rnam par thard pa brgyad la slob pa yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
11b8('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la slob pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga la slob pa yin/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la slob pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la slob pa
12a1('bum): yaMn de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ byams
12a2('bum): pa chen po la slob pa yin/ snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ lam gyi rnam
12a3('bum): pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor da kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji ltar byang
12a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyipha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nye bar lenadapo'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags bcom ldan 'das
12a5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor da 'di la byangachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rab tu
12a6('bum): shes te gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang / gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu yin pa rab tu shes so/ de la ji ltar na gzugs shes pa yin zhe na/
12a7('bum): 'di lta ste dper na dbu ba'i phung po'i snying po myed pa ltar shi nang du gsor ldong dang shi nang du bas chags dang / shi nang du snying po myed par rab tu shes te de ltar na gzugs shes
12a8('bum): pa yin no/ ji ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed cing / gang du yang 'gro ba myed pas gang nas kyang
12b1('bum): myi 'od gang tu yang myi 'gro ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa de de ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na gzugs
12b2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni myi skye myi 'gag/ 'ong ba myed 'gro ba myed/ ku nad nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/
12b3('bum): 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyi nad ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa
12b4('bum): yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ chu'i chu bur gsog tu 'dug pa ste zhing 'gag pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tshor ba shes
12b5('bum): pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang / 'jig/ pa shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba rgya da cing gang du yang 'gro ba myed pas/ gang nas kyang myi
12b6('bum): 'od gang du yang myi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin
12b7('bum): nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni myi skye/ myi 'gag/ 'ong ba myed/ 'gro ba myed/ kund nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin
12b8('bum): 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyi nad ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na
13a1('bum): 'du shes shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ smyig rgyu la chu shi nad tu myi dmyigs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi
13a2('bum): skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed cing gang du yang 'gro ba myed pas gang nas kyang myi 'ong / gang du yang myi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma
13a3('bum): 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin
13a4('bum): nyid ni myi skyemyi 'gag 'ong ba myeda'agro ba myed/ kund nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par bya nga ba ma yin 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/
13a5('bum): de phyi nad ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gan sa pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/
13a6('bum): ji ltar 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na chu shing shun pa so sor bye na snying po shi nang tu myi dmyigs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin no/ ji ltar na
13a7('bum): 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed pas/ gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas
13a8('bum): kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du
13b1('bum): byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni myi skye myi 'gag/ 'ong ba myed 'gro ba myed/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ byin mi log ma
13b2('bum): yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin zhe na
13b3('bum): 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma byed pas/ sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa ste/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam
13b4('bum): par shes pa ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed cing / gang du yang 'gro ba myed pas/ gang nas kyang myi 'ong / gang du yang myi 'gro/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du
13b5('bum): yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na
13b6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni myi skye myi 'gag/ 'ong ba myed 'gro ba myed/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin
13b7('bum): ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin
13b8('bum): zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong / phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong par shes pa ste/ de ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na khams
14a1('bum): rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ myig gi khams kyang myig gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
14a2('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang / myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i khams kyang rna ba'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo po/ sgra'i khams kyang
14a3('bum): sgra'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong po/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i khams kyang sna'i khams kyi rang bzhin
14a4('bum): gyis stong po dri'i khams kyang dri'i khams kyi rang bzhi na gyis stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang nga sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong /
14a5('bum): lce'i khams kyang lce'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // ro'i khams kyang ro'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lce'i rnam par shes
14a6('bum): pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus kyi khams kyang lus kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // reg gi khams kyang reg gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus kyi rnam
14a7('bum): par shes pa'i khams kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong po/ yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong po/ chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi
14a8('bum): khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong po/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes te/ de ltar na khams rnams shes pa
14b1('bum): yin no// ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/ rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba myed par shes pa dang / de bzhin du rtend cing 'brel par 'byung
14b2('bum): ba 'gag pa myed pa dang / chad pa myed pa dang / rtag pa myed pa dang / don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / don pa dad pa ma yin pa dang/ 'ong ba myed pa dang / 'gro ba myed pa dang / smos
14b3('bum): pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa de ltar na/ rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'phags
14b4('bum): pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal
14b5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsnga la shes pa yin/ bden pa shes pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ gnyis las rnam par
14b6('bum): grol ba 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ gnyis su myed pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar shes pa yin no// de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro
14b7('bum): ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa rnams shes pa yin no/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal
14b8('bum): gyi de bzhin nyid ni ma nor pa zhes bya bar shes pa yin/ de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu shes pa yin/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa
15a1('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan parab 'byor dkyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'a
15a2('bum): gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phan tshun tha dad pa'i chos de dag de ltar 'tshal na/ des chos kyi dbyings rnam par
15a3('bum): dkrugs par myi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la da pa/ rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos la la zhig yod na na~M/ rnam par dkrugs par yang
15a4('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga chos kyi dbyings su ma gtog/ sa pa'i chos gzhan gang yang myi dmyigs so// gal te dmyigs na ni chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par dkrug
15a5('bum): par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'bya rang de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ byang chub sems dang la'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ de bzhin gshegs
15a6('bum): po'i nyan thos kyi chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang sas dmyigs so// de ltar ma dmyigs pas chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan no zhes bya bar btags pa myed do//
15a7('bum): rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ chos kyi dbyings la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/
15a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas gang la bslabs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de chos kyi
15b1('bum): dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad la bslabs par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings so/
15b2('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' pha lad pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang
15b3('bum): rung ma byung yang rung ste/ dbyer myed pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor nga chos kyi dbyings de ni 'di lta ste/ dge ba dang myi dge ba'i chos
15b4('bum): dang 'jig rtend pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshe sa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa myed pa'i chos dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba
15b5('bum): myed pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad de/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
15b6('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa chos kyi dbyings la slob pas chos thams cad la bslabs par 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings
15b7('bum): lags na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas ji ltar gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshor ba la bslab par bgyiji
15b8('bum): ltar 'du shes la bslab par bgyiji ltar 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar khams dang skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel
16a1('bum): par 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi// ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi/
16a2('bum): ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par brgya
16a3('bum): ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi// ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab
16a4('bum): par bgyi/ ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par/ bgyi/ ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji
16a5('bum): ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji lta ra 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par brgya
16a6('bum): ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chos thos
16a7('bum): cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
16a8('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi// ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
16b1('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dbang po lnga la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar stobs
16b2('bum): lnga la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa mazhi
16b3('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad myed pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi
16b4('bum): ji ltar rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo
16b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myedapa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mngon par shes pa drugal bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ting nge 'dzin thams cad la
16b6('bum): bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bslab par bgyi ji ltar de bzhin gshegs bI stoH yul bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar myi 'jigs pa bzhi pa slab par bgyi/ ji ltar so so yang dag pa chin
16b7('bum): la maslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dga' ba chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar btang snyoms
16b8('bum): chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs
17a1('bum): su grub par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs
17a2('bum): su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyiji ltar khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab
17a3('bum): par bgyiji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtshe ma'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dga' ldan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba
17a4('bum): la bslab par bgyi ji ltar 'phrul dga'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi
17a5('bum): ji ltar tshangs ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi ji ltar tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi
17a6('bum): lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyiji ltar tshangs chen gyi lngar skye bar dgyi ba la bsapa pU bsti/ ji sma chung snang gi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bkye/ ji ltar chad myed snang
17a7('bum): ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyiji ltar kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chung dge'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chad
17a8('bum): myed dge ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dge rgyas kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
17b1('bum): chung che'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad myed che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
17b2('bum): 'du shes myed pa'i sems can du skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing / der yang myi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar nam ma'
17b3('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang myi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang myi skye bar bgyi
17b4('bum): ji ltar chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang myi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba
17b5('bum): la bslab cing der yang myi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar sa mas dang po bskyed pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sem sa bskyed pa gnyis pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
17b6('bum): sems bskyed pa gsum pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bzhi pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa lnga pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa drug
17b7('bum): pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bdun pa la bslab par bgyi ji ltar sems bskyed pa brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa dgu pa la bslab par bgyi
17b8('bum): ji ltar sems bskyed pa bcu pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nyan thos kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i
18a1('bum): skyon ma mchis pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems can yongs su smyind par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi
18a2('bum): ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub kyi lam la bslabs shing / chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i byang chub kyi lam la bslab par bgyi/ bcom
18a3('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pas/ gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ 'du shes
18a4('bum): la bslab par bgyi'adu byed la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi// myig la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba la bslab par bgyi/ sna la
18a5('bum): bslab par bgyi/ lce la bslab par bgyi/ lus la bslab par bgyi/ yid la bslab par bgyi// gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ sgra la bslab par bgyi/
18a6('bum): dril bslab par bgyi/ ro la bslab par bgyi/ reg la bslab par bgyi/ chos la bslab par bgyi// myig gi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes
18a7('bum): pa la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi rnam par
18a8('bum): shes pa la bslab par bgyi// myig gi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i
18b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la
18b2('bum): bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
18b3('bum): tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi// sa'i khams la bas
18b4('bum): par bgyi/ chu'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ mye'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ rlung gi khams la bslab par bgyi/ nam mkha'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ rnam
18b5('bum): par shes pa'i khams la bslab par bgyi// ma rig pa la bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed la bslab par bgyi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ mying dang gzugs
18b6('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ skye mched drug la bslab par bgyi reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba la bslab par bgyi sred pa la bslab par bgyi/ le nad pa la bslab par bgyi
18b7('bum): srid pa la bslab par bgyi/ skye ba la bslab par bgyi/ rga shi la bslab par bgyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyind pa la bsam
18b8('bum): par bgyi bzod pa'i pha ro lad tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi
19a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi// nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par
19a2('bum): pa/ bgyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/
19a3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
19a4('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsla/ ba par bgyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par
19a5('bum): bkye/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par ba dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ngo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dngos po myed par
19a6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bgyi yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsal
19a7('bum): par bgyi/ dbang po rnams la bslab par bgyi/ stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slab
19a8('bum): par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ bsam gtan rnams la bslab par 'gyi/ tshad myed pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug
19b1('bum): pa rnams la bslas par bgyi/ rnam par thar das brgyad la bslas par bgyi/ mapar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par ma rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
19b2('bum): dang / mtshan ma byed pa dang / smon da bskyed pa la bslab par bgyi/ mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bgyi/ gzungs kyi sgra rnams
19b3('bum): bslab par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam sa la bslab par bgyi/ myi 'jigs pa rnams la bsla par bgyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bas
19b4('bum): par bgyi/ byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/ snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyi cho/ sa ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/
19b5('bum): rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/
19b6('bum): bcom pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang byang chub la bslab par bgyi/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la bslab par bgyi na
19b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi ning ci log la spyod pa'am/ mye spro ba smos par bgyid par myi 'gyur lags grang //
20a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyer
20a2('bum): ni rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis te/ gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// tshe
20a3('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
20a4('bum): kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags 'du shes las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
20a5('bum): nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags 'du byed las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
20a6('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi
20a7('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// / myig kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ myig las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te myig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
20a8('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig go// rna ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o/
20b1('bum): sna yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna las gur ma yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o// lce yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
20b2('bum): lce yang gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o// lus kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma
20b3('bum): mchis te/ lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus so// yid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid nyid
20b4('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do/ gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs la sa gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs
20b5('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang / zugs so// sgra yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sgra nyid
20b6('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o// dril ba chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dri las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
20b7('bum): ngas nyid kya rdo'o// chos mas kyi dbyings ma lagasarolas kyang na yang chos kyi dbyings ma gcis te/ ro nyid kyang chos kyi dngas so/ chos kyi dbying sa nyid kya / reg kya
20b8('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags reg las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go// chos kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
21a1('bum): chos las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so// myig gi rnam par shes pa yang chos
21a2('bum): kyi dbyings ma lags/ myig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig gi/
21a3('bum): rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos
21a4('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbye ngas ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang
21a5('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna 'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa yang chos
21a6('bum): kyi dbyings ma lags lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes
21a7('bum): pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs
21a8('bum): so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa las chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
21b1('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags myig gi
21b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus
21b3('bum): te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud ma yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
21b4('bum): kyang na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg las gung na sang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ snga
21b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chosakyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sde'i 'du sa te reg pa sa bcos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sgo'i 'dus
21b6('bum): te reg pa las gudu na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kying chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus
21b7('bum): reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sras kyi 'dus te rig pa las gung nasang chos kyi dbyings su mnus te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbying
21b8('bum): nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// med kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te
22a1('bum): reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
22a2('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
22a3('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi
22a4('bum): dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings/ nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o//
22a5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyi ngas ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ snal
22a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi
22a7('bum): dbyings ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
22a8('bum): dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba las gung
22b1('bum): na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi
22b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
22b3('bum): kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sa'i khams las
22b4('bum): gu ma yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyangasa'i khams so// chu'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
22b5('bum): chu'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khams so// mye'i khams kyang chos kyi dbying
22b6('bum): ma lags/ kye'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mye'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mye'i khams so// rlung gi khams kyang chos kyi
22b7('bum): dbyings ma lags/ rlung gi khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'
22b8('bum): khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nam mkha'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam
23a1('bum): mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par
23a2('bum): shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ma rig pa las gud na yang
23a3('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na yang chos kyi
23a4('bum): dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyid sa so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par
23a5('bum): shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mying dang gzugs
23a6('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mying dang gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mying dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mying dang gzugs
23a7('bum): skye mched drug kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye mched drug las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug
23a8('bum): go/ reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba
23b1('bum): yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa yang chos kyi dbyed
23b2('bum): ma lags/ sred pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o// le nad pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
23b3('bum): le nad pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lend pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang le nad pa'o// srid pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ srid pa las
23b4('bum): gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye ba
23b5('bum): las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
23b6('bum): rga shi las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma
23b7('bum): lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha
23b8('bum): rol tu phyind pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshul khrims
24a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang chos kyi dbyings
24a2('bum): ma lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
24a3('bum): kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma
24a4('bum): mchis te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bsam gtan
24a5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol
24a6('bum): tu phyind pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ shes rab kyi
24a7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'o//
24a8('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
24b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyi stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyi stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
24b2('bum): nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dpyid mchis te phyi nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
24b3('bum): dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stong pa nyid stong pa
24b4('bum): nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi nga chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chen po stong pa nyid la
24b5('bum): gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chen po skong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings te/ da kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid
24b6('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don
24b7('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos
24b8('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings
25a1('bum): ma mchis te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos
25a2('bum): kyi dbyings ma lags/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
25a3('bum): kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
25a4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed/ pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang sa kyi
25a5('bum): lags/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
25a6('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nyid kyang
25a7('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos
25a8('bum): kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
25b1('bum): ma lags/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong
25b2('bum): pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos
25b3('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma
25b4('bum): mchis te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbye ngas so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyi do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos
25b5('bum): kyi dbyings ma lags/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid / nga pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi
25b6('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas
25b7('bum): las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba
25b8('bum): rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
26a1('bum): nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis
26a2('bum): te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dbang po rnams
26a3('bum): las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
26a4('bum): stobs rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyi ngas nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag
26a5('bum): rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyangs ma mchi/ sa te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbying
26a6('bum): so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// lam yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lam las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lam nyid kyang
26a7('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam mo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na yang chos
26a8('bum): kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma
26b1('bum): lags/ bsam gtan las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad myed pa
26b2('bum): rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshad byed pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshad myed pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad med pa'o//
26b3('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs myed
26b4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'ag pa rnams so// rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyang chos kyi
26b5('bum): dbyings ma lags/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par thar da pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
26b6('bum): kyang rnam par tha rad pa rnams so// mthar dkyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na
26b7('bum): yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/
26b8('bum): rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
27a1('bum): pa myed pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
27a2('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams
27a3('bum): las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzind rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings
27a4('bum): ma lags ting nge 'dzind rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge
27a5('bum): 'dzind rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo
27a6('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam sa kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs
27a7('bum): pa'i stobs rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnamaso//
27a8('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ myi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
27b1('bum): kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ so so
27b2('bum): yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ byams pa chen po las
27b3('bum): gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
27b4('bum): snying rje chen po las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi
27b5('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
27b6('bum): 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
27b7('bum): rgyunang du zhugs pa'i 'brus bu las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kya chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshun du tu zhugs pa
27b8('bum): 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
28a1('bum): 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
28a2('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//
28a3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
28a4('bum): kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang byang chub las gud na yang cho/ sa kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang chos
28a5('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub ba bo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na
28a6('bum): yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang
28a7('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
28a8('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no//
28b1('bum): gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbying
28b2('bum): so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbying
28b3('bum): nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// / myig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig go// rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna
28b4('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kya pa sna'o// lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbye ngas nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
28b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus so// yang nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
28b6('bum): nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang smra'o// dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid kyang chos
