28b7('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o// reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o// chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos
28b8('bum): rnams so// myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
29a1('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i
29a2('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus
29a3('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi
29a4('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig gi 'dus/ te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te
29a5('bum): reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi da ngas so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
29a6('bum): so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus
29a7('bum): te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// phyag gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
29a8('bum): nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
29b1('bum): tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
29b2('bum): tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
29b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te
29b4('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
29b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so// mye'i khams/ nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mye'i khams so// rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi
29b6('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes
29b7('bum): pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/
29b8('bum): 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// myang dang
30a1('bum): gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so// skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye
30a2('bum): mched drug go// reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyid kyang
30a3('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o// lend pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lend pa'o// sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
30a4('bum): dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbye/ ngas so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyi da kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
30a5('bum): rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol
30a6('bum): tu phyind pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
30a7('bum): kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bcom 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bsam gtan
30a8('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
30b1('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbying sa
30b2('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
30b3('bum): so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid nyid
30b4('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus
30b5('bum): byas spyod pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nyid kyi nga chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus mabyas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
30b6('bum): nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dpatha ma myed pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
30b7('bum): thog ma dang pa ma myed pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi
30b8('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad song pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chas kyang dbyangs cad kyangs kyang byangs sa/ chos kyi dbyis
31a1('bum): slod pa nyid nyid da kyi skyes so/ kyi ngas nyis tshugs pado// dam pa skyed pa song pa nyid nyid kya chom kyi dbyengs sa nyid/
31a2('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbying so
31a3('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong panyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa
31a4('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong banyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kya nga yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
31a5('bum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nanas so// dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs
31a6('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/
31a7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so'o/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyi

32a1('bum): pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen
32a2('bum): po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o//
32a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang
32a4('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbying
32a5('bum): nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir/ myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//
32a6('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo//
32a7('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma/ chos kyi
32a8('bum): dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rab 'byor dgal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos
32b1('bum): byings la ma gtogs pa'i chom 'ga' zhigamathong dani/ bla ma byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par gyi 'gyur te/ chom khams pad mchos kyi dbyings yin nas
32b2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du byend pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes nas/ chos thams cad myed myed pa la mying gi
32b3('bum): bdas chos son te/ 'di ni gzugs zhes bya'o// 'din tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni 'du shes shes bya'o// 'di ni 'du byed ces bya'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//
32b4('bum): 'di ni myig ces bya'o// 'di ni na pa zhes bya'o// di ni swA zhes bya'o// 'di ni skye zhes bya'o// 'dri ni sa zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid ces bya'o//
32b5('bum): ni gzugs zhes bya'o// 'di ni sgra zhes bya'o// di ni dri zhes bya'o// 'di ni ro zhes bya'o// 'di ni reg ces bya'o// 'di ni chos shes bya'o// 'di ni
32b6('bum): myig gi rnam par zhes pa zhes bya'o 'di mirna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni skye'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus kyi rnam
32b7('bum): par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni sna'i 'dus
32b8('bum): te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni myig gi 'dus
34a1('bum): pa dang smond pa myed pa zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzind rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes
34a2('bum): pha/ bya'o// 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni myi 'jigs pa rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag
34a3('bum): ni byams pa chen po zhes bya'o// 'di ni snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shes bya'o// 'di ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o//
34a4('bum): 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o// 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o// 'di ni dgra bcom/ pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni rang byang chub ces bya'o/
34a5('bum): 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya'o zhe sa ston te/ rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper
34a6('bum): na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma byed pa'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis rdzas kyi rnam pa gyi na zhig la brten te/ gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang po'i gzugs sam
34a7('bum): rta'i gzugs sam/ ba lang gi gzugs sam/ rnga mo dang / lug gi gzugs sam/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs sam/ skyed mos tshal dang gzhal myed
34a8('bum): khang dang / dka' thug gi nag tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba mdangs dga' ba'am/ rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba'am/ nags tshal mdangs dga' ba dag sprul cing / de dag tu sa nad dang / 'khor
34b1('bum): gyi stanang dang/ gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs bting ste/ me tog dang phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang / spyan gzigs zhim po bstan da tam/ glu dang sil snyan gyis skye bo dga'
34b2('bum): bar byas sam/ sbyin pa yongs su btang ba'am/ tshul khrims srung ba'am/ bzod pa bsgrub pa'am/ brtson 'grus brtsam pa'am/ ting nge 'dzind kyis rnam par ces pa 'am/ shes rab
34b3('bum): sgom pa'am/ rnam pa de lta bu dag gis skye bo dga' bar byas te/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/ bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstand tam/ khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba
34b4('bum): rigs bstan tam/ raM rab bstan tam/ rgyal chen pa/ zhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams bstan
34b5('bum): tam/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams bstan tam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang dkyi lha rnams bstand tam/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams
34b6('bum): bstand tam/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams bstand tam/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams bstand tam/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ snang ba'i lha rnams bstand tam
34b7('bum): chung snang gi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams bstand tam/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams bstand tam/ dge ba'i lha rnams bstand tam/ chung dge'i lha rnams bstan tam/
34b8('bum): tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ tshad myang dag ba' lha rnams bstan tam/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams bstand tam/ che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ chung che'i lha rnams bstan tam/ tshad
35a1('bum): myed che ba'i lha khams bstan tam/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams bstand tam/ myi che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ myaM gdung ba'i lha rnams bstand tam/ shau nang tu
35a2('bum): mthong ba'i lha rnams bstan durta dka' gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams bstand tam/ 'og myin gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstand tam/ rnam
35a3('bum): shes mtha' yas skye mched tu sgrub pa bsta nad tam/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi sa rnams bstan tam/ 'du shes kyad 'du shes myed rkyen skye mched kyi gzugs myed pa'i lha rnams bstan tam
35a4('bum): chun tu zhugs pa dang chos 'o ba nga ramyo 'ong ba dang / dgra com pa dang / rangasapa mang po bskan tas/ rgyang rgyam sems dpa' ma
35a5('bum): dpa' chen po sems dang po byed/ nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khri mas kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i
35a6('bum): pha rol du rtse na pa la sna narje mo dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du mi nang pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad
35a7('bum): ma mi zu la spyong ba dang / gang pa nyid la byeng par / ra gang ba nyid la spyod pa dang / sa nyid song ba nyid sa spyod ba dang / nam mang ba nyid ma ltung bar
35a8('bum): don dam pa song pa nyid la na kyang / 'dus byas song pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma rgyas spong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das mgong pa nyid sa spyod ba dang / thog sa dang
35b1('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod gas bti/ dor ba myed pa stong ba nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong
35b2('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi btangs pa stong pa nyid la spod pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngom po myed pa 'o ngo ba nyid sto
35b3('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang / gas sbyin pa lte bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi gang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang
35b4('bum): rnams la spyod pa dang / ni tam/ sbrul spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phag/ sa pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang /
35b5('bum): bsam gtan dang / rnam bstan tam dang / ting pe'idzi nad dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la spyod pa dang / sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gnyis
35b6('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de lha rnam/ sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa drug
35b7('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa tshad kyi/ sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bcu pa yongs
35b8('bum): su rdzogs par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing 'jig rtend gyi khams nas
36a1('bum): snang bar byed pa dang masu mas can rnams yongs su skyenang par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag yongs
36a2('bum): su gtong ba dang / smad par dka' ba'i rnams smod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / kye 'jigs pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / so ma yang dag
36a3('bum): par rig ga rnams songs su sgrub bya rdzun par mi rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / rje chen po mngon par sgrub pa de dag bstan sa sangs rgyas kyi sku sa rna las
36a4('bum): dang nyi lag thams cad mongs su thog nga 'dzid dan/ de la sems can byis pa'i ding tshul can dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kyem gyi 'dis legs par bslabs
36a5('bum): pa ngo mtshar che'i mdzes dag byed/ de/ myi dga' bar byed cing / gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang po'i gzugs dang / rta'i gzugs dang
36a6('bum): ba lang gi gzugs dang / rnga mo dang / dngos la/ gzugs dang / skyes pa dang seMs khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs stonang pa dang / skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal myed khang dang / dka' thub
36a7('bum): gyi nags tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba/ rdza dga' ba stond pa dang / rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba stond pa dang / nags tshal mdangs dga' ba stond pa dang / de dag tu stand dang 'khor gyi stan
36a8('bum): dang gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs bting ste/ mdang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang / spyan gzigs mang po de lta bu stonang pa dang / glu dang / sil snyan gyis skye
36b1('bum): bo dga' bar byed cing / sbyin pa yongs gang ba dang / tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang / ting nge 'dzind kyis rnam par brtse ba dang / shes
36b2('bum): rab bsgom pa dang / rnam pa 'di nas song dga' bar byed cing / rgyal rigs me zhing mtho pa'i rigs so nad pa dang / bram ze mo zhing mtho pa'i rigs stond pa dang / khyim bdag che zhing mtsho
36b3('bum): ba'i rigs stonang pa dang / ri ba rten pa nye te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams stonang pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams stond pa dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams stond pa dang / dga'
36b4('bum): ldan kyi semams ston pa nga / sa slo rnamam dun 'phrul gyi bang byed kyis so pa dang / sa nges kyi sa nasas ston
36b5('bum): da mangs la nye bar rmyi la sa pakun 'byod gyis rnams so pa chen gyi sngarnams sonang pa dang / snang ba'i skarnams
36b6('bum): gnong pa dang / chung sdang gi sa / da byed srung ba'i las stodakun snang dang gA'i sgyumamapa sto pa dang / dge pa'i spyarnams ston pa dang / rlung dgo
36b7('bum): skarnams ston pa dang / tshad byed du rnams stond pa dang / dag rgyas kyi lha rnams so nang pa nga / che ba'i grwarnams don pa dang / chu che'i garnams son pa dang
36b8('bum): myed che ba'i ska rnams so nang pa dang / sa 'i drim pa'i sngarnams sonang pa dang rtse che ba'i sngarnams son pa dang / rtsi gdung ba'i garnam pa gnod pa dang / shinang du mthong ba'i lhanams
38a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / yan lag dang nyid lag yongs su gtong ba dang / dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
38a2('bum): yongs su sgrub pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su sgrub
38a3('bum): pa dang / byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa dang / snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub pa de dag kyang stond cing / sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs
38a4('bum): pa sto nad pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes ngo mtshar cher 'dzind to// de la skyes bu mkhas shing gsal la yid rno ba dang ldan ba dpyod pa dam pa dang ldan pa rnams ni 'di snyam ste/
38a5('bum): 'di la chos gang yang dmyigs su myed na/ myi 'di de ltar myed pa'i chos kyis skye bo mang po 'di dag dga' ba ra byed pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung po'i chos so snyam ste/
38a6('bum): sems can 'di dag ni dngos po myed pa la dngos por 'du shes pa'o zhes bya bar de dag gi shes pa 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes
38a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang myi mthong ste/ thabs mkhas pas/ sems can rnams yongs su smyind par byed kyang sems can
38a8('bum): du myi dmyigs sems can du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs te/ bdag kyang sbyin pa gtong ba yin/ gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul po yin/ sbyin pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin
38b1('bum): sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa gtong ba de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun par dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang tshul khrims srung ba yin/ gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par
38b2('bum): sprul pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bzod pa
38b3('bum): sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bzod pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bzod pa sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing / 'thun
38b4('bum): bas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom pa yin/ gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang da ga par skul ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi legs pa rjod
38b5('bum): pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin pa la snyoms
38b6('bum): par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul ba yin/ ting nge 'dzind kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag
38b7('bum): gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang shes rab sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang shes rab la yang dag par skul ba yin/ shes rab kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/
38b8('bum): sems can gzhan gang shes rab sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dge ba'i bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/ gzhan yang
39a1('bum): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skul po yin/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag
39a2('bum): par 'dzind pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang
39a3('bum): ldan pa'i gso sbyin la yang dag par skul ba yan/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan po'i gso sbyin gyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar
39a4('bum): gnas pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzind pa yin/ gzhan yang bslab
39a5('bum): pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bslabapa'i gnas lnga'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzind pa
39a6('bum): de dag gi legs pa brjod cing/ 'thun pasgra dga' bar spyod pa sin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa yin// sems can gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po sa
39a7('bum): dag par smras pa semabasam gtan dang po'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'dug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga'
39a8('bum): bar spyod pa yin bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa sen/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par sprul pa yin/ thamam gtan gnyis pa'i legs
39b1('bum): pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gsum
39b2('bum): pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bsam gtan gsum pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam
39b3('bum): gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang
39b4('bum): bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sem sa can gzhan gang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug
39b5('bum): pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' ba ra spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang byams pa la yang dag par
39b6('bum): sprul pa yin/ byams pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag
39b7('bum): kyang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang snying rje la yang dag par skul ba yin/ snying rje'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag
39b8('bum): gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang dga' ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dga' ba'i legs pa
40a1('bum): rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang btang snyoms la
40a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang btang snyoms la yang dag par skul ba yin/ btang snyoms kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug
40a3('bum): pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
40a4('bum): la yang dag par skul ba yin/ nam mkha' mtha' yasaskye mched kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par
40a5('bum): 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam shes mtha'ayas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan
40a6('bum): yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la
40a7('bum): snyoms par 'dug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang cung zad byer
40a8('bum): pa'i skye mched la yang dag par sprul pa yin/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi leg
40b1('bum): pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la
40b2('bum): yang dag par skul ba yin/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la snyoms par 'jug
40b3('bum): pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin// bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
40b4('bum): layang dag par skul ba yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa de dag gi
40b5('bum): legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa/ yin/ bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la
40b6('bum): yang dag par skul ba yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun
40b7('bum): bas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi legs
40b8('bum): parjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs brjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dbang po rnams sgom pa yin/
41a1('bum): gzhan yang dbang po rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dbang po rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dbang po rnams sdom pa de dag gi legs pa
41a2('bum): brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang stobs rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang stobs rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ stobs rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/
41a3('bum): sems can gzhan gang stobs rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang
41a4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang dag par skul bayan/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi legs pa rdzo/ da pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang byang chub kyi yan
41a5('bum): lag rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang 'phag sa pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa yin/ gzhan
41a6('bum): yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang 'phags d+hA Sh+Tha

41b2('bum): 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yan/ bdag kyang rnam par tha rad pa brgyad sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam par tha radang pa brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad
41b3('bum): 'jug pa dgu sgom pa yin/ gzhan ya mthar dkyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul ba yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i legs
41b4('bum): brjod pa yin sems can gzhan gang mthard kyi sa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa
41b5('bum): yin bdag kyang mngon par shes pa lnga sgom pa yin gzhan yang mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par skul bayin mngon par shes pa lnga'i legs pa rjod pa yin
41b6('bum): sems can gzhan gang mngon par shes pa lnga sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzind rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa yin
41b7('bum): gzhan yang ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin pa la smos
41b8('bum): par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par skul ba
42a1('bum): yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi legs parjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang gzungs kyi sgo rna de dag gi legs pa brjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa
42a2('bum): yin bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i
42a3('bum): legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang myi 'jigs
42a4('bum): pa bzhi sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang myi 'jigs pa bzhi/ la yang dag par skul ba yin/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi/ 'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang
42a5('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang so sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang
42a6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/ so so yang dag par reg pa bzhi'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom pa
42a7('bum): ngag gi legs parjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byams pa chen po sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ byams pa chen
42a8('bum): po'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang byams pa chen po sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang snying rje chen po sgom pa yin/ gzhan
42b1('bum): yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ snying rje chen po'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang snying rje chen po sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar
42b2('bum): spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
42b3('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin
42b4('bum): bdag kyang rgya chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sgrub pa ya~M/ na gzhan yang myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la yang dag par sprul pa yin/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum
42b5('bum): cu rtsa gnyis kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can ga/ zhan gang myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sgrub pa de dgagi legs pa brjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa
42b6('bum): yin/ bdag kyang dpe byud bzang po brgyad cu sgrub pa yin/ gzhan yang dpe' byang bzang po brgyad chu la yang dag par sprul ba yin/ dpe' byang bzang po brgyad cu'i legs parjod pa yin
42b7('bum): sems can gzhan gang dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cu sgrub pa de dag gi legs parjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ rab 'byor dgal te chos kyi dbyings sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang
42b8('bum): de bzhin ma yin nam/ bar du yang de bzhin ma yin du yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems
43a1('bum): can rnams la chos kyi dbyings stond par myi 'gyur/ sems can rnams yongs su smyind par byed par myi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par myi 'gyur te
43a2('bum): rab 'byor de chos kyi dbyings de sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin bar du yang de bzhin pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
43a3('bum): thabs mkhas pas/ sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings stond to// sems can rnams kyi dond tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// sems can rnams yongs su
43a4('bum): smyend par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag/ par byed do// // shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ mnyam
43a5('bum): ba nyid du bstand pa'i le'u ste// drag cu bzha pa'o//
43a6('bum): bam po gsum// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan
43a7('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar gal te sems can yang shi nang tu dmyigs su ma mchis la/ sems can du dmyigs pa yang ma mchis na/ su'i
43a8('bum): don tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad
43b1('bum): ces bka' stsa la to// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi yi bdag pa'i mtha' tshad mar byas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom ste/ rab 'byor
43b2('bum): gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan la/ sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan yin na mi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sgom par
43b3('bum): myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can
43b4('bum): rnams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa sgom ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sgom pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa
43b5('bum): mtha' rnam par 'khrug pa myed par sems can rnam/ sa yang bdag pa'i mtha' la 'god do// gsol da pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar yang dag pa
43b6('bum): mthal yang gzhan ma lags sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma lags na yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das gal te yang dag
43b7('bum): pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur na ni/ des rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin la ni rang bzhin gnas pa ma mchis na
43b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das ji sar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i ma sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mthal la 'god pa lags
44a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor da yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtho'i gnas par 'gyur ba yang myed/ rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par
44a2('bum): 'gyur ba yang myed na/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ sems can gyi mtha' yang dag pa'i
44a3('bum): mtha' la 'god de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug par myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin te/
44a4('bum): de ltar na sems can gyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
44a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god kyang / yang dag
44a6('bum): pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug par myi bgyid pa de lta bu'i thabs gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
44a7('bum): blo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sems can rnams sbyim pa la rab tu 'god do// sbyin pa la rab tu bkod nas
44a8('bum): sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' dang / ba ma'i mtha' dang / dbus ston to// ji ltar sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mthal yang stong / ba ma'i mtha' yang stong/ dbus kyang stong pa de ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras
44b1('bum): bu yang stong / sbyin bdag kyang stong / lend pa yang stong par stond cing / rigs kyi bu de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' la don de dag myed kyis/ sbyin pa yang gzhan la/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu
44b2('bum): yang gzhan no snyam du ma sems shig/ srid bdag kyang gzhan la/ le nad pa yang gzhan no// snyam du ma sems shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod nam sbyin pa srung gzhan la/ sbyin pa'i 'bras
44b3('bum): bu yang gzhan no snyam du myi sems sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la/ lend pa yang gzhan no// snyam du myi sems pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi sbyin pa 'od bdud rtsi dang / bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang /
44b4('bum): mthar bdud rtsir 'gyur te/ sbyin pa 'dis gzugs yongs su ma 'dzin cig/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma 'dzin cig
44b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin bas stong ro// de'i 'bras bu yang 'bras bus stong ngo // sbyin bdag kyang sbyin bdag gis stong po// sen pa yang
44b6('bum): lend pas stong ste/ stong pa nyid la ni sbyin pa myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang / sbyin bdag dang le nad pa myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag ni ngo
44b7('bum): nyid kyis gi nang du stong pa zhes rjod do// gzhan yang rab 'byor dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thogs rab kyi pha rol tu rtsend pa la stod pa'i thabs mkhas pas/
44b8('bum): can rnams tshul khrims la 'god de/ tshur rigs kyi bu srog gcod pa spongs la/ srog gcod pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ ma byin par yi nad pa spongs la/ mkhyen par len pa
45a1('bum): pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spongs la 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ brdzun du smra
45a2('bum): pa spongs la brdzun du smra ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ phra ma spongs la phra ma las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ zhe gcod pa'i tshig spongs la zhe gcod pa'i tshig las phyir ldog
45a3('bum): par gyis shig/ tshig kyal ba spongs la/ tshig kyal pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ chags sems spongs la chags sems las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ gnod sems
45a4('bum): spongs la/ gnod sems las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ log par lta ba spongs la/ log par lta ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu chos 'dra
45a5('bum): dag la ji ltar yongs su brtags pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin gang yang myed kyis rigs kyi bu soms dang gang gis srog gcad par bya ba'i srog chags dang / gang gis
45a6('bum): srog gcad par bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin gang ma byin par blang ba dang / ma byind par lend par btags pa dang / gang gis blang ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig sen
45a7('bum): gang 'dod pa log phra g.yem pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem par btags pa dang / gang gis 'dod pas log par g.yem par bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang brdzun du smra
45a8('bum): ba dang / brdzun du smra bar btags pa dang / gang gis brdzun du smra bar bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin gang phra ma smra ba dang / phra ma smra bar btags pa dang / gang gis phra mar
45b1('bum): smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang zhe gcod pa'i tshig smra ba dang / zhe gcod par btags pa dang / gang gis zhe gcod pa'i tshig tu smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang
45b2('bum): tshig kyal ba smra ba dang / tshig kyal bar btags pa dang / gang gis tshig kyal bar smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang chags sems skyed pa dang / chags sems su btags
45b3('bum): pa dang / gang gis chags sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang gnod sems skyed pa dang / gnod sems su btags pa dang / gang gis gnod sems su bya
45b4('bum): ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang log pa ra lta ba dang / log par lta bar btags pa dang / gang gis log par mthong ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig
45b5('bum): yin ces stond cing / tshul khrims la 'god de/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa/ de lta bu dang ldan pas shes rab
45b6('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams yongs su smyind par byed do// des de la sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu bstand te/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu
45b7('bum): dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de yang / ngo bo nyid kyis stong par bstand pas/ rigs kyi bu des sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rig nas// de la mngon
45b8('bum): bar zhend par myi byed do// mngon par zhend pa myed pas 'khrug par myi 'gyur zhing / shes rab skyed do// shes rab des kyang bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad
46a1('bum): bcad nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ de yang 'jig rtend gyi tha snyad kyi don dam par ma yin no//
46a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang myi dmyigs te/ de'i mya ngan las 'das pa
46a3('bum): zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
46a4('bum): sems can phan tshun gnod par sems shing / 'khrug/ sa par gyur pa dang ldan pa dag mthong na/ 'di skad du/ 'dems shing stond te/ rigs kyi bu bzod pas sgrubs
46a5('bum): shig/ bzod pa sgoms shig/ nges pa dang sems zhi ba dang dang du sems pa'i ngang tshul can du gyis shig/ gang gnod par byed pa dang / gang gis gnod par bya ba
46a6('bum): dang / gang la gnod par bya ba'i chos de dag ni thams cad kyang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu gnod par byed pa ni su yod/ gnod par ni su la bya/ ces ni gnod
46a7('bum): par bya// soms dang / chos de dag thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ nam yang myi stong bar myi 'gyur te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rdzas
46a8('bum): kyis ma mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma byas so// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas so// nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas so// lha rnams kyis ma byas so// klu rnams
46b1('bum): kyis ma byas so// gnod sbyin rnams kyis ma byas so// dri za rnams kyis ma byas so// lha ma yin rnams kyis ma byas so// nam mkha' lding rnams kyis ma byas so// myi 'am ci rnams kyis
46b2('bum): ma byas so// lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ma byas so// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas so// sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang
46b3('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa dang / dge rgyas dang / gnas gtsang ma dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched drang rnaMgs pa la skye me lung ba 'i kyi le dang 'du shes myed 'du shes
46b4('bum): myed rkyen skye mched kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas te/ de ni// rtag par yang rang bzhin gyis stong ba'o// rang bzhin gyis stong pa ni su la yang gnod par myi byed do zhes nas/
46b5('bum): rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams thabs mkhas pas/ rang bzhin stong
46b6('bum): pa nyid dang / rgyu dang 'bras yul sbyor te/ rang bzhin spyong pa nyid la bkod cing / rim kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ston to// yang dag par sprulo//
46b7('bum): yang dag par gzi srong / yang rig par dga' bar byed do// gzhog go// 'dul lo// rab tu 'god do// de yang 'jig rten dgyis skad kyi don dam par ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhes
46b8('bum): rang bzhin song pa nyid la gang thob par byed pa dang / gang gis thob par bya ba dang / gang thob par bya ba gang yang byed do// rab 'byor nga 'di mi yang dag pa'i mtha' song pa nyid de/
47a1('bum): de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don tu gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ de la sems can du dmyigs
47a2('bum): pa myed do// sems can du gdags pa dmyigs pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni sems can gyis dben pa'o// / rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang
47a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na/ 'di ltar lus
47a4('bum): dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul te/ da rigs kyi bu dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni/ chos gang yang zhum zhing / le lor 'gyur ba'am/
47a5('bum): gang la zhum zhing / le lor 'gyur ba'am/ gang gisazhum zhing / le lor 'gyur ba'am/ gang zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang myed de/ chos de dag
47a6('bum): ni thams cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid las myi 'da' ba yin gyis lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus skyed la le lo 'or te/ dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am
47a7('bum): brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab 'am// nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam chen po stong pa nyid
47a8('bum): dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/
47b1('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa
47b2('bum): stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul
47b3('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam
47b4('bum): bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thard pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas
47b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/
47b6('bum): ting nge 'dzind rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam
47b7('bum): byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dag la brtson par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu dag stong pa nyid kyis chos de dag thams cad slob pa myed
47b8('bum): par rtogs shig/ sgrib pa myed pa'i chos la zhum par 'gyur ba gang yang myed do zhes rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod
48a1('bum): po'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ sems can rnams la rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par stond to// yang dag par skul lo// yang dag par gzeng stod do/
48a2('bum): yang dag par dga' bar byed do// gzhog go// 'dul lo// rab tu 'god do// ci nas kyang gnyis la myi gnas pa de ltar rab tu 'god do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
48a3('bum): ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// gnyis su myed pa'i chos ni gang la yang gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
48a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi brtson 'grusal 'dems shing rjes su stond te/ tshur rigs kyi
48a5('bum): bu sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid
48a6('bum): dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/
48a7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang
48a8('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/
48b1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams samatha'as byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i
48b2('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam
48b3('bum): rnam par tha rad pa rnams sam/ mthar dkyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa 'am/ mngon
48b4('bum): bar shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ bas rnams sam/ myi 'dzegs pa rnams sam/
48b5('bum): so so yang dag par reg pa rnams sam/ yang na byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi tshe sa ma 'dres pa dag la/ brtson 'grus rtsoms la chos
48b6('bum): de dag gnyis par yang yid la ma byed cig/ myi gnyis par yang yid la ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni gnyis par
48b7('bum): med la bya ba ma yin/ myi gnyis par yang yid la bya ba ma yin no// rab 'byor dade ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
48b8('bum): thabs mkhas pas/ sems can rnams rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su sbyind par byed de/ yongs su sbyind par byas nas/ rim gyis rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god do//
49a1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god do// dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god do// rang byang chub la 'god do// lam gyi rnam
49a2('bum): ba shes pa nyid la 'gyod do// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god do// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
49a3('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ sems can sems g.yeng ba rnams la 'di skad du 'dems shing rjes su ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin sgoms shig/ g.yeng
49a4('bum): ba'i 'du shes sam/ ting nge 'dzind kyi 'du shes su ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag ni rang bzhi na gyis stong pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni
49a5('bum): gang g.yeng ba dang / rtse gcig tu 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang dmyigs su myed do// khyod kyis ting nge 'dzind de la gnas te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la
49a6('bum): spyad na/ lus dang ngag dang / yid kyis dge ba'i chos gang ci byed kyang rung ste/ sbyin pa gtong ngam/ tshul khrims srung ngam/ bzod pa sgrub 'am/ brtson 'grus rtsom 'am
49a7('bum): ting nge 'dzind skyed pa 'am/ shes rab sgom 'am/ nang stong pa nyid la spyod dom phyi stong pa nyid la spyod dam phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod dam stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam chen po stong
49a8('bum): pa nyid la spyod dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod de/
49b1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid
49b2('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
49b3('bum): nyid la spyod dam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod dam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod dam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod dam/ dbang po rnams la spyod dam/
49b4('bum): stobs rnams la spyod dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag padun la spyod dam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya da pa la spyod dam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la
49b5('bum): spyod dam/ bsam gtan rnams la spyod dam/ tshad/ myed pa rnams la spyod dam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyom sa par 'jug pa rnams la spyod dam/ rnam par thar
49b6('bum): pa brgyad la spyod dam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms paro 'jug pa dgu la spyod dam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyod dam
49b7('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod dam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams la spyod dam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod dam/ myi 'jigs pa
49b8('bum): bzhi la spyod dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod dam/ byams pa chen po la spyod dam/ snying rje chen po la spyod dam/ dga' ba chen po la spyod dam/ btang snyoms chen po la
50a1('bum): spyod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod dam// myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la spyod dam/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod
50a2('bum): dam/ nyan thos kyi lam la spyod dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la spyod dam/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la spyod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la spyod dam// rgyu nang du zhugs
50a3('bum): pa'i 'bras bu la spyod dam// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod dam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod dam/ rang byang chub la spyod dam/ lam gyi
50a4('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod dam/ rnam pa thams cad ma khye nad pa nyid la spyod dam/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba la spyod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
50a5('bum): dag par bya ba la spyod kyang rung ste/ dge ba'i chos de dag/ las gron chu dus 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes 'dems shing // rjes su stond te/ rab 'byor da de ltar byang chub seMs
50a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas/ bar
50a7('bum): 'gal yang las myi byed par myi 'gyur gyi/ dge ba thams cad tshol zhing / sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rtag tu rgyu nang myi 'chad par/ bsnyen
50a8('bum): bkur byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos pa de yang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
50b1('bum): byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ tshe rabs rjes kyang nam du yang rnam par chud rtsi za ste/ rtag tu rgyu nad myi chad par gzungs thob cing / lus kyi dbang po 'am/ ngag gi dbang po
50b2('bum): 'am/ yid kyi dbang po kyi nyam pa yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'odadi ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rtag tu chun rtse chad par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin
50b3('bum): tu bsgoms pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid shind tu bsgoms pa de lam thams cad shi nad tu bsgoms par 'gyur te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/
50b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi la ma shi nang tu bsgoms par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa ga/ pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rnam par
50b5('bum): chud myi za ba'i tshul gyis phan par 'gyur ba de dag kyang shi/ nang tu bsgoms par 'gyur te/ rnam par smyind pa la sa byung ba'i mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas nas/
50b6('bum): sems can rnams kyi don byed na/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'khor yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid las kyang yongs su myi nyam mo// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ses
50b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing / thabs mkhas pas/ sems can rnams kyi don byed do// rab 'byor nga gzhan
50b8('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing / sems can shes rab 'chal pa can blo chung ba rnams mthong
51a1('bum): na 'di skad 'dems shing rjes su ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu lus dang ngag gam/ yid kyi las gang ci byed kyang rung ste/ de thams cad rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rtogs shig dang
51a2('bum): khyod kyi las thams cad bdud rtsi'i 'bras bur 'gyur te/ mthar bdud rtsir 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni gang 'jig par 'gyur ba 'am/ yongs su nyam par 'gyur ba de lta
51a3('bum): bu'i chos gang yang dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yongs su nyam par myi 'gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las yongs su nyam pa'i chos gang yang myed do/
51a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni nga// ngos po yod pa yang ma yin/ dngos po myed pa yang ma yan/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la
51a5('bum): zhig yongs su nyam par 'gyur zhes/ rab 'byor da de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas
51a6('bum): pas/ sems can rnams la 'dems shing rjes su stond to// de ltar 'dems shing rjes su stonang pa'i tshe/ nam yang rjes su ma bsgrubs pa ma yin/ de ni bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i
51a7('bum): las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par blangs shing /
51a8('bum): gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas par yang dag par blangs shing /
51b1('bum): gnas pa yin// gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas par yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan
51b2('bum): yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdog kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/
51b3('bum): bdag kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtam gsum pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa
51b4('bum): yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang ga par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rtag tu rgyu nad myi chad par byams pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun
51b5('bum): myi chad par/ byams pa sgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rtag tu rgyu nad myi chad par/ snying rje la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rtag tu rgyu nang
51b6('bum): myi chad par snying rje sgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rtag tu rgyu nang myi chad par/ dga' ba la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun myi chad par/ dga' ba
51b7('bum): sgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rtag tu rgyu nang myi chad par/ btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rtag tu rgyu nang myi chad par/ btang snyoms sgom pa la
51b8('bum): yang dag par sprul pa yin / bdag kyang rtag tu nam mkha' ma ma'i yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan ya nam ma'a' mtha' yas skye mched kyi spos
52a1('bum): par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhanas pa rnam shes
52a2('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang chung zad
52a3('bum): myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myan skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang
52a4('bum): 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang skye na ba'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan
52a5('bum): yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul pa yin/ bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha
52a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag
52a7('bum): kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
52a8('bum): pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang shes
52b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul ba y-im bdag kyang nang stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang phyi stong pa nyid
52b2('bum): sgom pa yinagazhan yang phyi stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang phyi nang stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang stong
52b3('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang chen po stong pa nyid la yang dag
52b4('bum): par skul ba yin bdag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyidasgom pa yin/ gzhan yang don dam pa stong pa nyid la ya bdag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang 'dus byas stong
52b5('bum): pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang 'dus byas stong pa nyi da la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang 'dus ma
52b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/
52b7('bum): bdag kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul pa yin/ bdag kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid skom pa yin/
52b8('bum): gzhan yang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/
53a1('bum): bdag kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yang dag par sprul ba yin/ bdag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom
53a2('bum): ba yin/ gzhan yang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la yang
53a3('bum): dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa
53a4('bum): yin/ gzhan yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang dgapar skul ba yin/ bdag kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang dngos po myed
53a5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang dag par
53a6('bum): skul ba yin/ bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom
53a7('bum): pa yin/ gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang dbang po rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang dbang po rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/
53a8('bum): bdag kyang stobs rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang stobs rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag
53b1('bum): rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/
53b2('bum): bdag kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa yin
53b3('bum): gzhan yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam par thard pa brgyad la yang dag par skul
53b4('bum): ba yin/ bdag kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang
53b5('bum): dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang mngon par shes pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin//
53b6('bum): bdag kyang ting nge 'dzind rnams la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzind rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang gzungs
53b7('bum): kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul ba
53b8('bum): yin/ bdag kyang myi 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang myi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin
54a1('bum): gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang byams pa chen po la yang
54a2('bum): dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
54a3('bum): la slob pa yin gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la slob pa yin/ gzhan
54a4('bum): yang myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la yang dag paraskul ba y-in/ bdag kyang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la/ slob pa yin/ gzhan yang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu
54a5('bum): la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing / de la nga myi gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i
54a6('bum): 'bras bu la 'god pa yin/ bdag kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing / de la yang myi gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras yul 'god pa yin/
54a7('bum): bdag kyang phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing / de la yang myi gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god pa yin/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i shes
54a8('bum): paskyed cing de la yang myi gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god pa yin/ bdag kyang rang byang chub kyi shes pa skyed cing / de la yang gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rang byang chub
54b1('bum): la 'god pa yin/ bdag kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam skyed pa yin/ gzhan yang lam de la 'dems shing / rjes su stond pa dang / gzhog cing 'dul ba dang
54b2('bum): 'god pa yin te/ rab 'byor da de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ rang bzhin
54b3('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i tshe/ nam yang las myed par gnas pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad
54b4('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na rang bzhin stong pad la ni sems can yang myi dmyigs/ chos kyang myi dmyi gas/ chos ma lags pa yang myi dmyigs na/ bcom
54b5('bum): ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi don tu yang dag par/ 'jug pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis
54b6('bum): bka' sa la pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni sems can mya
54b7('bum): dmyigs so// chos myi dmyigs so// chos ma yin pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis sbyong ba zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
54b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po yang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / chos
55a1('bum): rnams rang bzhin gyis stong bar gyi ston to// rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhen/ rab 'byor nga gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis ltung // tshor ba ni rang bzhin
55a2('bum): kyis stong ngo // 'du shes ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 'du byed ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rab 'byor dgyeg ni rang bzhin gyis stong
55a3('bum): rna ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong po/ sna ni rang bzhin gyis stong po/ lce ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rab 'byor
55a4('bum): gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sgra ni rang bzhin gyi sa stong ngo // dri ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo po// ron rang bzhi na gyis stong ngo // reg ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // chos
55a5('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rab 'byor da myi ga gi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
55a6('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rang
55a7('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo // rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis
55a8('bum): stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rab 'byor dmyig
55b1('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin
55b2('bum): gyis stong po lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
55b3('bum): kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rab 'byor da sa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // chu'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mye'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rlung
55b4('bum): gi khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong po nam mkha'i kha mas ni rang bzhin gyis stong po/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rab 'byor
55b5('bum): ma rig pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong po 'du byed ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyi sa stong ngo // myong dang gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong /
55b6('bum): skye mched drug ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sred pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong po// le nad pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /
55b7('bum): srid pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong po/ skye ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo po/ rga shi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rab 'byor de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
55b8('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong //
56a1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rab 'byor nga nang stong pa nyid ni
56a2('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong po phyi stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong po phyi nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo po/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // chen po stong
56a3('bum): pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong po/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong po// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis ste po
56a4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong po/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
56a5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong po/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong po rab gaM mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
56a6('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong po/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong po/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
56a7('bum): stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // stong ngo // rab 'byor nga dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis spyong po// yang dag par spong ba rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / rdzu 'phrul gyi
56a8('bum): rkang pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dbang po rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong po/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 'phags
56b1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // bsam gtan rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // tshad myed pa rnams
56b2('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis spong ngo / rnam par thard pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
56b3('bum): 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong po/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis
56b4('bum): stong ngo // ting nge 'dzind rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de bzhi na gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
56b5('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // byams pa chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // snying rje
56b6('bum): chen po na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dga' ba chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // btang snyoms chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis
56b7('bum): stong ngo // mye chen po mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin
56b8('bum): gyis stong ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rang byang chub
57a1('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis stong po lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo po// de bas na byang chub
57a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phung po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to// skye mched bcu gnyis ni rang bzhin gyis stong
57a3('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston to khams bcwo brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// rtend cing 'breld par 'byung ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// @
57a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// stong pa nyid thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang to//
57a5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhe sa bya bar chos stond to// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to
57a6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// dbang po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to// stobs lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong po zhes
57a7('bum): bya bar chos ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni rang bzhin gyis stong po zhes bya bar chos stonang to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston
57a8('bum): to// ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston toH/ bsam gtan bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to// tshad myed pa bzhi ni rang
57b1('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong po zhes bya bar chos stond to// rnam par thard pa brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong
57b2('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston to// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa
57b3('bum): dang / smond pa myed pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang to// mngon par shes pa lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to// ting nge 'dzin thams cad ni rang bzhin
57b4('bum): gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston pa to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni rang bzhin
57b5('bum): gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to// myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
57b6('bum): zhes bya bar chos stond to// byams pa chen po na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to// snying rje chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to// dga' ba chen po ni ring
57b7('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang to// btang snyoms chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes
57b8('bum): bya bar chos stonang to// myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang to// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//
58a1('bum): rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to//
58a2('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang to// rang byang chub ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya
58a3('bum): bar chos ston to/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to//
58a4('bum): bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to// rab 'byor nga gal te nang stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong ba ma
58a5('bum): yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi 'gyur ro// gal te phye stong
