58a6('bum): pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ne/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi 'gyur ro// gal te
58a7('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi 'gyuraro//
58a8('bum): gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstanang par
58b1('bum): myi 'gyur ro// gal te chen po stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos
58b2('bum): bstan par myi 'gyur ro// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong
58b3('bum): zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi 'gyur ro// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos thams cad rang
58b4('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi 'a gyur ro// gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyi sa stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
58b5('bum): dpa' chen pos kyang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi sa stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par myi 'gyur ro// ga la te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong
58b6('bum): pa ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par myi 'gyur ro// gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
58b7('bum): stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par myi 'gyur ro//
58b8('bum): gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos
59a1('bum): bstan par myi 'gyur ro// gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na naM byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos thams cad rang
59a2('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi 'gyur ro// gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang
59a3('bum): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong po zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi 'gyur ro// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
59a4('bum): chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong po zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi 'gyur ro// gal te myi dmyi gas pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/
59a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong po zhes bya bar chos bstan par myi 'gyur ro// gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa
59a6('bum): nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong po zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi 'gyur ro// gal
59a7('bum): te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong ba ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi
59a8('bum): 'gyur ro// gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis
59b1('bum): stong po zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi 'gyur te/ de'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bshig par 'gyur na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni 'jig par myi 'gyur/ rtag pa ma yin te/ phyis myed
59b2('bum): bar 'gro ba yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni yul na myi gnas/ phyogs na myi gnas pa ste/ de ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba yang ma yin/ gang du 'gro ba yang ma yin te/ de ni chos
59b3('bum): gnas pa nyid do// de la ni chos gang yang 'phel ba dmyigs pa'am/ 'grib pa dmyigs pa 'am/ 'gong pa dmyigs pa 'am/ skye ba dmyigs pa 'am/ 'byung ba dmyigs pa 'am/ 'gag
59b4('bum): pa dmyigs pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmyigs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba dmyigs pa myed do// de ni tshe sa rnams kyi rang bzhin te/ de la gnas shing byang chub
59b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jugaste/ chos gang yang 'jug pa 'am myi 'jug par mthong
59b6('bum): ba myed do// chos thams cad ni 'jug pa myed cing / gnas pa myed pa ste/ de ni chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa'o// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
59b7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong bar mthong nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir gyi ldog ko/ de ci'i phyir zhen/
59b8('bum): de ni 'di ltar des sgrib pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ chos thams cad na sgrib pa myed par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la
60a1('bum): bdag myi dmyigs/ bdag tu gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sems can myi dmyigs/ sems can du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ srog kyi dmyigs/ srog tu gdags pa
60a2('bum): yang myi dmyigs 'gro ba yang myi dmyigs 'gro bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs gso ba yang myi dmyigs/ gso bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ skyes bu yang myi dmyigs/ skyes bur
60a3('bum): gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ gang zag kyang myi dmyigs/ gang zag tu gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ shed can yang myi dmyigs/ shed can du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ shed bdag kyang myi dmyigs
60a4('bum): shed bdag tu gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ byed pa po yang myi dmyigs/ byed pa por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ tshor ba po yang myi dmyigs/ tshor ba por gdags pa yang
60a5('bum): myi dmyigs/ tshor bar byed pa yang myi dmyigs/ tshor bar byed par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ slong bar yang myi myigs/ slong bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/
60a6('bum): kun nas slong ba yang myi dmyigs/ kun nas slong bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ shes pa po yang myi dmyigs/ shes pa por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs mthong ba po yang myi dmyigs
60a7('bum): mthong ba por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ gzugs kyang myi dmyigs/ gzugs su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ tshor ba yang myi dmyigs/ tshor bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs
60a8('bum): 'du shes kyang myi dmyigs 'du shes su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'du byed kyang myi dmyigs 'du byed du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par
60b1('bum): par shes par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ myig kyang myi dmyigs/ myig tu gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rna ba yang myi dmyigs/ rna bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sna yang myi
60b2('bum): dmyigs/ snar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lce yang myi dmyigs/ lcer gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lus kyang myi dmyigs/ lus su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ yid kyang myi dmyigs
60b3('bum): yid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs gzugs kyang myi dmyigs gzugs su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sgra yang myi dmyigs/ sgrar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dri yang myi dmyigs
60b4('bum): drar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs ro yang myi dmyigs ror gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ reg kyang myi dmyigs/ reg tu gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ chos kyang myi dmyigs
60b5('bum): chos su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ myig gi rnam par shes par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i rnam par
60b6('bum): shes pa yang myi dmyigs rna ba'i rnam par shes par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs sna'i rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ sna'i rnam par shes par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lce'i
60b7('bum): rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs lce'i rnam par shes par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs lus kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs
60b8('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs yid kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs/ myig gi 'dus te reg par gdags
61a1('bum): pa yang myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs/ sna'i
61a2('bum): 'dus te reg par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs/
61a3('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
61a4('bum): kyis tshor ba yang myi dmyigs/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'i rkye nad kyis tshor bar gdags par yang myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang myi dmyigs
61a5('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar gdags pa ya da myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
61a6('bum): tshor bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te
61a7('bum): reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba yang myi dmyigs lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba yang myi dmyigs/ yid kyi 'dus
61a8('bum): te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sa'i khams kyang myi dmyigs/ sa'i khams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ chu'i khams kyang myi dmyigs/ chu'i khams su gdag/
61b1('bum): pa yang myi dmyigs/ mye'i khams kyang myi dmyigs/ mye'i khams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rlung gi khams kyang myi dmyigs/ rlung gi khams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ nam mkha'
61b2('bum): khams kyang myi dmyigs/ nam mkha'i khams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i khams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs
61b3('bum): ma reg pa yang myi dmyigs/ ma rig par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'du byed kyang myi dmyigs/ 'du byed du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes
61b4('bum): par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ mying dang gzugs kyang myi dmyigs/ mying dang gzugs su gdags pa yang myi dmyi gas/ skye mched drug kyang myi dmyigs/ skye mched drug
61b5('bum): du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ reg pa yang myi dmyigs reg par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ tshor ba yang myi dmyi gas/ tshor bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sred
61b6('bum): pa yang myi dmyigs/ sred par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lend pa yang myi dmyigs/ le nad par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ srid pa yang myi dmyigs/ srid par gdags pa yang myi
61b7('bum): dmyigs skye ba yang myi dmyigs/ skye bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rga shi yang myi dmyigs/ rga shir gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi dmyig
61b8('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi dmyigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ bzod
62a1('bum): pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa yang myi dmyigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi dmyigs brtson
62a2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ shes
62a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi
62a4('bum): dmyigs phyi stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ phyi stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang mya dmyigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang
62a5('bum): myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs chen po stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ chen po stong pa nyid
62a6('bum): du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang sde dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ 'dus
62a7('bum): byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang
62a8('bum): myi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ thog ma dpa' ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyig/
62b1('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dbyis
62b2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du gdas
62b3('bum): pa yang myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed
62b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
62b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs
62b6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ yang dag par spong bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
62b7('bum): kyang myi dmyigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dbang po rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ dbang por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ stobs rnams kyang myi dmyigs
62b8('bum): stobs su gdags pa yang gyi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag tu gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yam lag brgyad pas
63a1('bum): myi dmyigs 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par gdags pa yang myi dmyigasa'aphags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs 'phags pa'i bden
63a2('bum): bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs bsam gtan rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ tshad myed par gdags
63a3('bum): pa yang myi dmyigs gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par tha rad pa
63a4('bum): rnams kyang myi dmyigs rnam par tha rad par gdag sa pa yang myi dmyigs/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ mthar da kyis
63a5('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang myi dmyigs
63a6('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ mngon par
63a7('bum): shes par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ ting nge 'dzinang du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ gzungs kyi sgor
63a8('bum): gdags pa yang myi dmyigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang myi dmyigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs
63b1('bum): myi 'jigs par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag par rig par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ byams pa chen po yang rgya
63b2('bum): dmyigs/ byams pa chen por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ snying rje chen po yang myi dmyigs/ snying rje chen por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang
63b3('bum): myi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang myi dmyigs/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
63b4('bum): gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'a bras bu yang myi dmyigs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras zur gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i
63b5('bum): 'bras bu yang myi dmyigs/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang myi dmyi gas/ dgra bcom pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs
63b6('bum): rang byang chub kyang myi dmyigs/ rang byang chub tu gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs
63b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs so// myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang myi dmyigs
63b8('bum): gyi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yang myi dmyigs/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur gdags pa yang myi dmyigs na/ bla na myed pa yang /
64a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la the tsom za bar 'gyur ba lta ga las 'od/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma
64a2('bum): 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma la bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar rgyu nang du chos bstan na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa de dag la rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
64a3('bum): bu rjes su thob par 'gyur ba'i skal ba la yod dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub 'am/ tha ma myed pa
64a4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i ska la ba yod dam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di
64a5('bum): ltar de dag la dngos po ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhi na no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad la dngos po
64a6('bum): myed na/ sems can gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bul
64a7('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub 'am/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dgod par bya ste/ gzhan du na phyen ci log gis yongs su la bris pa'i skye dgu dag phyin ci log
64a8('bum): myed pa la gzhog go/ 'dul lo// rab tu 'god do// phyin ci log gang yin pa de yang rtog pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir/ phyin ci log ma yin pa ste/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa ni
64b1('bum): phyin ci log ma yin pa'o// gang la phyi nad ci log myed pa de la bdag myed do// sems can myed do// srog myed do// 'gro ba myed do// gso ba myed do// skyes bu myed do// gang zag myed do//
64b2('bum): shed can myed do// shed bdag myed do// byed pa po myed do// tshor ba po myed do// shes pa po myed do// mthong ba po myed do// de la gzugs myed do// tshor ba myed do// 'du shes myed do//
64b3('bum): 'du byed myed do// rnam par shes pa myed do// de la myig myed do// rna ba myed do// sna myed do// lce myed do// lus myed do// yid myed do// de la gzugs myed do// sgra myed do//
64b4('bum): dri myed do// ro myed do// reg myed do// chos myed do// de la myig gi rnam par shes pa myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa myed do//
64b5('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed do// de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus
64b6('bum): te reg pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do// de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
64b7('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// lus
64b8('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba myed do// de la sa'i khams myed do// chu'i khams myed do// mye'i khams myed do// rlung gi
65a1('bum): khams myed do// nam mkha'i khams myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams myed do// de la ma rig pa myed do// 'du byed myed do// rnam par shes pa myed do// mying dang
65a2('bum): gzugs myed do// skye mched drug myed do// reg pa myed do// tshor ba myed do// sred pa myed do// lend pa myed do// srid pa myed do// skye ba myed do// rga shi myed do// de la sbyin pa'i pha
65a3('bum): rol tu phyi nad pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol
65a4('bum): tu phyind pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa myed do// de la nang stong pa nyid myed do// phye stong pa nyid myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid myed do// stong
65a5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid myed do// chen po stong pa nyid myed do don dam pa stong pa nyid myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed do// mtha'
65a6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed do/
65a7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
65a8('bum): myed do// de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed do// dbang po rnams myed do// stobs rnams myed do//
65b1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed do// de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed do// bsam gtan rnams myed do// tshad myed pa rnas
65b2('bum): myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed do// de la rnam par thard pa rnams myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed do// rnam par thar
65b3('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams myed do// ting nge 'dzind rnams myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed do// de la de bzhi
65b4('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnam sa myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myed do// byams pa chen po myed do// snying rje chen po myed do// sangs
65b5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myed do// de la rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myed do// lan cig phyi/ ra 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras
65b6('bum): bu myed do// dgra bcom pa nyid myed do// rang byang chub myed do// de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myed do// /
65b7('bum): dam pa bam po bzhi'o// / gang la gzugs myed pa dang / tshor ba myed pa dang / 'du shes myed pa dang /
66a1('bum): 'du byed myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / gang la myig myed pa dang / rna ba myed pa dang / sna myed pa dang / lce myed pa dang / lus myed pa dang /
66a2('bum): myed pa dang // gang la gzugs myed pa dang / sgra myed pa dang / dri myed pa dang / ro myed pa dang / reg myed pa dang / chos myed pa dang // gapa la myig gi rnam par shes pa myed
66a3('bum): pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed
66a4('bum): pa dang / gapa la myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / sna'i 'du sa te reg pa myed pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa
66a5('bum): dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i myed pa dang / gang la myig gi/ 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang /
66a6('bum): pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
66a7('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / gang la sa'i khams myed pa dang / chu'i khams myed pa dang / mye'i khams myed pa dang
66a8('bum): rlung gi khams myed pa dang / nam mkha'i khams myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa dang / gapa la ma rig pa myed pa dang / 'du byed myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa
66b1('bum): myed pa dang / mying dang gzugs myed pa dang / skye mched drug myed pa dang / reg pa myed pa dang / tshor ba myed pa dang / sred pa myed pa dang / lend pa myed pa dang / sred pa myed pa dang /
66b2('bum): skye ba myed pa dang / rga shi myed pa dang / gang la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang
66b3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang // gang la nang stong pa nyid myed
66b4('bum): pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid myed pa dang phyi nang s+ho// papa nyid myed pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa / pa/ chen po stong pa nyid myed pa dang / don dam pa
66b5('bum): stong pa nyid myed pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed pa dang / mthal las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / thog ma
66b6('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
66b7('bum): nyid myed pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid myed pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa
66b8('bum): dang / gang la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams myed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed pa dang / dbang po rnams myed pa dang / stobs
67a1('bum): rnams myed pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa dang // gang la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed pa
67a2('bum): dang / gang la bsam gtan rnams myed pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed pa dang / gang la rnam par tha rad pa brgyad myed pa dang /
67a3('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myed pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
67a4('bum): myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams myed pa dang / ga zungs kyi sgo rnams myed pa dang / ga la de ba zhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed pa dang / myi 'jigs
67a5('bum): pa rnams myed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rna mas myed pa dang / byams pa chen po myed pa dang / snying rje chen po myed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
67a6('bum): bco brgyad myed pa dang / gang la rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myed pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed pa dang / dgra bcom pa
67a7('bum): nyid myed pa dang / rang byang chub sbed pa dang / gang la thams cad shes pa nyid myed pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myed pa
67a8('bum): de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod cing /
67b1('bum): sems can phyind ci log tu gyurd pa rnams sems can gyi 'du shes las 'grel pa te/ gzugs kyi 'du shes las 'grel to// gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes las 'grel to// zag pa dang
67b2('bum): banas pa'i chos can thams cad kyi bar las 'grel to// gang zag myed pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang
67b3('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang
67b4('bum): rnam par thar da pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin dmas cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
67b5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa ba zhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
67b6('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag kyang / de la don dam pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de lta bu ma yin te/ 'di ltar 'dus ma byas pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed
67b7('bum): pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/ de la bdag myed do// sems can myed do// srog myed do// skye ba po myed do// gsol
67b8('bum): byed do// skyes bu myed do// gang zag myed do// shed can myed do// shed bdag myed do// byed pa po myed do// tshor ba mo myed do// shes pa mo byed do// mthong ba po myed do// gzugs myed do//
68a1('bum): tshor ba myed do// 'du shes myed do// 'du byed med do// rnam par shes pa myed do// myig myed do// na ba rjed do// sna myed do// lce myed do// lus myed do// yid
68a2('bum): myed do// gzugs myed do// sgra myed do// dri myed do// ro myed do// reg myed do// chos myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed do// snal
68a3('bum): rnam par shes pa myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te
68a4('bum): reg pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed do// lce'i 'a dus te reg pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do// myig gi 'dus
68a5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba myed do// sdo'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg par
68a6('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor pa byed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// sa'i khams myed do// chu'i khams med do//
68a7('bum): lce'i khams myed do// rlung gi khams myed do// nam mkha'i khams myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams myed do// ma rig pa myed do// 'du byed myed do// rnam par shes pa myed ngo //
68a8('bum): myang dang gzugs myed do// skye mched drug myed do// reg pa myed do// tshor ba myed do// sred pa myed do// lend pa myed do// srid pa myed do// skye ba myed do// rga shi myed do// sbyin
68b1('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha
68b2('bum): rol tu phyind pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// nang stong pa nyid myed do// phyi stong pa nyid myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed do//
68b3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed do// thog ma dang tha
68b4('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed do// chos thams cade stong pa nyid myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed
68b5('bum): do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed do// dngos po myi da pa stong pa nyid myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do//
68b6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed do// dbang po rnams myed do// stobs rnams myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnaMs
68b7('bum): myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed do// bsam gtan rnams myed do// tshad myed pa rnams myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyos
68b8('bum): par 'jug pa rnams myed do// rnam par thard pa brgyad myed do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myed do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang
69a1('bum): smon pa myed pa myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams myed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myed do//
69a2('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myed do// byams pa chen po myed do// snying rje chen po myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myed do// myi
69a3('bum): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis myed do// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu myed do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i
69a4('bum): 'bras bu myed do// dgra bcom pa nyid myed do// rang byang chub myed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myed do// byang
69a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni gzhan du na rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su shes pa las lam gyi don tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug
69a6('bum): pa myed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid de yang snga nas kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid phyin cad kyang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid bar du yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de/ de nam yang rang
69a7('bum): bzhin gyis myi stong pa ma yin no// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sems can du 'du shes pa'i
69a8('bum): sems can rnams kyi sems can gyi 'du shes yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod do// de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste nyan thos
69b1('bum): kyi lam dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' lam dang / lam thams cad la spyod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs
69b2('bum): par byas sems can rnams yongs su smyind par byas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/ tshe'i 'du byed byin kyis brlabs te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
69b3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di lta re/ sangs rgyas
69b4('bum): kyi tshul rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rgyun myi gcod do// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
69b5('bum): gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// ma 'ongs pa'o dus na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig
69b6('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtend gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed
69b7('bum): cig bzhugs shing 'tsho spong ba de dag gi/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di la ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ma gtogs par
69b8('bum): gzhan las 'jig rten du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad par bya ste/ de la
70a1('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid las yongs su nyam par gyi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa
70a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos thams cad la spyod cing / gzugs kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kya
70a3('bum): gzhan no// tshor ba la yang gzhan no/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'du shes kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'du byed kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
70a4('bum): kyang gzhan mo rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no/ nga bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// myig kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no
70a5('bum): rna ba yang gzhan no rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no sna yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lce yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa
70a6('bum): nyid kyang gzhan no/ lus kyang gzhan no/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// yid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// gzugs kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin
70a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sgra yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dri yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// ro yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
70a8('bum): kyang gzhan no// reg kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ chos kyang gzhan no/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// myig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no//
70b1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan

70b7('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan no//

71a1('bum): gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// so'i khams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// chu'i khams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong

71b8('bum): nyid kyang gzhan mo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan mo// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan mo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang
72a1('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dngos po
72a2('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
72a3('bum): kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang rang bzhin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan no

72a8('bum): kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang
72b1('bum): gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// mngon

72b4('bum): kyang gzhan no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// byam sa pa chen po yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
72b5('bum): gzhan no// snying rje chen po yang gzhan no// rang bzhi na stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
72b6('bum): gzhan no// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
72b7('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang byang chub kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin
72b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//
73a1('bum): zhes bgyi bar rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par 'jug par myi bgyid kyi// gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/
73a2('bum): tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid kyang rang
73a3('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// myig nyid kyang rang
73a4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myig go/ rna ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang ba zhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid kyang rang bzhin

73a6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong
73a7('bum): pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sla'o// de nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid kyang rang bzhin
73a8('bum): stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang reg go// chos nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa
73b1('bum): nyid kyang chos so// / myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin
73b2('bum): stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam

73b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//
73b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// snal 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang
73b7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/
73b8('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong
74a1('bum): pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myig 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang
74a2('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus
74a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg po'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o//
74a4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// yid
74a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o//
74a6('bum): sa'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so//
74a7('bum): mye'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mye'i khams so// rlung gi khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi zhes
74a8('bum): so// nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//
74b1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid kyang rang
74b2('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mying dang gzugs
74b3('bum): nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so// skye mched drug nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg
74b4('bum): pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa
74b5('bum): nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ rang bzhin stongapa nyid kyang sred pa'o// lend pa nyid kyang rang bzhin sto nga pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang le nad pa'o//
74b6('bum): srid pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid kyang rang bzhin stong
74b7('bum): pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o//
74b8('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang
75a1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang
75a2('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu
75a3('bum): phyi nad pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin
75a4('bum): stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nye dado// phyi stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang
75a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin sto pa pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin
75a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong
75a7('bum): pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do//
75a8('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rapa bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang
75b1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid/
75b2('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ya ni rtsal da pam ma nyid kyang na slong pa nyid chos thams
75b3('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong
75b4('bum): pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// myi dmyig/ sa pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// pa bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do/
75b5('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//
75b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//
75b7('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin
75b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid kyang rang bcwa
76a1('bum): stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub
76a2('bum): kyi yan lag rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/
76a3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// / 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
76a4('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// nga bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad myed pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa
76a5('bum): nyid kyang tshad myed pa rnams so// gzugs myed pa'i sgo mas par 'jug pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
76a6('bum): 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par tha rad pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa rnams so// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid
76a7('bum): kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
76a8('bum): pa myed pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid kyang
76b1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzind nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzind rnams so//
76b2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong
76b3('bum): pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa
76b4('bum): nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa/ nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin
76b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
76b6('bum): pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// / rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang
76b7('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//
76b8('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa
77a1('bum): nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang byang chub bo// lam gyi rnam pa shes rnam te gzugs ra
77a2('bum): stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rab 'byor
77a3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid do// zhes bgyi bar spyod pa ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji nas myed
77a4('bum): pa bzhin te/ rab 'byor da gal te gzugs kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ tshor ba yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du
77a5('bum): shes kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ga zhan 'du byed kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nye da kyang gzhan rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/
77a6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan// myig kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sna yang gzhan la/

77b3('bum): kyang gzhan sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi rnam
77b4('bum): par shes pa yang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan// myig gi
77b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ snal 'dus
77b6('bum): te reg pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'du 'a bras bu'o/
77b7('bum): yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gsayid kyi 'dus te g.yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin song pa nyid kyang gan yi
77b8('bum): royang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan rna 'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzha rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzha
78a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mya te gzugs rang

78a7('bum): kyang gzhan reg pa yang gzhan yang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ tshor ba yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sred pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
78a8('bum): le nad pa yang gzhan larang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sred pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ skye ba yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan//
78b1('bum): she yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzham la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
78b2('bum): yang gzhan pa/ rang bzhin song pa nyid kyang ka' na/ bzod pa'i ba la tu rten pa yang gzhan / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ca dgazhan/ rtson 'grus kyi pha rom dun byed pasang gzhan/

80a2('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byord
80a3('bum): gang gi phyir gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed
80a4('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te tshor ba rang bzhin gyi sa stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
80a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor da gang gi phyir tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong pas
80a6('bum): na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
80a7('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
80a8('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor de gang gi phyir 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes rang bzhin
80b1('bum): gyis stong po zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te 'du byed rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig

80b3('bum): bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du byed rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
80b4('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te/ rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na naM/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na
