246b3('bum): 'grus rtsom mo// gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go// gzhan yang bsam gtan la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang
246b4('bum): shes rab sgom mo// gzhan yang shes rab la yang dag par/ skul zhing gzhog go// 'dul lo// rab tu 'god do// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun
246b5('bum): mong du byas shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag parabya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo ste/ stong gsum gyi stong na po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis
246b6('bum): yongs su bkang zhing / dkon mchog gsum la 'bul ba byed kyang / de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing / rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub par gyur cig
246b7('bum): ces bya bar sems skyed do// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi spyan snga 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi mchod rtend kyi drung du lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung
246b8('bum): ba dkrol ba byed kyang / de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du lha rdzas kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par 'byung bar gyurd cig ces bya bar sems bskyed do//
247a1('bum): rab 'byor da gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams lha rdzas kyi spos kyis yongs su bkang zhing / sangs rgyas rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi mchod rtend
247a2('bum): dag la 'bul ba byed kyang de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing / der rtag tu rgyu nad myi 'chad par lha rdzas kyi spos kyid ldang bar gyur da cig ces bya bar sems bskyed do//
247a3('bum): rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos la 'bul bar byed cing / de 'di snyam
247a4('bum): du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing / der bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa dang /
247a5('bum): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du bcas pa'i mnab bsal ro brgyad/ nga ldan pa mngon par grub par gyur gi ces bya bar sems skyed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems
247a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rtend dag la lha rdzas kyi byug pa yongs su 'bul bar byed kyang / de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'das
247a7('bum): bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing / de'i sems can thams cad lha rdzas kyi reg pa dang ldan par gyur da cig ces bya bar
247a8('bum): sems bskyed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du yid kyis bsams bcas kyis yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang ro dang /
247b1('bum): reg dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / sems can thams cad la 'bul zhing / yongs su gtang bar bya'o snyam du sems te/ de de ltar sems pa'i tshe/
247b2('bum): 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
247b3('bum): pa dang / sems can thams cad kyang yid kyis bsams pa tsam gyis yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg yongs su grub par gyu rad cig ces bya bar sems skyed do//
247b4('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang bsam
247b5('bum): gtan dang po la mnyam par gzhag go/ sems can tham sa cad kyang bsam gtan dang po la 'god do// ma la bar ga nyid kyis kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par
247b6('bum): gzhag go/ sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la 'god do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par gzhag go/ sems can thams cad kyang bsam
247b7('bum): gtan gsum pa la 'god do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par gzhag go/ sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'god do// ma la bdag nyid kyis
247b8('bum): kyang byams pa la mnyam par gzhag go/ sems can thams cad kyang byams pa la dgod do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang snying rje la mnyam par gzhag go// sems can thams cad kyang snying rje la
248a1('bum): dgod do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang dga' ba la mnyam par gzhag go// sems can thams cad kyang dga' ba la 'god do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang btang snyoms la mnyam par
248a2('bum): gzhag go// sems can thams cad kyang btang snyoms la 'god do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go// sems can thams cad kyang nam mkha'
248a3('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par gzhog go// sems can thams cad kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la dgod do//
248a4('bum): ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go/ sems can thams cad kyang chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la dgod do// ma la bdag
248a5('bum): nyid kyis kyang 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go// sems can thams cad kya pa 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la 'god do//
248a6('bum): ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dgod do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang yang dag par spong
248a7('bum): ba rnams bsgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams la dgod do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// sems can thams
248a8('bum): cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la dgod do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang dbang po rnams bsgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dbang po rnams la dgod do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang /
248b1('bum): stobs rnams bsgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang stobs rnams la dgod do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang
248b2('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la 'god do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
248b3('bum): dgod do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa bsgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa
248b4('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la dgod do snyam ste/ de de ltar sems pa'i tshe/ de snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
248b5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing / de'i sems can thams cad bsam/ gtan bzhi dang myi 'bral zhing / tshad myed pa bzhi dang myi
248b6('bum): 'bral ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / sngon
248b7('bum): bamyed pa dag dang kyi 'bral bar shog shig ces bya bar sems snyed do// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
248b8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ de nas bsam pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma gyurd kyi bar du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
249a1('bum): 'tshang myi rgya ste/ de bdag nyid kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa yin/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang
249a2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par byed pa yin te/ de bdag nyid kyi lus kyang mdzes pa yin/ sems can gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su smyind par byas pa de dag kyang
249a3('bum): 'di lta ste/ bsod nams kyis yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs mngon par 'grub ste/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
249a4('bum): po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ltar yongs su dag par byed de/ ci nas kyang ngan song gsum du gdags pa'i mying yang myi sri da pa dang / lta ba'i rnam par gdags pa'i mying yang myi
249a5('bum): srid pa dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mu ga du gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / bud myed de/ nga skyes par gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / theg
249a6('bum): pa gnyis su gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed par gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / yongs su 'dzind par gdags pa'i mying
249a7('bum): yang myi srid pa dang / bdag dang bdag gir bya bar gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / bka la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang bar gdags pa'i phyir yang gyi sred pa dang / phyin ci log
249a8('bum): dadu gdags pa'i lce yang kyi srid pa dang / 'bras bur gdags pa'i phyir yang kyi srid cing / gzhan du na sems can de dag 'dod pa bzhin du shing / rlung gis btab pa'am gyi nang gi dngos
249b1('bum): po dag las 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i sgra dang / smond pa myed pa'i sgra dang / myi skye myi 'gag pa'i sgra dang / chos thams cad ngo bo nyid myed pa'i sgra dang
249b2('bum): chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong pa'i sgra 'byung ba dang / chos de dag gi ngo bo nyid ji lta ba bzhin du ngo bo nyid myed pa'i sgra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin
249b3('bum): gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ngo // gang stong pa de la ni mtshan ma myed do// gang la mtshan ma myed pa de la ni smond pa myed do zhes bya bar
249b4('bum): chos bstan pa'i sgra nyin mtshan rgyu nang myi 'chad par 'a gro yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / sdod kyang rung / nyal yang rung ste/ rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bur sangs
249b5('bum): rgyas kyi chos yongs su sbyong ngo // de lta bu'i sang sa rgyas kyi zhing der bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang
249b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la 'jig rtend kyi khams gzhan dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de thams cad legs
249b7('bum): brjod par 'gyur te/ sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan nas thos pa de thams cad kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshes
249b8('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des chos bstan na/ sems can gang yang 'di ni chos so// 'di ni chos ma yin no zhes bya bar the tshom pan myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
250a1('bum): de ni 'di ltar chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni chos ma yin pa gang yang myed de/ thams cad kyang chos so// de la sems can gang myi dge ba'i rtsa bas non pa
250a2('bum): dang sangs rgyas sam/ sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa myi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su 'dzind pa bdag tu lta ba byeng ba nas lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi bar du
250a3('bum): byeng ba rtag pa 'am/ chad pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/ log par 'dzind pas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa la ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin par 'du
250a4('bum): shes pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin pa la ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par 'du she sa pa de dag la ni/ chos ma yin pa la yang chos so zhes
250a5('bum): zerachos la yang chos ma yin no zhes zer da te/ de dag chos la spong bar 'gyur te/ de ltar chos spangs nas/ lus zhig pa'i 'og tu shi nas ngan song dang ngan
250a6('bum): 'gro dang log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag du skye bar 'gyur te/ de lta bu dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
250a7('bum): sangs rgyas shing 'khor ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sems can de dag sdig par lta ba'i rnam pa de dag las rnam par grol te/ de ltar rnam par bkrol nas/ nges pa'i phung por rab tu bkod de/
250a8('bum): der bkod pa rnams phyin cang ngan song du ltung bar myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin te/
250b1('bum): de ltar yongs su sbyangs pas/ sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos sam/ 'jig rten pa las 'das pa'i chos sam/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos sam/ zag pa myed pa'i chos sam/
250b2('bum): 'dus byas kyi chos sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la yang gnas par myi 'gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du nges par 'gyur ro//
250b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u drug cunu bdun no//
250b4('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dra
250b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges shes pa gyi 'am/ ma nges shes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa'
250b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni nges pa ste/ ma nges pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ nyan thos kyi phung po 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi phung po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi phung po 'am/ phung po gang
250b7('bum): du nges pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi phung por nges pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi phung por
250b8('bum): nges pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi phung por nges pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang
251a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges shes bgyi 'am/ 'on tam phyir myi ldog pa nges shes bgyi'am/ 'on tam srid pa tha ma nges shes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
251a2('bum): bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor de sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges pa'o// phyir myi ldog pa ni nges pa'o// srid pa gcig gis thogs pa ni nges
251a3('bum): pa'o// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur ram myi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
251a4('bum): rab 'byor da de ni ma yin te/ rab 'byor da nges pa'i bya/ nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ngan song du myi skye'o// rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems
251a5('bum): brgyad pa'am/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'am/ dgra bcom ba'am/ rang sangs rgyas ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ram
251a6('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems dang
251a7('bum): po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa gtong ba dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa bsgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
251a8('bum): shes rab sgom pa dang kyi dge pa'i chos khams cad spang ba'i don tu gnas pa de ni ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas myed do// lha mo rings por skye ba'i gnas myed do// gapa dge ba
251b1('bum): chos rnams myi spyod pa de lta bur skye ba'i gnas myed do// glen pa dang / drug par 'gyur ba'i yul du skye ba'i gnas myed do// mtha' khob kyi kla klo dang myi srun cing / 'khor bzhi rgyur myed pa'i
251b2('bum): yul du skye ba'i gnas myed do// log par lta ba'i rigs su skye ba'i gnas myed do// gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra myi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgo myi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra myi grag pa de la
251b3('bum): bur skye ba'i gnas sbed do// bya ba ma sten pa'i 'khru srung ba'i gnas med do// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar
251b4('bum): bzung ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phyi nga chub tu lhag pa'i bsam khas/ yang dag par zhug sa pa ni myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod ces bya
251b5('bum): bo'i gnas myed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhang
251b6('bum): tshul dang myi 'dra ba'i gnas su myi skye ba lags na/ gang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyang byol song gi chud du skyes pa'i rabs bstan na/ de'i tshe dge ba'i ma ba de dag gang du mchis
251b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myi dge ba'i las kyis/ byol song gi rgyud du skye ba ma yin gyi lus gang dang gang gis
251b8('bum): sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing / sems can rnams kyi don du yongs su 'dzin dkyang / rab 'byor da de ltar thabs mkhas pas byang chub sems
252a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byol song gi skye gnas su skyes shing / de la la la zhig gsod du 'ongs kyang / bla na myed pa'i bzod pas bdag yongs su gtong zhing / sems can de dag
252a2('bum): la gnod par myi byed pa de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa dag dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dag la song ngam/ rab 'byor da de bas na nam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
252a3('bum): dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi phyir/ bla na mye da pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don tu snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / byol song gi skye gnas
252a4('bum): su skye yang byol song gi skye gnas kyi rgyud kyi nges pas/ myi gos par rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i chos gang la gnas shing
252a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin da/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'
252a6('bum): sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rdzogs par myi bya ba'i dge ba'i chos de lta bu gang yod/ de dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
252a7('bum): ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du dge ba'i chos gang yang yongs su rdzogs par myi
252a8('bum): bya ba myed do// dge ba'i chos gang yongs su rdzogs par ma byas par/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu myed de/
252b1('bum): ni gnas ma yin no// rab 'byor da de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par/
252b2('bum): bya ba la bslab par byaste/ de la bslabs marnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rjes su 'thob bo// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kyang yongs su spong ngo / gsol pa/
252b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos dkar po zag pa ma mchis pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ngan song ngam/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur
252b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas la pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa zag pa myed pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags/
252b5('bum): bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/ de bzhin gshe gas pa ni 'phags shing zag pa myi mnga' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor
252b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pas/ byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags mngon par sprul pa mdzad cing / de mngon bar sprul nas/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad pa de lta bu
252b7('bum): sod dam byed/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la pa/ rab 'byor des de bzhin gshegs pa byol mong gi skye gnas par 'gyur ma
252b8('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pas byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ram/
253a1('bum): gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das des yum lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' nas ladas/ rab 'tho de bzhin du zlang rgyan thams dpa' mams ma /
253a2('bum): pa'i chos zag pa myed pa dang ldan pa yang ched du bsams shing / de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzind te/ lus de dag gis sems can rnams ci rigs ci tshul du yongs su smyind par byed do//
253a3('bum): rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems dgra bcom pas sprul pa mngon par sprul na/ sprul pa des dgra bcom pa'i las byas shing / las des gzhan gyi dge ba skye bar 'gyur ba yod dam/ rab 'byor
253a4('bum): kyis gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te mchis/ so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
253a5('bum): chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa myed pa dang ldan pa yang ched du bsams shing / de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzind te/ ci rigs ci tshul du sems can rnams yongs su smyind par
253a6('bum): byed do// de lta bu'i lus des sdug bsngal du yang myi 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang nyams su myi myong ngo // rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu
253a7('bum): ma las glang po'i gzugs sam/ rta'i gzugs sam/ glang gi gzugs shig bstan nam/ gzhan yang sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs bstan na/ de dag glang po'i gzugs sam/ rta'i gzugs
253a8('bum): sam/ glang gi gzugs sam/ srog chags kyi rigs gzhan dag tu yang 'gyur ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' /
253b1('bum): rab 'byor nga de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chom zag pa myed pa dang ldan pa yang rjed du bsams shing / de lta bu'i sum yongs su 'dzin te/ sum
253b2('bum): dag gis sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor bar 'gyur ba gang yang myed do// rab 'byor da kyis gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
253b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i ye shes zag pa ma mchis pa dang de ltar ldan zhing / lus gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don tu 'gyur ba de dang / de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzind pa
253b4('bum): ni thabs shi nang du mkhas pa ste/ de ni ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po chos dkar po gang dang gang la gnas shing / des
253b5('bum): bu'i thabs mkhas pa bgyid kyang / las de lta bus myi gos par spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol
253b6('bum): tu byind pa la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod de/ thabs mkhas pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i phyogasA re re'i 'jig
253b7('bum): nad kyi khams gang ka'i klud kyi skyem snyed dag tu/ sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang / des de la gang yang reg par 'gyur ba byed do// de ci'i phyir zhem/ ri ni 'di ltar byang chub
253b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang reg par byed pa dang / gang gis reg par bya ba dang / gang la re ga par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gsum po de dag thams cad myi dmyigs te
254a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos gsum po de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la reg par myi byed do// stong pa nyid kyis chos
254a2('bum): gang la reg par myi 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid kyang reg par bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// de ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
254a3('bum): de de la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
254a4('bum): rtse lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gzhan la myi gnas kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'ba' zhig la gnas shing / rnam pa de lta bu'i
254a5('bum): thabs mkhas pa la spyad pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de chos gang she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i khongs su ma chud pa de lta
254a6('bum): bu yod dam/ gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa'i khongs su chos thams cad 'du
254a7('bum): ba lags bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid la ni chos gang yang khongs su chud pa'am/ khongs su ma chud pa zhes bgyi ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab
254a8('bum): 'byor de chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis myi stong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das stong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor da de ste chos thams cad chos
254b1('bum): thams cad kyis stong na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du ma 'dus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de rnam grangs
254b2('bum): des na khyod kyis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / de lta bu'i thabs la mkhas pa la spyod par rig par bya'o//
254b3('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
254b4('bum): la spyod cing / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas te/ mngon par shes pa gang la gnas shing / phyogs bcu la phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung kyi rtse
254b5('bum): ma snyed dag tu 'chi ba dang / 'jig rtend gyi khams de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig pa zhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa de dag la
254b6('bum): bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / chos nyan cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par sgrub pa lags de skad ces gsol
254b7('bum): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces bkalas la to// rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
254b8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo // 'jig rtend gyi khams de dag na
255a1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo // gzhan du na myang dang brdar gdags pa nye bar//
255a2('bum): bzung zhing bstan pa ma gtogs te/ de gdags pa kun kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo // gal te 'jig rtend gyi khams de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis myi stong la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
255a3('bum): dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis myi stong ste/ gdags pa'i rgyud de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis myi stong pa zhig yin na ni/ nyi tshe ba'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de yang stong pa nyi tse pa ma yin no// de'i phyir
255a4('bum): chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ste/ de nyad kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thab sa mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
255a5('bum): spyod cing / mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par sgrub ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing / lha'i myig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / rdzu 'phrul
255a6('bum): gyi rnam pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas dran pa dang / shi 'pho shes pa mngon par sgrub ste/ mngon par shes pa myed par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
255a7('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub
255a8('bum): ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyind par 'dus pa ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag las byang chub yongs su btsal bar bya'o// de tshol ba'i tshe lha'i myig rnam par dag pa kyi las 'das
255b1('bum): pas/ bdag nyid kyis kyang dge ba'i chos thams cad mthong / gzhan yang dge ba'i chos thams cad la sbyor te/ dge ba'i chos de dag la mngon par zhend par 'gyur ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe
255b2('bum): na/ dge ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ stong pa nyid ni gapa la mngon par zhend cing / ro myong bar byed par mngon par zhend par 'gyur ba myed de/ stong pa nyid ni ro myong
255b3('bum): bar byed pa myed do// bam po bcu gsum
255b4('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lha'i myig
255b5('bum): mngon par sgrub ste/ lho'i myig des chos thams dkyang stong pa nyid du mthong ste/ de chos de dag la gnas shing / las mngon par sgrub bo// las mngon par sgrub
255b6('bum): pa des sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sems can nam sems can du gdags par dmyigs pa myed do// de ltar myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
255b7('bum): chen po mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par sgrub ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis mngon par shes pas bya ba'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag byed do// de lha'i myig rnam par
255b8('bum): dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am
256a1('bum): brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab 'am/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ ya bdag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam
256a2('bum): dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
256a3('bum): smon pa myed pa'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad byed pa rnams sam/ gzugs byed po snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par ba rad pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin pa rnams sam
256a4('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sa
256a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis ses
256a6('bum): can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/ sbyin pa byin cig/ phongs pa ni sdug bsngal
256a7('bum): ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar gyi nus na/ gzhan gyi don la ci smos/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la ba// kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/
256a8('bum): phongs pas zi nad kyis non cing / nying sha nyid gyis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi thard par gyur da ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la
256b1('bum): 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don la ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i/
256b2('bum): rnam par sbyind pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtend yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na
256b3('bum): gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can phan tshun
256b4('bum): gnod sems su gyurd pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyurd pa la dge
256b5('bum): ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur pa na/ sems can/ dmyal bar skye ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye
256b6('bum): ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rte nad du skye sa yod kyis de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi ko skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to//
256b7('bum): sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te
256b8('bum): le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du srung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par
257a1('bum): myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/
257a2('bum): sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal te/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par sbyind pa ni sems can
257a3('bum): dmyal ba 'am byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtend yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis
257a4('bum): de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can shes rab 'chal
257a5('bum): pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas bdag gi don kyang bya bar mya nus na/
257a6('bum): gzhan gyi don gce smos te/ de ltar na shes rab 'chal po'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar
257a7('bum): khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da te re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa dag kyi
257a8('bum): sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa dag rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan
257b1('bum): par zhugs pa la spyod pa dag ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/
257b2('bum): khyed chos gang la mngon par zhend par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhend par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen
257b3('bum): pa myed do zhes chos stond te/ rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /
257b4('bum): sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lha'i rgya ka rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis lho bya gas kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de
257b5('bum): dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa'am/ la khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam bsam gtan nam/ shes rab 'am// dran pa
257b6('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phag
257b7('bum): ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam gzugs
257b8('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams sam/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
258a1('bum): stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ 8
258a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can
258a3('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad du chos stond te/ sbyin pa byin cig/ phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos
258a4('bum): kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/ phod sa pas zild kyis non cing nyingad sha nying gis zos te/ ngan
258a5('bum): song gsum las myi tha rad par gyur da ta re/ zhes chos stond to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can pa gang rdza snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag
258a6('bum): tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par sbyind pa ni sems can dmyal
258a7('bum): ba'am byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtend yin te/ de ltar byed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par gyi nus na/ gzhan gdod pa la ci sros te/ de'i phyir
258a8('bum): byed kyis tshul khrims ngam pa'i sems 'ga' cam gyi go zhabs kyang gyi bya'o// byis 'gyod pa can du gyur te zhes chos stond to// sems can lan tshun gnod sems su gyurd pa'i snye
258b1('bum): pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas/
258b2('bum): na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rte nang du skye ba'i gnas kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis
258b3('bum): 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/
258b4('bum): kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci/ smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smyind pa ni sems can dmyal
258b5('bum): ba'om/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtend yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lU na bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan
258b6('bum): gdon par lta tse smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'gra' tsam kyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur pa ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can sems
258b7('bum): g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems gseng ba'i sdug bsngal te/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smind pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/
258b8('bum): byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du yin te/ de de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du srung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par gyi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci spos kyis/ de'i phyir
259a1('bum): khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed
259a2('bum): pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lnga ci smos te
259a3('bum): shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par sbyind pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtend yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi
259a4('bum): go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du grurd ta re zhes chos stond to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can ga/ nga ji snyed pa de dag mya sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod
259a5('bum): pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rtend cing 'brel da/ par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang
259a6('bum): ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la spyod te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed
259a7('bum): chos gang la mngon par zhend par gyurd pa'i chos de dag ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhend par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa myed do zhes chos ston to
259a8('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no//
259b1('bum): de lho'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims so
259b2('bum): bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes raba'am// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam
259b3('bum): dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa
259b4('bum): dang / smond pa myed pa'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par/ 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thard pa' rnams
259b5('bum): sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar da kyis gan sa pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa
259b6('bum): rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i
259b7('bum): chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/
259b8('bum): sbyin pa byin cig/ phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag
260a1('bum): kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/ phongs pas zild kyis non cing nying sho nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi tha rad par gyur da ta re zhes chos ston
260a2('bum): to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya
260a3('bum): bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan po'i rnam par smind pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du yin te/
260a4('bum): de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi sa/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems
260a5('bum): 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// byis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di
260a6('bum): skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyurd pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun
260a7('bum): sems 'khrugs par gyur pa na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug
260a8('bum): pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos nyon te/
260b1('bum): skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par sbyind pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gan
260b2('bum): sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci spos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le mo'i sems 'ga'
260b3('bum): tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems
260b4('bum): g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal te/ gang sems gseng ba'i rnam par sbyin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du yin te/
260b5('bum): de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi sa/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam
260b6('bum): kye go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye
260b7('bum): skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal te/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don la ci smos te/ gang shes rab 'chalang pa'i rnam par smin
260b8('bum): pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam// gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o//
261a1('bum): rgyas 'byod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag kyi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang 'i snyed pa de dag byams pa
261a2('bum): la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag/ rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi
261a3('bum): lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/ khyed chos gang mngon par zhe nad par gyur pa'i chos de dag mi ngo bo nyid kyis
261a4('bum): stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhend par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen/ pa myed do zhes chos stonang to// rab 'byor da de sngar
261a5('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don
261a6('bum): byed pa yin no// de lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis kyang / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing
261a7('bum): sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab 'am// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams pa
261a8('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong /
261b1('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thard pa rnaMs
261b2('bum): sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par
261b3('bum): rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis ses
261b4('bum): can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi byu byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de ga la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig phongs
261b5('bum): pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar
261b6('bum): gyis shig/ gzham yang bde bar gyis shig/ phongs pas thal kyis non cing nyid sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las kyi ba rad par gyurd ta re zhes chos stonang to// sems can tshul
261b7('bum): khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus
261b8('bum): na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smyind pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed
262a1('bum): ngan song gsum du spur na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs
262a2('bum): kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la ci
262a3('bum): gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyu rad pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas ma khyed phan tshun du sems 'khrug par gyur pa na/ sems can dmyal
262a4('bum): bar skye ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtenang du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs
262a5('bum): kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyed pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le
262a6('bum): lo na sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi dom ga ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smind pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam
262a7('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rtend yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le mo'i sems 'ga'
262a8('bum): tsas kyi go skabs kyang gyi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du mu ring tar zhes chos gonang to// sems can sems gseng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chom gon date/ kye skyes bu
262b1('bum): ngag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal te/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyind pa'i sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtend yin te/ de ltar khyed
262b2('bum): ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci spos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod
262b3('bum): pa can du gyu rad ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'tshal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal te/ shes rab
262b4('bum): 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na// gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam pa ra smind pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi
262b5('bum): skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtend yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyigo/ skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur pa ta
262b6('bum): re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag myi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji
262b7('bum): snyed pa de dag rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/
262b8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhend par gyur da pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams
263a1('bum): la ni mngon par zhend par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa myed do zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
263a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lta'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis byang
263a3('bum): shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam
263a4('bum): gtan nam/ shes rab 'am// dran pa nye bar ga/ zhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/
263a5('bum): stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par tharadang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smonang
263a6('bum): pa myed pa'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thard pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams sam/
263a7('bum): mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi
263a8('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems
263b1('bum): can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig/ phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang
263b2('bum): bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/ phongs pas zi lad kyis non cing nying
263b3('bum): nyid gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las kyi ba rad par gyurd ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa cam gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston t+te/ kye skyes bu dag
263b4('bum): tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ gang tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par
263b5('bum): sbyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtend yin te/ de lta ra byed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon
263b6('bum): par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos
263b7('bum): hond to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par
263b8('bum): gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur da na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/
264a1('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas ma khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi ko skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur pa ta re zhes
264a2('bum): chos stond to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan
264a3('bum): gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag
264a4('bum): cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smo sa kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du
264a5('bum): gyur da ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can sem/ sa g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos s+ho/ nad te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug
264a6('bum): bsngal te/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smind pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtend yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du
264a7('bum): lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du
264a8('bum): gyurd ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal te/ shes rab
264b1('bum): 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin
264b2('bum): rje'i 'jig rten nga yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyurd ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa
264b3('bum): can gang ji snyed pa de dag kyi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa cam gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang je snyed pa de dag rtend cing 'brelang par 'byung ba
264b4('bum): sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pade dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi sa ma 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas
264b5('bum): kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhend par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong
264b6('bum): ba'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhend par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa byed do zhes chos stond to// rab 'byor da de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
264b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu mi nud pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa gyi las 'das pa
264b8('bum): de nyid kyis/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams thams cad mtho / de re dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am brtsom
265a1('bum): 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab 'am// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang
265a2('bum): po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
265a3('bum): smond pa myed pa'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad mye da pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar dpa' rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnaMs
265a4('bum): sam/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mya 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa
265a5('bum): rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sa ma/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas
265a6('bum): kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/ sbyin pa byin cig phongs pa ni
265a7('bum): sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci spos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang bde
265a8('bum): bar gyis shig/ phongs pas zild kyis non cing nyid sha nyid kyis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi tha rad par gyur da ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de
265b1('bum): dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/ kye skyes yu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mye nus ma/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims
265b2('bum): ngan pa'i rnam par smyind pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten de yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus
265b3('bum): na gzhan gdond par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos stond to// sems
265b4('bum): can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur da pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de skar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur
265b5('bum): pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de ste/ bas na byed pan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur dan/ se mas can dmyal bar skye ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas
265b6('bum): sra skye ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig te nang du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsas kyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos
265b7('bum): stond to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi ngon
265b8('bum): wA ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol long gi sgo gnas sam/ gzhon rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhungs/ bdag can
266a1('bum): kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes
266a2('bum): chos stonang to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal te/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa
266a3('bum): ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par
266a4('bum): lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i semasa'aga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mya dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can shes
266a5('bum): rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdugabasngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don
266a6('bum): kyang bya bar m+b+hi nus na/ gzhan gyi don la ci smos te/ gang shes rab 'tshal dra pa'i rnam par sbyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/
266a7('bum): de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsas kyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyurd ta re zhes chos ston deto// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa
266a8('bum): de dag myi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam
266b1('bum): ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos ston
266b2('bum): te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhend par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhend par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par
266b3('bum): zhend pa myed do zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas
266b4('bum): shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams thams
266b5('bum): cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab 'am/
266b6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/

266b8('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par tha dad pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa/

267a7('bum): gi skye gnas sam/ kAshin rje'i 'jig rten du yin te/ de skar byed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par sna ci spos kyis/ de'i phyir khrid
267a8('bum): kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' nas kyi go skabs kyang kyi 'bye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ter zhes chos gnod to// sems can pam chum gnod sems su gyu da pa yim
