271a5('bum): kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smosate/ le lo'i rnam par smyind pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am
271a6('bum): byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtend yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du spyad na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci spos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed
271a7('bum): kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur pa ta re zhes chos stonang ngo // sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos bcom
271a8('bum): te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal te/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smind pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/
271b1('bum): de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mya dbye'o//
271b2('bum): phyis 'gyod pa can du gyu rad ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos stond to// kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal te/
271b3('bum): shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smyind pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/
271b4('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyu ra ta re zhes chos stond to//
271b5('bum): 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag myi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang rdza
271b6('bum): snyed pa de dag rten de cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa'i spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam
271b7('bum): 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos stonang te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhend par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong ba'i chos
271b8('bum): rnams la ni mngon par zhend par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa myed do zhes chos stonang to// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
272a1('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no//
272a2('bum): bam po bcu drug
272a3('bum): de lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam
272a4('bum): bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab 'am/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul
272a5('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 2phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ rnam par
272a6('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam
272a7('bum): rnam par tha da pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams
272a8('bum): sam so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam
272b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / de sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/ sbyin pa byin cig/
272b2('bum): phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan
272b3('bum): yang bde bar gyis shig/ phongs pas zild kyis non cing nyid sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi tha rad par gyur da ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa
272b4('bum): de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas/ ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don la
272b5('bum): ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song
272b6('bum): gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par gyi nus ma/ gzhan gdon par sa ci spos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// byis 'gyod
272b7('bum): can du gyurd ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos stor te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig
272b8('bum): sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de ska bas na byed pan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur dan/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sa
273a1('bum): skye ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rte nang du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'jug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du
273a2('bum): gyur da ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus
273a3('bum): na gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smyind pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na
273a4('bum): bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyise le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa
273a5('bum): can du gyur da ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal te/ gang
273a6('bum): sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par sbyind pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtend yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par
273a7('bum): kyi nus da/ gzhan gdon par gci smos kyis/ de'i phyir byed kyis gsang ba'i sems 'ga' bas kyi goskabs kyang gyi bya'o// kyis 'grod pa ban du mar datu 'o nis chos ston to// bems pa shes
273a8('bum): rab 'tshal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes su dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal te/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mye nus na/ gzhan gyi don
273b1('bum): lta ci smos te/ gang shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smyind pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtend yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i seMs
273b2('bum): 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni myi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can
273b3('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag ni byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam
273b4('bum): la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par
273b5('bum): zhe nad par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhend par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa myed do/
273b6('bum): zhes chos stonang to// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing
273b7('bum): sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams la ma gnas par/ sems can rnams la chos bsam
273b8('bum): bar gyi nus te/ lam gol bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam du gzung bar myi nus so// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ bya mdab ma myed pas ni nam mkha' las 'gro bar gyi
274a1('bum): nus so// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la ma brtend par/ sems can rnams la chos bstan par myi nus so//
274a2('bum): rab 'byor de de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/ de mngon par shes
274a3('bum): pa mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag gis/ sems can rnams kyi don ci bya bar dga' ba de bde bar byed do// des lha'i myig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten dgye khams gang ga'i klung
274a4('bum): kyi bye ma snyed mtho ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed ci ga skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi
274a5('bum): sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun bar sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am
274a6('bum): bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i myig gis so phyogs kyi 'jig rten kyi
274a7('bum): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji skad cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi
274a8('bum): sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'om/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi ga
274b1('bum): 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos stond to// des lha'i myig gis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang gal
274b2('bum): klung gyi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems
274b3('bum): kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/
274b4('bum): shes rab kyi gtam 'am// 'phags pa'i bden pa 'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i myig gis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams
274b5('bum): gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing
274b6('bum): sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam
274b7('bum): 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ des lha'i myig gis byang shar
274b8('bum): gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul
275a1('bum): gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am
275a2('bum): bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam kyi bar du
275a3('bum): chos stond to// des lha'i myig gis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi 'ams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang
275a4('bum): mthong ngo // de ltar mthong na kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dgatu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khod du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam
275a5('bum): 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 2ma/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am// 'phags
275a6('bum): pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i myig gis lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed mthong ste
275a7('bum): de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis 'ong du chud par byas nas/
275a8('bum): de dang 'thun pas sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am
275b1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i myig gis nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed mtho/
275b2('bum): ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par
275b3('bum): byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtama'i
275b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos stond to// des lha'i myig gis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ka'i klung gyi phye
275b5('bum): ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skye sa pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul kyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems
275b6('bum): sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtama'
275b7('bum): shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i myig gis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gri bye ma
275b8('bum): snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud
276a1('bum): par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am
276a2('bum): shes rab kyi gtam 'am// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis 'di lta ste/ lha dang myi gnyis ka'i sgra yang
276a3('bum): thos te/ de shar phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos stond pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te thos nas kyang
276a4('bum): de bzhin nyid du 'dzind to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/
276a5('bum): bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam
276a6('bum): gyi bar du chos stond to// de lho phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gis chos lnga'i
276a7('bum): rna bas nyan te thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzind to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam
276a8('bum): 'am bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam
276b1('bum): gyi bar du chos stond to// de nub phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos stond pa de dag gi chos lnga'i rna bas
276b2('bum): nyan te thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzind to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyir ba'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod
276b3('bum): pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston
276b4('bum): to// de byang phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ang/ sa gang ji snyed cig chos stond pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas
276b5('bum): nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to de bzhin nyid du de bzhin du sems can rnams la chos stond te/ sbyin pa'i gta ma 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam
276b6('bum): 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos stond to//
276b7('bum): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung kyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos stond pa de dag gi chos lnga'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang
276b8('bum): de bzhin nyid du 'dzind to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am brtson
277a1('bum): 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos stond to// de shar lho'/
277a2('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos stond pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin
277a3('bum): nyid du 'dzind to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson
277a4('bum): 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to//
277a5('bum): de lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad sa gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan
277a6('bum): te thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod
277a7('bum): pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'thung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos sgom
277a8('bum): de nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lnga'i rna bas nyan
277b1('bum): te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzind to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod
277b2('bum): pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos stond to//
277b3('bum): de 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos stond pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du
277b4('bum): 'dzind to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhi na nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam
277b5('bum): 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos
277b6('bum): ston to// de steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang gA'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos stond pa de dag gi chos lha'i rnabs nyan te thos nas/
277b7('bum): de bzhin nyid du 'dzind to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos stonod te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am brtsod 'grus
277b8('bum): kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos stonang to// de sems kyi rnam grangs
278a1('bum): shes pa shi nang tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des sems can rnams kyi sems shes par byas shing / de dag la de bzhin nyid du chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i//
278a2('bum): gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam
278a3('bum): 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos stond to// de bdag gam gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su dran te/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa des sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
278a4('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan 'di zhes bya ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byung ngo zhes bya bar yang shes te/ sems can sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la mos pa
278a5('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag la yang dag pa nyid du chos stond te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzodapa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam
278a6('bum): gtan kye gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos stonod to// de rdzu 'phrul gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rte nad gyi khams
278a7('bum): gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed de/ bsnyen bkur byas nas/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis sems can rnams la chos ston te/
278a8('bum): sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i
278b1('bum): gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos stond to// de zag pa myed pa'i mngon tu bya ba'i shes pa shi nang tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de zag pa myed pa'i mngon tu bya ba'i shes pa shi nang tu
278b2('bum): rig pa des sems can rnams la chos stond te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi kata ma 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi
278b3('bum): gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
278b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par ba sgrub par bya ste/ de mngon par shes pa'i shin tu 'dris pa ra/ ngag gis lus ci dang ji lta bu yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa de
278b5('bum): dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su bzung zhing / mos pa ji ltab bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal de dag gis gos par myi 'gyur ro/
278b6('bum): rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i skyes bu ni dgos pa thams cad byed kyang / bde ba'am sdug bsngal des lagos par 'gyur ba byed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin
278b7('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / mngon par shes pas rnam pa che zhing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung kyi bye ma
278b8('bum): snyed dag tu mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos stond kyang bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal des 'phrogs par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
279a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse bar bya ste/ ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de ltar
279a2('bum): brtse bar bya ste/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smyind par ma byas par/ bla na myed pa yang dag
279a3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus so// rab 'byor da de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam gyi yan lag dang myi ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bla na
279a4('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myed do// rab 'byor da kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi yan lag yongs su
279a5('bum): rdzogs par bgyis shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyu ra ba'i lam de dag gang lags// bcom ldan 'das
279a6('bum): kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor de dge ba'i chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam gyi yan lag go// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lam gyi yan lag gang
279a7('bum): gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos de dag gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal sa la dpa
279a8('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni sbyin pa'o//
279b1('bum): 'di la yongs su gtang bar bya'o// bdag gis sbyin par bya'o zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di
279b2('bum): rmi lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe/ ngo bo
279b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni tshul khrims so// bdag gis tshul khrims bsrung ngo // 'di'i don tu tshul khrims srung ngo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang gis
279b4('bum): bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos bzod pa'o/
279b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing bzo da pa sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni bzod pa 'o// bdag gis bzod pa bsgom mo// 'di na tu yo/ bsgom
279b6('bum): bar bya'o zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//
279b7('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / de brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni brtson 'grus//
279b8('bum): so// bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsam mo// 'di'i don tu brtson 'grus brtsam mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol
280a1('bum): zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod kyang / de
280a2('bum): la myi rtog cing de bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni bsam gtan no// bdag gis bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go// 'di'i don tu bsam gtan la
280a3('bum): mnyam par gzhag go zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa des bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i
280a4('bum): chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzlang ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod kyang de la rgyartog cing shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
280a5('bum): 'di ni shes rab bo// bdag gis shes rab bsgom mo// de'i don tu shes rab bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog/ pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang gis bdag
280a6('bum): kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos nang stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la gyi rtog
280a7('bum): cing nang stong pa nyid spros pa'i tshe ngobo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di na ning stong pa nyid do// bdag gis nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag sa kyi
280a8('bum): rtog pa ste/ nang stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ze/ dge ba'i chos kyi
280b1('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid do// bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu phyi stong pa nyid bsgom
280b2('bum): mo zhes gsum po de dag la mye rtog pa ste/ phyi stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'do na lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa
280b3('bum): nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do// bdag gis phyi
280b4('bum): nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu phyin pa stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /
280b5('bum): gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog
280b6('bum): cing stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du stong pa nyid stong pa
280b7('bum): nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi tog pa ste/ stong bu nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni sem gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems pa
280b8('bum): po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos chen po stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid do//
281a1('bum): bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du chen po stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ chen po stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing
281a2('bum): gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i//
281a3('bum): tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/
281a4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos 'dus
281a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid
281a6('bum): bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la gyi rtog pa ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yam
281a7('bum): lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
281a8('bum): 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la gyi rtog pa ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid/
281b1('bum): gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
281b2('bum): la spyod kyang de la gyi rtog cing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/
281b3('bum): 'di'i don tu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi
281b4('bum): yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa denas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos thog ma dang tha ma myed pa/ stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi tog cing / thog ma dang tha ma byed
281b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'dra ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis thog dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don
281b6('bum): shu thog ma dang ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam
281b7('bum): gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge pa'i chos dor bskyed pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi tog cing dor ba byed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
281b8('bum): kyi phyir 'di ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu dor bamyed pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ dor ba myed pa stong
282a1('bum): pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos
282a2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//
282a3('bum): 'di'i don tu rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan
282a4('bum): lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa na sa nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos chos thams cad la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing / chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/
282a5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do bdag gis chos thams da bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la
282a6('bum): myi rtog pa ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar
282a7('bum): bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do//
282a8('bum): bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdas
282b1('bum): kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de
282b2('bum): la myi rtog cing / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'da'i don tu
282b3('bum): mya dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge
282b4('bum): ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i
282b5('bum): tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsgo ma par bya'o// 'di'i don dutu dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsgo
282b6('bum): mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po
282b7('bum): bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'din ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//
282b8('bum): bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /
283a1('bum): gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog
283a2('bum): cing / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bdag gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//
283a3('bum): 'di'i don tu dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba
283a4('bum): 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
283a5('bum): bzhi la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag/ pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'dir ga ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// bdag gis dran
283a6('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las
283a7('bum): sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos
283a8('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so// bdag gis yang dag par
283b1('bum): spong ba rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ yang dag par spong ba gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang
283b2('bum): sgrol pa 'di ni sam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod kyang des kyi
283b3('bum): rtog cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu rdzu 'phrul
283b4('bum): byi rkang pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba la sa sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag
283b5('bum): dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos dbang po lnga la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing /
283b6('bum): dbang po lnga sgom pa'i / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag mi dbang po rnams so// bdag gis dbang po rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'da'i don tu dbang po rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag sa kyi rton
283b7('bum): ba ste/ dbang po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgros zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni sem gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems
283b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos stobs lnga la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / stobs rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni stobs rnams so// bdag gis stobs rnams
284a1('bum): bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu stobs rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ stobs gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni
284a2('bum): lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod kyang de
284a3('bum): la myi rtog cing / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bdag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom par
284a4('bum): bya'o// 'di'i don tu byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan
284a5('bum): yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos 'phags
284a6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o//
284a7('bum): bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ 'phags pa'i lam
284a8('bum): yan lag brgyad pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub
284b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la mya rtog cing / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni 'phags
284b2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams so// bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ 'phags pa'i
284b3('bum): bden pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
284b4('bum): dpa' chen po 'idage ba'i chos bsam gtan bzhi la spyod kya ngade la myi rtog cing / bsam gtan rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni bsam gtan
284b5('bum): rnams so// bdag gis bsam gtan rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu bsam gtan rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ bsam gtan gang
284b6('bum): gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
284b7('bum): chen po'i dge ba'i chos tshad myed pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / tshad myed pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni tshad myed pa rnams so// bdag gis tshad myed pa rnams
284b8('bum): bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu tshad myed pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ tshad myed pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan
285a1('bum): lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod
285a2('bum): kyang de la myi rtog cing / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bdag gis gzum
285a3('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
285a4('bum): par 'jug pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i tshe sa so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/
285a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i chos rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
285a6('bum): kyi phyir 'di dag ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad do// bdag gis rnam par tha rad pa brgyad bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu rnam par tha rad pa brgyad bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ rnam
285a7('bum): par tha rad pa brgyad gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
285a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / mthard kyis gnas pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid
285b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bdag gis mthar dkyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu mthar da kyis
285b2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol
285b3('bum): ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
285b4('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa sgom pa'i tshe/
285b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rnam par thard pa'i sgo ste/ nga pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'o// bdag gis rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
285b6('bum): ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/
285b7('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa gang gas bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//
285b8('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / mngon par shes pa rnams sgom pa'o/
286a1('bum): tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams so// bdag gis mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom
286a2('bum): mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ mngon par shes pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang
286a3('bum): po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / ting nge 'dzind rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong
286a4('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzind rnams so// bdag/ gis ting nge 'dzind rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu ting nge 'dzind rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag
286a5('bum): la myi rtog pa ste/ ting nge 'dzind gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi ya na lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye
286a6('bum): bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di
286a7('bum): ngag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ gzungs kyi sgo gang gis
286a8('bum): bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
286b1('bum): dge ba'i chos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
286b2('bum): rnams so// bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs
286b3('bum): pa'i stobs gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sa
286b4('bum): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod kyu pa/ de la myi rtog cing / myi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni myi 'jigs pa rnamaso
286b5('bum): bdag gis myi 'jigs pa bsgom par bya'o// 'di'idon tu myi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag/ la myi rtog pa ste/ myi 'jigs pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor
286b6('bum): ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos
286b7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// bdag
286b8('bum): gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa gang gis
287a1('bum): bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang /
287a2('bum): chen po'i dge ba'i chos snying rje chen po la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / snying rje chen po la sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni snying rje chen po'o// bdag gis snying rje chen po bsgom par bya'o//
287a3('bum): 'di'i don tu snying rje chen po bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ snying rje chen po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//
287a4('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing /
287a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi tshe sa ma 'dres pa rnams so// bdag gis sangs rgyas
287a6('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mya rtog pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gang gis bdag kyang
287a7('bum): 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// rab 'byor de dge ba'i chos de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na myed pa yang dag
287a8('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ste/ lam des 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can tshad myed pa ded de/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtshol
287b1('bum): las rgal bar gyur pa dang / rgal ba dang / rgal bar 'gyur ba ste/ lam de yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par
287b2('bum): byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can rnams kyi don byed do//
287b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug cu brgyad pa'o//
287b4('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ga la te chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos lags na/ sangs
287b5('bum): rgyas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor da gang 'di skad du gal te chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi
287b6('bum): chos gang yin zhes zer ba ni rab 'byor nga sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang de dag nyid rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar zad de/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas/ bag chags kyi
287b7('bum): mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yongs su spong ngo // de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
287b8('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad skad gcig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
288a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyad par de yod do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ zhugs pa yang /
288a2('bum): gzhan la/ 'bras bu la gnas pa yang gzhan te/ de gnyis ka yang 'phags pa'i gang zag ma yin zhes myi bya'o// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bar
288a3('bum): tshad myed pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad la sgrib pa myed pa'i ye shes brnyes pa ste/ rab 'byor da de ni byang chub
288a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyad par ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/
288a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos de dag la 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'o// 'di ni byol
288a6('bum): song gi skye gnas pa'o// 'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rtend pa'o// 'di ni lnga'o// 'di ni mya'o// 'di ni rigs kyi sa'o// 'di ni brgyad pa'o// 'di ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig
288a7('bum): 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
288a8('bum): sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi bar khyad par dang rnam par dbye bar ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang zag de dag dmyigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyang dmyigs su ma mchis/ las
288b1('bum): ji ltar dmyigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ las kyi rnam par smyind pa la yang dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin
288b2('bum): ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la las dang / las kyi rnam par smind pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga gang gis rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong
288b3('bum): ba'i chos thams cad de ltar ma shes pa de dag ni ngan par spyad pa 'am/ legs par spyad pa 'am/ myi g.yo ba'i las mngon par 'du byed de/ de dag ngan par spyad pa'i las kyis ngan song gsum du lhung ngo ngo/
288b4('bum): legs par spyad pa'i las kyis lha dang myir skye'o// nyams pa myed pa'i las kyis gzugs kyi khams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i khams su skye'o// de la byang chub sems dpa/
288b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyad/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
288b6('bum): pa la spyad/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad// nang stong pa nyid la spyad/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyad/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad/ stong pa nyid
288b7('bum): stong pa nyid la smad/ chen po stong pa nyid la spyad/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad/ 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid la spyang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad
288b8('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la s+yad/ mya

293a1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshechos de dag ci nas kyang

295a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa la ni bgyi ba gang yang ma mchis te/ bgyi ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba'am
