318b7('bum): du byed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzung du myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzung du myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzung du myed
318b8('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha ro la du phyi nang pa yang gzung du med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyi nang pa yang gzung du byed do// nang stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzung
319a1('bum): du myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang
319a2('bum): gzung du myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do// thog su
319a3('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed
319a4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do// myi dmyi gas pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do// ngo bo nyid stong
319a5('bum): pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do// dran pa nye bar ga zhag pa rnams kyang gzung du myed do// yang dag par
319a6('bum): spong ba rnams kyang gzung du myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzung du myed do// dbang po rnams kyang gzung du med do// stobs rnams kyang gzung du myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang
319a7('bum): gzung du myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sang gzung du med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzung du med do// bsam gtan rnams kyang gzung du byed do// da kyi
319a8('bum): rnams kyang gzung du myed do// gzugs sred pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzung du byed do// rnam par ba dad pa rnams kyang gzung du myed do// mthar dkyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
319b1('bum): rnams kyang gzung du myed do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang gzung du med do// mngon par shes pa rnams gzung du myed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams
319b2('bum): kyang gzung du myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzung du myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzung du myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzung du myed do// so so yang dag par
319b3('bum): reg pa rnams kyang gzung du myed do// snying rje chen po yang gzung du myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzung du myed do// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
319b4('bum): chos thams cad gzung du myed par shes par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don tu gnyerd to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni gzung du
319b5('bum): myed cing dngos po myed pa ste/ rmyi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ myig yor lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu// sprul pa lta bu ste/ sems can rnams kyis chos
319b6('bum): de dag ma shes/ ma mthong ba ma gtogs par gzung du myed pa'i chos gang yang thob par myi nus pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi
319b7('bum): don du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/ de sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa gang ci gtong yang sems can thams cad kyi don du gtong /
319b8('bum): tshul khrims gang ci srung yang sems can thams cad kyi don tu srung ngo // bzod pa gang ci sgom yang sems can thams cad kyi don tu sgom mo// brtson 'grus gang ci rtsom yang sems can thams
320a1('bum): cad kyi don du rtsom mo// bsam gtan gang rmil mnyam par gzhog kyang / sems can thams cad kyi don tu mnyam par gzhog go/ shes rab gang ci sgom yang sems can rnams
320a2('bum): kyi don tu sgom ste/ bdag gi don tu ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
320a3('bum): tu myi 'jug ste/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gang sems can myed pa la sems can gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / bdag myed pa la bdag gi 'du shes su gnas
320a4('bum): pa dang / srog myed pa la srog gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / 'gro ba myed pa la 'gro ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / gso ba myed pa la gso ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / skyes
320a5('bum): bu myed pa la skyes bu'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / gang za ga myed pa la gang zag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shed can myed pa la shed can gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang /
320a6('bum): shed bdag myed pa la shed bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang byed pa po myed pa la byed pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / byed du 'jug pa po myed pa la byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas
320a7('bum): pa dang / song ba po myed pa la slong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / srong du 'jug pa po myed pa la sdong du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / tshor ba po myed pa la tshor ba po'i 'du shes su
320a8('bum): gnas pa dang / tshong du 'jug pa po myed pa ma chor du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shes pa po myed pas shes pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / mthong ba po myed pa la mthong ba
320b1('bum): po'i 'du shes su gnas pa de dag phyi nad ni log las rnam par 'grel te/ phyi na ci log las rnam par bkrol zhing 'chi ba myed pa'i dbyings su 'god do// de la bkod nas rgyu ba 'di dag yongasu
320b2('bum): mya rgyu ste/ bdag gi 'du shes sam/ sems can gyi 'du shes sam/ srog gi 'du shes sam/ 'gro ba'i 'du shes sam/ gso ba'i 'du shes sam/ skyes bu'i 'du shes sam/ gang zag gi
320b3('bum): 'du shes sam/ shed can gyi 'du shes sam/ shed bdag gi 'du shes sam/ byed pa po'i 'du shes sam/ byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ slong ba po la'i 'du shes sam/ slong du 'jug
320b4('bum): pa po'i 'du shes sam/ tshor ba po'i 'du shes sam/ tshor du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ shes pa po'i 'du shes sam/ mthong ba po'i 'du shes yongs su myi rgyu ste/ de g.yo ba
320b5('bum): dang / rlom sems dang / 'dar ba dang / spros pa 'dir/ ga btang nas/ spros pa myed pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgru/ bas shing mang du spyod de/ rab 'byor de rnam grangs des
320b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag nyid kyang chos gang la yang mdza na bar zhen du pa myed la/ sems can thams cad kyang
320b7('bum): mngon par zhend pa myed pa la rab tu 'god de/ de ni 'jig rtend kyi tha snyad kyi don dam par na ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mngon par
320b8('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de 'jig rtend kyi ba snyad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sam/ ma lags kyi don dam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas
321a1('bum): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba ni 'jig rtend gyi tha snyad du brjod pa ste/ de la chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par
321a2('bum): sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba de lta bu gang yang myi dmyigs ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba ni dmyigs pa ste/
321a3('bum): gnyis kyis ni gang yang thob pa 'am mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba myed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste gnyis kyis thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis
321a4('bum): na gnyis su ma mchis pas thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ram// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ gnyis kyis kyang thob pa dang mngon par
321a5('bum): rtogs par 'gyur ba myed de/ gnyis su myed pas kyang thob pa dang mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba myed do// gang la gnyis kyang myed la myi gnyis pa yang myed
321a6('bum): pa ma thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di ni thob pa'o// 'di ni mngon par rtogs pa'o/ zhes bya ba ni spros pa ste/ chos mnyam pa nyid la smos
321a7('bum): bgyid de/ smos pa skyed pa ni chos mnyam pa nyid do// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos dngos po mamachis pa'i ngo bo nyid rnams la chos kyi mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba sa ga
321a8('bum): zhig mchis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sal dpa/ gang la dngos po myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa yang ma yin pa dang / ngo bo med pa dang / yongs su brjod pa myed pa 'di ni chos mnyam
321b1('bum): pa nyid de/ chos mnyam pa nyid po de ni brjod du myed pa'o// chos mnyam pa nyid ma gtogs par yang dmyigs par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang myed de/ chos mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad las
321b2('bum): rnam par 'das pa'o// / chos mnyam pa nyid ni byis pa'am/ 'phags pa'am/ chos gang gis kyang shes par myi rung zhing yul ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos
321b3('bum): mnyam pa nyid po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yang ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor da chos mnyam pa nyid ni 'phags pa thams cad kyi yul ma yin
321b4('bum): te/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang byang chub 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ de bzhin gshegs
321b5('bum): pa'i yul ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan/ 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog/ sa pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad kyi yul la yang
321b6('bum): sgyur ba ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' lang pa/ rab 'byor da gal te chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
321b7('bum): po'i sangs rgyas kyang gzhan zhig yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sbyar ba sang 'gyur na/ rab 'byor/
321b8('bum): so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rgyu nang tu zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin
322a1('bum): pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ra sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid
322a2('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/ mnyam
322a3('bum): ba nyid dang / myi mnyam pa nyid la bye brag gang yang myed do// de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid
322a4('bum): gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid gcig pa la 'di ni so so skye bo'o// 'di ni rgyu nang du zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan// cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o//
322a5('bum): 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
322a6('bum): so zhes bya bar gnyis su bya ba myed de/ rnam par rtog pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'di
322a7('bum): ni mo so'i skye ba'o// 'di na rgyun du zhugs pa'o// 'di ni len cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni byor mi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub
322a8('bum): sems dpa'o// 'di mi bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so shes bgyi ba'i rnam par rtog pa de dag kyi dmyigs sa/ des ma ma skye bo rnams dang //
322b1('bum): rgyu nang tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang
322b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par ma mchis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no/
322b3('bum): de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnaMs
322b4('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par myed do//
322b5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste chos thams cad mnyam// ba nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa na/ mas dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir
322b6('bum): kyi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de banan gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
322b7('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gsum po de dag 'jig rtenang
322b8('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/ chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te
323a1('bum): dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i
323a2('bum): don 'tshal pa ltar na/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/ chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan pa ma lags kyi
323a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / chos dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gang lags pa de nyid chos mnyam pa nyid de/ chos de dag thams cad
323a4('bum): ni ldan pa yang ma lags pa myi ldan pa yang ma lags/ gzugs ma mchis pa dang / bstand du ma mchis pa/ thogs pa ma mchi sa pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan
323a5('bum): nyid ma mchis pa'o// de ltar chos rnams mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di
323a6('bum): ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangasargyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so
323a7('bum): zhes rnam par dkod par bgyi ba de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi yul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal sa la dra pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams
323a8('bum): rnam par dgod pa ni ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// rab 'byor da de'i snyam du sems/ de ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
323b1('bum): sangs rgyas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir chos rnams rnam par dgod pa ma mdzad na/ sems can dmyal ba yod par mngon dam
323b2('bum): byol song gi skye gnas yod par mngon dam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yod par mngon nam/ myi yod par mngon nam/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lnga yod par
323b3('bum): mngon nam/ mtshe ma'i lha yod par mngon nam/ dga' ldan gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ 'phrul dga'i lha yod par mngon nam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs ris kyi
323b4('bum): lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha yod par mdo na nam/ tshangs pa kund 'khor gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs chen gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ snang ba'i lha yod par mngon
323b5('bum): nam/ chung snang gi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshad myed snang ba'o/ lha yod par mngon nam/ kun snang dang ba'i lha yod par mdo// na nam/ dge ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ chung dge'i
323b6('bum): lha yod par mngon nam/ tshad myed dge ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ dge rgyas kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ chung che'i lha yod par mngon nam/ tshad myed che ba'i
323b7('bum): lha sod par mngon nam/ 'bras bu che ba'i lnga yod par mngon nam/ myi che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ myi gdung ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ shinang tu mthong ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ gya nom snang
323b8('bum): ba'i lha yod par mngon nas/ 'og byin gyi yod par mngon nam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi yod par mngon nam/ rnam shes mthal yas skye mched kyi sna yod par mdzod nam/ chung zad byed pani/
324a1('bum): skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myon skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod par mngon nam/ tshul khrims kyi
324a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa yod par mngon nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa yod par mngon nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa yod par mngon nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa yod
324a3('bum): par mngon nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod par mngon nam// byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yod par mngon nam// nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ phyi stong pa nyid yod
324a4('bum): bar mngon nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ chen po stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon
324a5('bum): nama'adus byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ mtha' las// 'das pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ thog ma dang
324a6('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyi da yod par mngon nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod par/
324a7('bum): mngon nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par
324a8('bum): mngon nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yod par mngon nam
324b1('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ dbang po rnams yod par mngon nam/ stobs rnams yod par mngon nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod par mngon nam/ 'phags pa'i
324b2('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ bsam gtan rnams yod par mngon nam/ tshad myed pa rnams yod par mngon na
324b3('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ rnam par thar da pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ mthar gyis gnas po'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam
324b4('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma mye da pa dang / smond pa myed pa yod par mngon nam/ mngon bar shes pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ ting nge 'dzin
324b5('bum): rnams yod par mngon nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod par mngon nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam sa yod par mngon nam myi 'jigs pa rnams yod pa
324b6('bum): mngon nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ byams pa chen po yod par mngon nam/ snying rje chen po yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam
324b7('bum): yod par mngon nam/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod par mngon nam/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ chos
324b8('bum): dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ dge 'dun dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas
325a1('bum): kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/ theg pa chen po yod par mngon nam/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yod par mngon nam/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yod par mngon nam
325a2('bum): brgyad pa yod par mngon nam// rgyun tu zhugs pa yod par mngon nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par mngon nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba yod par mngon nam/ dgra bcom pa yod par
325a3('bum): mngon nam/ rang sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam/ byang chub sems dpa' yod par mngon nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yod par mngon
325a4('bum): nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos de dag thams cad ni mchis par mngon par myi 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de lta
325a5('bum): bas na de ltar chos mnyam pa nyid las kyang myi g.yo la chos rna mas rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o//
325a6('bum): bam po bcu dgu'o/
325a7('bum): gso yod pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ga de bzhin gshegs pa chos mnyam pa nyid las kyi gso ba de bzhin du so so'i spyi bo rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi gso bsags pas
325a8('bum): bzhin du dang pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las gyi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kya com mnyam pa nyid lam gyi gso pasags sas
325b1('bum): de bzhin du brgyad pa yang chos mnyam pa nyid las kyi gso ba lags sam/ de bzhin du rgyu nang tu zhugs pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las kyi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du lan cig/
325b2('bum): phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi gso ba lags sam/ de bzhin du phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las kyi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du dgra bcom
325b3('bum): ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang /
325b4('bum): chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor da chos thams cad ni chos
325b5('bum): mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo'o// chos mnyam pa nyid las myi 'da'o// rab 'byor da de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di// ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
325b6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nord pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid da pa/ chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos
325b7('bum): kyi gnas nyid dang / chos spros myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de nyid sem ma'i skye bo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nod pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan pa yin pa de bzhin
325b8('bum): nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos spyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mkha' ste/ de nyid ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi bzhin gyi/
326a1('bum): dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon byed pa nyid dang /
326a2('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dpyid
326a3('bum): dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni brgyad pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid
326a4('bum): dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyi da dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// / de nyid ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang
326a5('bum): ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gan sa nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag
326a6('bum): pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa 'i de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang chos
326a7('bum): kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang
326a8('bum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang
326b1('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i ma ba'o// de nyid ni rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi de can
326b2('bum): nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon byed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o//
326b3('bum): de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi
326b4('bum): gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i ma tha' ste/ de dag thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid de las rnam par myi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gi chos nyid
326b5('bum): dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhi// na nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang
326b6('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de nyid yin te/ de dag las chos mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan gang yang myed do// rab 'byor dkyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar so so'i
326b7('bum): skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa/ de nyid dang pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid brgyad pa nas
326b8('bum): kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de nyid rgyu nang tu zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de nyid
327a1('bum): dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa
327a2('bum): nyid do nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid kyi 'dra ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ gzugs
327a3('bum): dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang // myig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang // gzugs dang / sgra dang /
327a4('bum): dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos dang // myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes
327a5('bum): pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te re/ ga pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa da / da/ sA'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te
327a6('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / sde'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis ra ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / lus
327a7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dang /
327a8('bum): sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / rtend cing
327b1('bum): 'bresad par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
327b2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang /
327b3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / stobs kyi pha
327b4('bum): rol tu phyind pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag/ pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /
327b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / s+ho bas rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / pags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags
327b6('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang
327b7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
327b8('bum): thog ma dpa' ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa/
328a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang
328a2('bum): mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
328a3('bum): dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / myi chen po'i mtshan
328a4('bum): sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams te/ bcom ldan 'das chos de dag ni kun kyang gcig dang gcig
328a5('bum): tu myi 'dra ba gcig las gcig 'das pa'o// bcom// ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan la/ tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang
328a6('bum): gzhan/ 'du shes kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan te/ myig gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i chos
328a7('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sgo'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sgra'i chos
328a8('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/ dri'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ro'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ reg gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chos kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang
328b1('bum): gzham rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan sA'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos
328b2('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus
328b3('bum): te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan
328b4('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyi pa gzhan/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
328b5('bum): tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'du// sa te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang
328b6('bum): gzhan yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan// sa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mye'i khams
328b7('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan// ma rig pa'i
328b8('bum): chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mying dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ reg
329a1('bum): pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sred pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lend pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ srid pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ skye ba'i
329a2('bum): chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rga shi'i chos nyid kyang gzhan// 'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ zhe sdang gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gti mug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan lta ba'i rnam
329a3('bum): chos nyid kyang gzhan// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid
329a4('bum): kyang gzhan/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos te da kyang gzhan/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyi dkyang gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i
329a5('bum): chos nyid kyang gzhan// nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid// kyang gzhan/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ stong pa nyid
329a6('bum): sto pa nyid kyi ba nyid kyang gawA/ na mdang pa nyid kyi ma nyid kyang kla'adu/ don ngam pasod pa nyid kyipa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngos nyid kyang gan
329a7('bum): ma dzin ma kya pa /
329b1('bum): bstong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang kazhan/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang
329b2('bum): gzhan// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dbang
329b3('bum): po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang
329b4('bum): gzhan/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzugs myed pa'i
329b5('bum): snyems par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par tha dad pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mtha rad kyi// sa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos
329b6('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par tha rad pa'i ske stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smod pa myed pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan mngon par shes pa 'i rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan
329b7('bum): tring nge 'dzind rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi
329b8('bum): nyinyed kyang gzhan/ so so yang dag par reg pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ byams pa chen po'ichis nyid kyang gzhan/ snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
330a1('bum): pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ myi chen po'i mtshan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dpe byad bzang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang
330a2('bum): gzhan/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan na// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mtshan nyid myi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid gcig par 'gyur ba lags/ ches rnam par dkod
330a3('bum): par ni ji ltar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gang la gnas shing chos rnams pa dad du bgyid pa lags/ chos rnams
330a4('bum): ba dad du ma bgyis par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod par myi nus na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
330a5('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sa nas sar 'phar zhing / skyon myed par/ 'jug pa lags/ ji ltar skyon myed par zhugs
330a6('bum): nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa legs/ lcer mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol
330a7('bum): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bkri ba dang / rdus khrims kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis
330a8('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha'i lang du phyin da pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du mind pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu mind pa yongs su rdzogs
330b1('bum): par bgyi ba dang / de dag la rnam par rtse bas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags
330b2('bum): de dag tu yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lags/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems cam rnams yongs su sbyin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
330b3('bum): kyis bka' sa la pa/ rab 'byor de gang 'di skad du de ste ches thams cad kyi ches mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams
330b4('bum): kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid brkyang pa rnams kyi ches mnyam pa nyid de nyid rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid
330b5('bum): de nyid phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rangs/ ngas rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid byang
330b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam ba nyid/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rma swa rnams kyi chos nyid mnyam pa nyid yim
330b7('bum): mtshan nyid myi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ji ltar mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin
330b8('bum): nas/ tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du shes kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid mi yin nam/ 'du byed kyi ngos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yi
331a1('bum): nam/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ myig gi chos nyid gang sem pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas/ na ba'i chos nyid ka
331a2('bum): yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin dam/ sna'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de
331a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sgra'i chos nyid gang yin pa de
331a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dri'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ro'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ reg gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid
331a5('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chos kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de/ nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ myig gi rnam par she// sa pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/
331a6('bum): nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang na ba de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i rnam par
331a7('bum): shes pa'i chom nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sras kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid gong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang sen
331a8('bum): pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yis nas// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de stong pa nyid ma yin na/
331b1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ spe'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid
331b2('bum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid
331b3('bum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i
331b4('bum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid s+ho/ pa pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i

340a3('bum): lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'du shes thams cad kyis stong ste/ rab 'byor da la la zhig gis sprul pa zhig sprul na/ de la gang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu'i

341b1('bum): pa'i gang zag gis/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid yongs su 'tshal par bgyi na/ ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor da ci sngon

344a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gal te myig gi rnam par shes pa la spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /
344a8('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gal
344b1('bum): te gzugs ni bdag go zhes spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni bdag go/
344b2('bum): zhes spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gal te sa'i khams ni bdag go zhes spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// de bzhin du ka la
344b3('bum): te chu'i khams dang/ mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bdag go zhes myong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la smod pa ma yin no/
344b4('bum): gal te myig ni bdag go zhes spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// de bzhin du gal te rna ba/ dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid ni bdag go zhes spyod
344b5('bum): nashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gal te bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyi nad pa la spyad par bya'o// zhes spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
344b6('bum): spyod pa ma yin no// de bzhin du gal te bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod po'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
344b7('bum): tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad par bya'o zhes spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa
344b8('bum): des ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yin no// byams pa rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod na/ chos gnyis po
345a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa la ku nad tu bsten par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid do//
345a2('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid do// byams pa gang la mtshan ma myed pa de ni chos kyi dbyings te/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
345a3('bum): gshegs pa'o// byams pa de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas chos 'di la bsten par bya ste/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pas ni rnam par rtog pa
345a4('bum): thams cad rab tu spong ba la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa/ sa yang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad
345a5('bum): ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par rtog pa rnams gang las byung / sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ byams pa rnam par rtog pa rnams ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa
345a6('bum): las byung ngo / byams pas smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang las byung / sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ byams pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par
345a7('bum): shes pa las byung ngo // byams pas smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rtsig gi rnam par shes pa gang las byung / byams pa myig gi rnam par shes pa ni gzugs las zung ngo //
345a8('bum): byams pas smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gang las byung / byams pa gzugs ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa las byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa gzu/
345b1('bum): ni don dam par ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ gang don dam par myed par gyur pa'i gzugs de ni brdzun pa/ slu ba'i chos can byas pa'i skye bo rnams 'drid par byed pa yin na/ de la so so'i skye bo zhes pa
345b2('bum): dang myi ldan pa rnams gzugs kyi 'du shes nye bar skye bar 'gyur ro// des de ltar gzugs su mngon par brtags nas/ gzugs la brten te/ myig gi rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro//
345b3('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa de yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rkyenang du gyur da te/ de ni yang dag pa ma yin pas nye bar 'gag par 'gyur ba yin na/ de la byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang myi ldan pa rnams
345b4('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pas 'di ltar bzang ba nyid dang / gzu gas nyid dang / kha dog nyid dang / rgyas pa nyid du nye bar rtog pa ru byed do// de de ltar rnam par rtog pas rgyun myi 'chad
345b5('bum): par 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir// zhe na/ gzugs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma shes pa'i// phyir dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung
345b6('bum): ba yang dag par myi shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa rnams ni/ gzugs gang dang gang mthong ba de nyid thams cad du stong pa nyid du yang dag par mthong ba dang
345b7('bum): gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / snying po myed pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo po/ byams pa de yang dper na/ sgyu ma'i mnyan gyi skyes bu mkhas pa 'am/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma ma
345b8('bum): pas sgyu ma'i las kyis glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnam pa bzhi po nye bar bstan par gyur pa la/ de la skyes bu mkhas pa la
346a1('bum): la zhig gis bltas pa dang / nges par dmyigs pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pas nye bar brtags par gyur do cing / des de mthong ba dang / nges par dmyigs pa dang / tshul
346a2('bum): bzhin nye bar dmyigs pa na/ stong pa nyid yin par stond par byed cing / gsog nyid du stond pa dang / gsob nyid du ston pa dang / snying po myed pa nyid du ston par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
346a3('bum): sgyu mar byas pa de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// byams pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs gang dang gang nye bar snang bar gyurd pa de dang de thams cad stong pa nyid du mthong ngo /
346a4('bum): gsog nyid du mthong ngo po/ gsob nyid du mthong ngo // snying po myed pa nyid du mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// byams pa 'di
346a5('bum): lta ste dper na/ 'ja tshon nam/ dri za'i grong khyer blta na snu ga pa nye bar 'phags par snang bar gyur da pa dag la/ skye/ sa bu la la zhig gis mthong ba dang / nye bar dmyigs
346a6('bum): ba dang / yus bzhin du yid la byed pas nye bar brtags par gyur da la/ des de mthong ba dang / nges par dmyigs pa myed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pas nye bar brtags par gyur pa pa
346a7('bum): na stong pa nyid du ston par byed pa dang / gsog nyid du stod par byed pa dang / gsob nyid du stond par byed pa dang / snying po myed pa nyid du ston par byed do// byams pa de bzhin du byang
346a8('bum): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa dang 'dres par gyu rad pa'i rnam par shes pa gang dang gang dag yin pa de dang de thams cad ni/ byang chub sems dpas stong pa nyid du mthong ba dang gsog
346b1('bum): nyid du mthong ba dang / gsob nyid du mthong ba dang / snying po myed pa nyid du mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de lta na yang gzugs de yongs su ma shes pa'i phyir dang / rnam par rtog pa ku nang tu
346b2('bum): 'byung ba'i 'du shes yongs su ma shes pa'i phyir ro// de de ltar gzugs la mkhas pa dang / 'du shes la mkhas pa ni yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su byang ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang
346b3('bum): ldan par 'gyur zhing / skyon myed pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / nag nog myed pa dang / nges par 'byung ba can dang / byis pa rnams kyi sdom pa las yang dag par 'das pa dang / 'phags pa'i
346b4('bum): sdom pa rnams kyi rjes su yang dag par 'jug pa dang / zag pa myed pa dang / dri ma thams cad dang bral ba dang / gnas// myed par gyur pa yin no// de ltar tshul khrims
346b5('bum): yongs su dag pa de'i sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos sems dang lnga na ba ldan gcig gnas pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad nas/ thams cad du 'byung bar myi 'gyur zhing / nub pa dang /
346b6('bum): yongs su zad pa dang / yongs su gtugs pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems rang nyid kyi dbang du 'gyur gyi/ sems kyi dbang du myi 'gyur ro// de ltar sems la dbang thob pa de'i sems
346b7('bum): gang dang gang skye bar 'gyur ba de dang de thams cad byang chub la gzhol ba dang / byang chub la 'bab pa dang / byang chub la bab par gyurd pa dang / mchog dang khyad par du 'phags pa dang / rgyache ba dang /
346b8('bum): 'od gsal ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems dang ma 'dres pa dang / rgyun gcig tu 'jug pa dang / yid la byed pa gcig dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di lta ste thams cad
347a1('bum): mkhyend pa nyid yid la byed pa yin zhing / de 'dug pa'am/ sdod pa 'am/ 'chag pa 'am/ nyal bar gyur pa na/ yid la byed pa gzhan myed par de'i sems de 'bad pa myed
347a2('bum): par don gyi bya ba thams cad kyis/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la mngon par phyogs par 'gyur ro// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba'i dus la bab par gyur da cing / dus de dang nye
347a3('bum): bar gnas par gyur pa na/ 'bad pa myed par mngal gyi sgor nye bar phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / mngal gyi sgo nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byams pa de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci nas kyang chos
347a4('bum): nyid de la so sor dmyigs pa nyid na/ byang chub sems dpa'i// sems 'bad pa myed par/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ma don par phyogs par 'gyur ro// byams pa
347a5('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa ra gyurd cing / dus de dang nye bar gnas par gyurd pa na/ 'bad pa myed pa nyid kyis srog gi dbang po 'gag pA
347a6('bum): chos can du 'gyur zhing / 'gag pa'i rgyu nad dang / rjes su 'thun pa dang / 'gag pa'i rgyund la gzhol ba dang / 'gag pa'i rgyun la 'bab par 'gyur ro// byams pa de bzhin du byang chub
347a7('bum): sems dpa' de'i sems 'bad pa myed par don kyi bya ba thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la mngon par phyogs par 'gyur ro// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i 'jig rten du
347a8('bum): skye bar 'gyur ba'i las can rnams ni 'bad pa myed par lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// byams pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems 'bad pa myed par don gyi bya ba thams cad kyis
347b1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la mngon par phyogs par 'gyur ro// de ltar sems bskyed kyang mngon par myi shes par skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa de la 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci nas kyang //
347b2('bum): de shes rab kyi stobs dang/ shes rab kyi khyad par gyis byed de/ sems can yongs su smismyind par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs yin no// gang sems can yang nye bar myi
347b3('bum): dmyigs la/ 'khor ba'i nyes pas kyang gos par myi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par yin no// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs dang /
347b4('bum): shes rab kyi khyad par ni ku nad tu spyod pa gnyis mthong ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// ku nad tu spyod/ pa gnyis mthong bas ma gos pa ni shes rab kyi khyad par
347b5('bum): nyan thos kyi nges pa las 'das pa ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs so// de la re ba myed pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// phyi dang
347b6('bum): nang gi bdag nyid can gyi dngos po yongs su spong ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// rnam par sbyin pa la re ba myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// tshul
347b7('bum): khrims kyi sdom pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// de dang ba myi dad pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// khro ba myed pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab
347b8('bum): kyi stobs so// byams pa'i sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// brtson 'grus 'bar ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// yid song
348a1('bum): su sngo ba myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin pa la snyoms par 'jug pa la mkhas pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stob/
348a2('bum): so/ de la mngon par zhend pa myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// shes rab sgom pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sems can dang srog nye bar myi dmyikra
348a3('bum): pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// zhi ba la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sems can la ltos pa myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad
348a4('bum): par ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku yongs su stond pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// chos kyi sku yang dag par stond pa ni byang chub sems
348a5('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sangs rgyas sna tshogs pa nyid du yang dag par stond pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sangs rgyas thams cad sangs
348a6('bum): rgyas gcig nyid du ston pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sangs rgyas kyi mthu sna tshogs pa nyid du ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sangs rgyas/
348a7('bum): kyi mthu gcig pa nyid du stonang pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed par ston pa ni
348a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa myed par stond pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sangs rgyas kyi
348b1('bum): zhing yongs su 'dzind pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su smond pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// byang chub
348b2('bum): sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po yang dag par lend pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// zab mo spyod pa yang dag par ston pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad
348b3('bum): par ro// rtag tu nges par 'byung ba la gnas pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs so// srid pa tha ma pa'i nges par 'byung ba la gnas pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab
348b4('bum): kyi khyad par ro// dbang phyug che ba'i lha'i 'jig rtenang du skyes shing gnas te/ mngon par byang chub pa la sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so//
348b5('bum): byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar yang dag par ston pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// bdud kyi las yongs su shes pa ni byang chub sems
348b6('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// bdud thams cad tshar gcad pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// rtag tu chos kyi 'khor lo legs par sbyor ba nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'
348b7('bum): shes rab kyi stobs so// chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su skor ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag pa nyid nges pa bzhin du shes pa ni byang chu
348b8('bum): sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par stonang pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sgyu ma lta bu'i chos la so sor tog pa ni
349a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// de rnams yang dag par ston pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// zhi ba'i tshul mngon sum du byed pa ni byang
349a2('bum): chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// myi zad pa'i tshul yang dag par stonang pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos mngon sum du byed
349a3('bum): pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// lam de rab tu shes par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi khyad par ro// tshul gcig mngon sum du byed pa ni byang chub sems
349a4('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sna tshogs pa'i tshul ston// pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// nyon mongs pa nye bar myi dmyigs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i/
349a5('bum): shes rab kyi stobs so// nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po rab tu shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// don dam pa mngon sum du byed pa ni byang chub sems
349a6('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// tshig dang yi ge sna tshogs pa gsal bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas tshul gcig tu yang dag
349a7('bum): par stond pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// mtshan nyid sna tshogs pa nyid du ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// byams pa chen po la 'jug pa ni/
349a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sems can rnams la phan 'dog pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// snying rje chen po la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes
349b1('bum): rab kyi stobs so// sems can rnams la bde bar 'dod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// dga' ba chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// rtag tu zhi bar
349b2('bum): rnam par 'phel ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// btang snyoms chen po na byeng chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sems can gyi bya ba rnams la skyo ba myed pa miH
349b3('bum): chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i tshul la gnas pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// gdul bya bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i las byed
349b4('bum): pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// bas ma gyis myi khyab pa'i mngon par 'dus byas pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// mos
349b5('bum): pa sna tshogs pa'i gdul bya rnams 'dul bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// yi ge bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i rjes su stond pa ni byang chub sems
349b6('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// bsam pa dang bag la nyal sna tshogs pa stond par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sgra dbyangs sna tshogs su mngon par ston
349b7('bum): pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sgra skad sna tshogs la mngon par mos pa'i gdul bya rnams 'dul bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// spobs
349b8('bum): pa sna tshogs pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// phyir rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// dus su smra ba ni byang chub ses
350a1('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// don yod par chos so bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// yang dag par smra ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi sos/
350a2('bum): so/ yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid du smra ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// de nas lha'i yul la zhig 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang du 'dus par gyurd pa de yang dag pa ma yin par
350a3('bum): smra ba nyid du slar smra ba nyid la rtog pa 'di lta bur skyes par gyur da te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims 'chal pa'i yan lag tu gyu rad pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa'i rgyur gyur pa dang / tshul
350a4('bum): khrims 'chal pa'i rkyen du gyurd pa dang / tshul khrims 'cha la pa'i gzhir gru rad pa gang yin pa de nyid/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
350a5('bum): khyad par du btags pa 'di ci zhig yin snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus yun ring po ma lon pa zhig na sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i bu de rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa seMs
350a6('bum): kyis shes nas lha'i bu rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag khyed rnams kyis ji ltar rjes su bsams pa dang / rnam par rtog par byed pa de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu
350a7('bum): 'on kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'dus byas kyi chos gang yang dag pa ma yin pa de ni brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can byis pa'i skye bo rnams 'drid par byed pa/ myi rtag pa myi brtan pa thar
350a8('bum): zug ma yin pa yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin pas ma/ de'i phyir yang dag pa ma yin zhes bshad de/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par gyis/ sred pa sa spyod pa'i sems
350b1('bum): can rnams la nye bar stond par byed cing / sems can 'di dag ni 'khor ba'i chu bor nub pa/ 'khor ba'i btson ra la mngon par dga' ba/ phyin ci log bzhes phyin ci log tu gyur da pa/ bdag
350b2('bum): tu 'dzin pa dang / mngon par ldan pa 'jig tshogs la lta ba la rjes su spyod pa/ 'gro ba sna tshogs pa blo tha dad par gyur pa/ snyigs ma lngas snyigs par gyurd pa/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang
350b3('bum): gti mug gi dbang du gyur pa/ sems rnam par myos pa sems rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa/ sems la bde ba myed pa/ sems phyin ci log tu gyurd pa/ 'dus byas kyi bde ba rnams thos nas/
350b4('bum): dge ba'i chos la mngon par gzhol bar 'gyur ba yin la/ dge ba'i chos la mngon par gzhol ba de rnams sdom pa rnam par dag par gyur da cing / sems kyi ngo bo nyid thob nas
350b5('bum): de'i 'og tu 'dus byas kyi bde ba las bslang ste/ 2dus ma byas kyi bde ba la 'jog par byed do// lha'i bu rgyu 'di dang rkyen 'dis na yang dag pa ma yin pa smra ba 'di ni
350b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro zhes smras pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas yang tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shar
350b7('bum): dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi khyad par la yang khyod kyis spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa
350b8('bum): ra dwa ti'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// byams pa sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la re ba myed
351a1('bum): ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// snyan par smra ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// ngag gi sdom pa sbyin pa dang bcas pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'
351a2('bum): shes rab kyi khyad par ro// don spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs so// byang chub kyi sems 'dod pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// don 'thun pa ni byang chub
351a3('bum): sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// ris 'thun pa'i gdul bya rnams 'dul ba'i thabs ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs
351a4('bum): par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog sa par 'tshang rgya bar sems pa nyid ni byang chub ses
351a5('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// byams pa de ltar na bslab pa la kund tu spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams zild kyis
351a6('bum): gnon pa de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar gyur da pa yin no// byams pa byang
351a7('bum): chub sems dpa'i shes rab ni chos thams cad yongs su bsdu ba shes pa yin no// bstan pa 'di bstan pa na/ lha'i bu lnga stong gyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags
351a8('bum): brgya stong phrag mang po na chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing / dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag par gyur to// lha'i bu stong phrag dpag tu myed pa ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
351b1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// lha'i bu bye ba dpag tu myed pas lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das dang / gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / byang chub
351b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la gtor da/ mngon par gtor da par gyurd to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gser gyi mdog can las na bza' bshus te/ tshe dang ldan pa
351b3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu la chos kyi dgab par sa lad to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dra ti'i bus pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
351b4('bum): ba btud nas/ ma bza' de yang dag par mnos te blangs na sa spyi bor bzhag ste/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
351b5('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang cas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i 'jig rtend rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs
351b6('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gser gyi mdog can las na bza' bshus te/ chos kyi mchog dang / rjes su 'thun par sald pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// sems can gang gin lam du chos
351b7('bum): kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur pa de rnams ni lam yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o// yid la le ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur da pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / nga rgyal
351b8('bum): nges par bcom par gyur pa dang / theg pa chen po la nges par zhugs shing / tshogs yang dag par bsags par 'gyur ba dang / skye la de dang de yongs su brjes pa mi sangs rgyas 'jig rtenang du
352a1('bum): byung ba la legs par bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi rgyu nad la nges par 'jug par 'gyur ba yin na/ gang 'dzind par byed pa dang / klog par byed pa dang
352a2('bum): kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par byed pa dang / lung nod par byed pa dang / stonang par byed pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /
352a3('bum): dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / brug pa dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur bstir byed pa dang / bla mar byed
352a4('bum): pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa dang / rjed par byed pa dang / gsol bar byed pa'i sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
352a5('bum): sa lad pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dra ti'i bu dkon// mchog gsum po ni 'di las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro//
352a6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang
352a7('bum): lung nod pa dang / stonang pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par byed pa de ni dbang po ma tshang bar myi 'gyur/ myi khom
352a8('bum): ba rnams su skye bar myi 'gyur/ ngan 'gror 'gro bar myi 'gyur/ byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar myi 'gyur/ dran pa nyams par myi 'gyur te/ gzhan du de 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ de bzhin
352b1('bum): gshegs pa byams pa'i zhabs drung du skye bar 'gyur zhing / der skyes nas kyang rdzu 'phrul che ba'i lha rnams su 'gyur zhing / chos kyi dga' ba la mngon par dga'i lus kyi dga' ba la
352b2('bum): mngon par dga' bar myi 'gyur ro// de de nas shi 'phos nas mye'i nang du dad pa dang ldan zhing / yang dag par 'byor pa dang ldan pa'i phyi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i 'og/
352b3('bum): tu de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa las chos bstan pa thos nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te/ 'di yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i phan
352b4('bum): yon yin par shes par bya'o// de nas lha'i bu dri ma myed par bkod pa zhes bya ba 'khor 'dus pa de nyid kyi// nang du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das
352b5('bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyi nad pa 'di la bkur stir bgyid pa dang / bla mar bgyid
352b6('bum): pa dang / ri mor bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa dang / rjed par bgyid pa dang / gsol bar bgyid pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / pri dang / 'phreng ba dang / brug pa dang /
352b7('bum): phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod par bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dug gis 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par myi 'gyur/
352b8('bum): myes 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par myi 'gyur/ chus 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par myi 'gyur/ mtshon gyis 'che ba'i dus bgyid par myi 'gyur/ brjed byed dang / spro byed dang / gzho ru'i gdon gyis bzung
353a1('bum): ste/ 'dra ba'i dus bgyid par myi 'gyur te/ gzhan du na dbang po bde bar gnas pa dang / tshig 'khrul pa myed pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par
353a2('bum): 'gyur ro// de 'chi ba'i dus bgyid pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i sprul pa de'i mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin
353a3('bum): te/ de de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
353a4('bum): bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang
353a5('bum): dag par stond par byed pa de la bdag gis stobs dang ma/ thu dang rnyed pa bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / bsrung ba dang / bskya ba pa dang / yang dag par sba bar bgyi'o// myi ma yin
353a6('bum): ba rnams kyang de la bsrung bar byed pa nyid du 'tshal bar bgyi ba dang / de la myi ma yin pa rnams bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / de bdud kyi las yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams
353a7('bum): kyang de la bsrung bar byed par 'gyur bar bgyi ba dang / de la gcan zan gdug pa rnams 'tshe bar myi 'gyur bar bgyi ba dang / de'i 'thab pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / rtsod par smra ba rnams rab
353a8('bum): tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / bde bar gnyid log cing bde bar sad par 'gyur ba dang / skrag cing 'jigs pa myed pa'i rmyi la ma mthong ba dang / de'i nyin mo dang mtshan mo bde bas 'da' bar byed pa dang
353b1('bum): las kyi sgrib pa gang dag yod pa de thams cad mthong ba'i chos la yongs su zad par 'gyur ba dang / de la mgo'i nang ngam/ myig gi nad dam/ rtsib logs kyi nang dam/ lho'i nad ngam/ rlung
353b2('bum): gi nad dam/ mkhris pa'i nad dam/ bad kan gi nad dag 'byung bar myi 'gyur ba dang / pha rol kyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa 'am yul gzhan du 'gro ba'am/ mchi ma 'dzag pa 'am/ yid
353b3('bum): du myi 'ong ba thos pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i nyes pa gang yang rung ba 'byung bar mya 'gyur bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis chos
353b4('bum): smra ba gang las shes rab kyi pha ri mad tu phyind pa 'di thos/ pa dang / yang dag par bzung ba dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa'i chos smra ba de la bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed
353b5('bum): par bgyi'o// sbyin gnas kyi 'du shes dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes dang / ston pa'i 'du sa dang / nye bar ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//
353b6('bum): des chos smra ba de'i yon tan rjes su bsgrag par bya ba dang / bstod pa'i tshig bsgrag par bya ba dang / blta bar 'dod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ chos
353b7('bum): smra ba ni 'jig rten long ba rnams la myig ster bar byed pa yin no// chos smra ba mchod pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sal pa/ byams
353b8('bum): pa legs so// legs so// tshig 'di legs par smras so// de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus kyang bshad pa legs so// legs so//
354a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ byams pa'i le'u ste/ bdun cu rtsa gsum pa'o//
354a2('bum): bam po la nyi shu gnyis
354a3('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshol bar 'dod
354a4('bum): pas ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs myi bzad par
354a5('bum): sgrogs pa'i drung du/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa des ngas su btsal ba de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su btsal bar bya'o// de skad ces bka'
354a6('bum): sprul pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu sngon/ shes rab
354a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yongs su tshol ba na ji ltar yongs su btsal lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da la 'di skad ces bkalas la
354a8('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du sngon/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga pa chol ba ma/ lus don tu mi gnyer ba dang / srog la bsgos pa byed pa dang
354b1('bum): rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dag la myi gnas pa de ltar yongs su btsal to// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa yongs su tshol zhing / 'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyin pa na/ bar snang las smra 'di lta bu thos
354b2('bum): par gyur da te/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mos par 'gyur gyis/ ji nas kyang sras ngal ba yid la byed pa mye skyed pa dang / gnyid dang rmugs pa
354b3('bum): yid la byed pa myi skyed pa dang / bza' ba yid la byed pa myi skyed pa dang / btung ba yang sa byed pa mye skyed pa dang / mtshan mo yid la byed pa myi skyed pa dang / nyin mo yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang /
354b4('bum): grang ba yid la byed pa myi skyed pa dang / tsha ba yid la bye da pa myi skyed pa de ltar song zhag/ rigs kyi bu nang ngam/ phyi rol gang la yang sems smon par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi
354b5('bum): bu g.yas g.yos su ma lta bar song shika/ lho phyog/ sa su ma yin/ nub phyogs su ma yin/ byang phyogs su ma yin/ steng du ma yin/ 'og tu ma yin/ phyogs mtsham
354b6('bum): su yang ma lta bar song shig/ rigs kyi bu ci nas 'jog tshogs las ma gsos pa dang / ci nas gzugs las kyang ma g.yos par bya'o// tshor ba las ma yin/ 'du shes las ma yin/
354b7('bum): 'du byed rnams las ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las ma g.yos pa de ltar song shig dang / gang 'di las g.yos pa de ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro// ci las nyams par 'gyur zhe na/ sangs
354b8('bum): rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par gyur pa de mi 'khor ba la spyod do// gang 'khor ba la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinapa
355a1('bum): bal myi spyod cing / rjes su 'thob par myi 'gyur ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus sgra de la 'di skad ces smras so//
355a2('bum): de bzhin du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad la snang ba byed par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
355a3('bum): cad bsdu zhing bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro// re skad ces smras pa dang / sgra des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu phul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu rtag
355a4('bum): du legs so// legs so// de nas byang/ chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la yang sgra sa bos te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis stong pa nyid
355a5('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i chos dag la mos pa bskyed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngas su btsal bar bya'o// khyod kyis mtshan ma yongs
355a6('bum): su spang bar bya/ dngos po yongs su spang bar bya/ sems can du lta ba yongs su spang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag spang bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen
355a7('bum): gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po myed pa dang / ma 'gags pa'i chos rnams ston par byed pa dag la bsnyen par bya/ bsnyen
355a8('bum): par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bsgrubs na/ ring mo myi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du chud pa'am/ dge slong chos smra ba'i lus
355b1('bum): la yod pa thos par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu byend pa 'di thos pa de la khyod kyis ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing / khyod kyis byas pa gzo ba
355b2('bum): dang byas pa tshor bar byas te gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di thos pa 'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa de bdag
355b3('bum): gis thos pas myur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa dang nye
355b4('bum): bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// myi khom pa rnams yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// dal ba
355b5('bum): phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro// reg/ sa kyi bu de ltar phan yon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongs su rto/ gas la/ dge slong chos smra ba la ston pa yin par 'du
355b6('bum): shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rtend gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar myi bya'o/ khyod kyis chos smra ba la chos
355b7('bum): don tu gnyer ba dang / chos la gus par bya bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par bya ste/ bdud sdig can ni byang chub sems dpa'
355b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dag bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang / spyad par bya ba'i phyir nye bar bsten par byed pa de dag khyod kyis
356a1('bum): zi lad kyis mnam nas/ thabs la mkhas pas yongs su 'grogs pa dang / bsten pa dang / bsnyen par gyis shig ces zer ba yang yod de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos
356a2('bum): smra ba del pa rang pa bskyad par rtse bya'o// gzhan du na sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis ni thabs la mkhas pa gyi shes so// 'di ni sems can kyi tshul gyis
356a3('bum): sems can rnams kyi dge pa'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos 'di dag la sten cing / 'grogs te bsnyen par byed do// des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni
356a4('bum): gang la yang chags pa 'am/ sgrib pa myed kyis sku/ da cig de nyid la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ yang dag pa'i tshul so sor brtag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos rnams
356a5('bum): kyi yang dag po'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byad/ ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad
356a6('bum): mingo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/ chos thams cad ni sems can myed pa dang / srog myed pa dang / gang zag myed pa dang / sgyum lta bu dang / rmyi lam lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / myig
356a7('bum): yor lta bu yin no// rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing / chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang na/ ring po mya thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nges par 'thod
356a8('bum): par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud kyi las la sems shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu la brnyas par
356b1('bum): byed cing myi sems na/ de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir dbyed par myi bya ste/ gzhan du na chos kyi don tu gnyer ba nyid dang / chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang / yid yongs su myi skyo bas dge
356b2('bum): slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o zhes thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus sgra de las rjes su bstan pa 'di yongs su blangs nas/ shar phyogs
356b3('bum): ga la ba der song ba dang / ring por ma phyind par de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sgra de la ji srid du 'gro bar bya ba dang / su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos par 'gyur ba ma dris
356b4('bum): so snyam nas/ de sa phyogs de nyid na ngu zhing mya ngan byed pa dang / smre sngags 'don bzhin du 'dug go// des phyogs de nyid na nyin zhag gcig 'da' bar bya'o//
356b5('bum): de bzhin du nyin zhag gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am drug gam/ bdun gyi bar gyi nyin mo 'am mtshan mo 'da' bar bya ba de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
356b6('bum): phyi nad pa thos par ma gyur kyi bar du/ ngal ba yid la byed pa myi bskyed/ rmugs pa dang gnyid yid la byed pa myi bskyed/ bza' ba yid la byed pa myi bskyed/ btung ba yid la byed pa myi bskyed
356b7('bum): mtshan mor yid la byed pa myi bskyed/ nyin mor yid la byed pa myi bskyed/ grang ba yid la byed pa myi bskyed/ tsha ba yod la byed pa myi bskyed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes
356b8('bum): bu la la zhig bu cig pa sdug pa 'chi ba'i dus byas na/ sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i bu'i mya ngan gyis bu gcig pu yid la byed pa ma gtogs par
357a1('bum): yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang myi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du yang de'i tshe/ bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol/
357a2('bum): tu phyi nad pa thos par 'gyur ba dang / shar phyogs su 'gro ba 'di nye ring ni ci tsam/ sra las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos par 'gyur snyam pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang /
357a3('bum): myi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor da de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de ltar gdung zhing / 'dug pa'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig bzhugs nas
357a4('bum): legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi sa khyod mi dka de skad smra ba ni legs so legs so// ji ltar khyod kyis da ltar yongs su bcal ba bzhin du/ sngon de bzhin gshes
