357a5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sa rnams kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su btsal
357a6('bum): to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di dang / spro ba 'di dang / don tu gnyer ba 'di dang / 'dod pa 'di lta bus rjes su 'brang zhing / shar phyogs nyid du song shig/
357a7('bum): dang / rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyan spos ldan zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ra ba rim bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang
357a8('bum): shing ta la'i 'phreng rim bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor da pa rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa skye bo mang po dang
357b1('bum): myos gang ba grong bar dang / srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/ khyogs dang / khri nyam nga ba myed pa dang / bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa
357b2('bum): grong khyer gyi khor yug tu zhol gyi phyir rin po che sna bdun las legs par byas shing / bskor la rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba de dag gi mda' ya ba rnams ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa/
357b3('bum): mtho zhing tshad dang ldan pa mda' yab thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing skyes te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing tog gi 'bras bu chags pa/ mda' a ba las shing skyes pa thos
357b4('bum): cad las kyang rin po che'i tha gu thung bas mda' ya ba gcig shos gzhan dpa'abrel da pa/ grong khyer thams cad gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas khebs te/ gser
357b5('bum): gyi dril bu g.yer ka de dag la rlung gyis btab na/ sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/ dper na yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo sna tshogs pa
357b6('bum): rol mo mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na/ sgra 'jam zhing snyan la yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du/ dril bu gser ka de dag la rlung gis btab na/ sgra 'jam zhing snyam pa
357b7('bum): yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ swA des sems can de dag rtse zhing dgal la dga' dkur spyod do// grong khyer de'i khor yug tu 'obs chu 'bab pas gang zhing / legs par 'bab pa
357b8('bum): chu ha cang yang myi dro bas gang ba dag yod do// chu de la sngon gyi rnam par smin pas grub pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gru dag yod de/ der sems can dag zhugs das/ re zhing dga' la
358a1('bum): yongs su spyod do// chu de thams cad kyang me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dag gis khebs pa/ me tog rigs che zhing bzang ba/ dri zhim zhing bzang la dri zhim
358a2('bum): po'i ngad ldang ba gzhan dag gis kyang khebs te/ mdor na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend gyi khams na/ yod pa'i me tog gi rigs las de na myed pa gang yang myed do//
358a3('bum): grong khyer de'i nang na bskyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa sha stag ste/ bskyed mos tshal de dag re re na yang rdzing
358a4('bum): bu kho ra yug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya/ yod de/ rdzing bu de dag gi kho ra yug thams cad nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang
358a5('bum): pad ma dang / pad ma dkar po rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de khebs shing me tog ud pa la dang / ku mud dang / pad ma dang / par
358a6('bum): ma dkar po de dag thams cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam ste/ sngon po kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba/ ser po 'dog ser po/ ser po lta bur
358a7('bum): ston pa/ 'od ser po 'byung ba/ dmar po kha dog dmar po dmar po la bur ston pa/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba/ dkar po kha dog dkar po/ dkar po lta bur stond pa/ 'od dkar po 'byung
358a8('bum): bdag yod do// rdzing bu de dag thams cad na/ ngang pa dang / dung pa dang / khrung khrung dang / bya ka ran da dang / gzhad dang / shang shang de'u sgra 'byin pa dag yod do// bskyed mos
358b1('bum): tshal de dag thams cad kyang ba'i bya ba myed cing / ris su bcad pa myed de/ 'di ltar sems can dag yun ring por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / yun ring por chos zab mo
358b2('bum): la lhag par mos pa'i sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smind pas grub pa yin no// rigs kyi bu grong khyer de dag gi dbus kyi bzhi mdon/ byang chub sems dpa' ses
358b3('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ kho ra yug tu dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam yod pa rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa/ ra ba rim pa bdun dang / ta la'i
358b4('bum): 'phreng bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba zhig yod do// khang pa de na khang pa'i long spyod rtag tu rab dga' zhes bya ba'i bskyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan myed ces bya ba dang /
358b5('bum): ngan bral zhes bya ba dang / me tog sna tshogs pa zhes/ bya ba'i bskyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/ bskyed mos tshal de re re na yang rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang / bzang
358b6('bum): po'i mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' ba zhes bya ba dang dga' ba'i mchog ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang / bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / myi 'ab
358b7('bum): ces bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de/ de rnams kyi ngos gcig ni gser las byas pa'o// ngos gnyis pa ni dngul las byas pa'o// ngos gsum pa ni bye du rtsa las byas pa'o// ngos bzhi pa ni shel
358b8('bum): las byas pa'o// nang gi sa gzhi no kai ke ru las byas pa la/ gser gi bye ma bdal ba ste/ rdzing bu de dag re re la yang them skas rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas brgyan pa/ skas
359a1('bum): kri rim pas mdzes par byas pa/ brgyad brgyad yod de/ them skas de dag thams cad kyi bar nas kyang 'dzam bu chu bo li gser gyi shing ljon pa dag skyes so// rdzing bu de dag thos
359a2('bum): cad kyi chu ni me tog ku mu ta dang / ud pa la dang / pad ma dkar po sna tshogs kyis khebs shing / ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / khrung khrung dang / gzhad rnams skad 'byin to// rdzing bu de dag
359a3('bum): gi khor yug kun nas/ me tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes la/ me tog gi shing de dag la rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bas/ rdzing bu de dag thams cad
359a4('bum): kyi chu yang tsan dan gyi drir phyogs shing / kha dog dang / ldan dri dang ldan no// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas pa zung
359a5('bum): byed drug khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor date/ rtse dga' zhing dga' dgur spyod do// grong khyer de na sems can skyes pa dang /
359a6('bum): bud myed gang gzhan dga'a'od pa de dag thams cad kyang bskyed mos tshal las/ rdzing bu dag na rtag tu dgal la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor date/ rtse dga' zhing dgal dgu so /
359a7('bum): su myong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' ste/ dga' dgur spyod cing / de ma dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol
359a8('bum): shu byi nad pa stonod to// sems can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'khod pa de dag kyang grong khyer gyi bzhi mdor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khri gas gyi
359b1('bum): rkang pa dang / rdul gyi rkang pa dang / be du ru'i rkang pa dang / shel gyi rkang pa gzugs pa/ shing bal bting ba/ snyan nang tshangs can bting ba steng snying po can du byas pa/ ka sha ki'i ras bti
359b2('bum): ba 'bang du nang grags med yod pa bgasas te/ keng gi bar snang la ras kyi ba su tig gis btun pa bres shing / des chos la gus pa byed pas/ sa phyogs de khor yug tu me tog pa //
359b3('bum): sna lnga pa dkal den par gtor cing / sa phyogs de yang spes sna tshogs dang / gdug pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu bdug par byed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
359b4('bum): 'phakas 'dug nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa stonang te/ rigs kyi bu sems cad de dag ni de lta bur gus par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' ses
359b5('bum): dpa' chen po ches 'phags las shes rab kyi pa ro// lang tu phyind pa nyan to// de na gang dag nyan pa'i lha dang myi srog chags brgya phrag mang po/ srog chags stong
359b6('bum): phrag yang pe sreg chags 'bum phrag mang me tshogs pa de dag las/ la la ni lung nod/ la la ni kha tor byed/ la la di yi ger 'dri/ la la ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rtogs par byed de
359b7('bum): rgyu de dang rkyend des sems can de dag thams cad kyang leg par mi ltung ba'i chos can te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa sha stag go// rigs kyi
359b8('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags de'i drung du song shig dang / de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ni yun ring po nas
360a1('bum): khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par stodad pa/ yang dag par 'jed tu 'jug pa/ yang dag par gzeng stong
360a2('bum): pa/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin do// rigs kyi bu des kyang sngon da ltar khyod ji ltar tshol ba de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa yongs su btsal gyis/ rigs kyi
360a3('bum): bu khyed nyid dang mtshad du yid la byed pa rgyun ma gcad par song shig dang / ring po myi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
360a4('bum): dpa' chen po rtag tu dus tshig de thos nas/ dka' ba dang mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu mgu zhing dka' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyu da pa ni 'di lta ste dper na/
360a5('bum): skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig zug dus po ga da / yidal byed pa gzhan gyi skyed kyi gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las tha rad par byed pa/ zug rngu 'byin pa'i smad pa bdag gis rnam
360a6('bum): rnyed par 'gyur snyam du sems par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa de mos par byed cing / gang
360a7('bum): chos mos nas bdag ka re myigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis nam mthong bar 'gyur snyam du sems pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang yid la myi byed do//
360a8('bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tag tu sras phyogs de nyid 'dug ste/ chos thams cad la gyi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ de ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo dul mngon tu gyur
360b1('bum): pa nyams su myong ba ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid myi dmyigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams
360b2('bum): cad myi shes pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad rnam pa tha dad pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad 'gyur ba myed par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting
360b3('bum): nge 'dzid dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad myi shes pa sel pa
360b4('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad myaM/ dmyigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de dang / chos thams cad
360b5('bum): bdag gi dngos po myi sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me long gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i
360b6('bum): ting nge 'dzi nad dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sems can thams cad
360b7('bum): kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / skra dang tshig dang yig 'bru sna tshogs sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / ma khengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
360b8('bum): rang bzhin rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha rad pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi dang dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang
361a1('bum): myeng dang nges pa'i tshig dang yig 'bru la shin tu mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
361a2('bum): cad la sgrib pa myed pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi
361a3('bum): rdul seld pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir myi ldog pa'i myig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings la nges
361a4('bum): par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / dbu gas 'byind pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / se dge mngon par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang /
361a5('bum): sems can thams cad zild kyis gnon pa zhes bya// ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rdul myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i
361a6('bum): ting nge 'dzind dang / pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / the tsom thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / snying po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
361a7('bum): dang / chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i to ba nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
361a8('bum): cad la mngon par 'byigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor da pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bye brag myed par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
361b1('bum): dang / lta bar gyur na pa'i thibs po thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma dang bral ba zhos
361b2('bum): bya ba'i ting ngange 'dzin dang chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / le lo thams cad dang bral ba'i zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos zab mo'i 'od byed
361b3('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / mu~M 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'jom par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting
361b4('bum): nge 'dzind dang / 'jig rten gsum la mngon par ma zhe/ na pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba
361b5('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon tu gyurd te/ de ting nge 'dzind de dag la gnas pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'ja/ gartend gyi khams rnams na/ sangs rgyas grangs myed dpag
361b6('bum): tu myed pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rab tu ston pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so zhes bya ba byin nas
361b7('bum): dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/ tshig 'di skad kyang gsung ngo // rigs kyi bu nged kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i smad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang pa 'di bzhin du btsal te/
361b8('bum): yongs su tshol ba na yang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin la bltas te/ rtogs pa na gang mnyam par gzhag par bya ba'am/ ldang bar bya ba'am/ byang chub tu spyad pa'am/
362a1('bum): gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu shes rab
362a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyinang ba ni 'di yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos gang gis kyang rlom sems sam/ rlom sems myed par myi byed pa la gnas nas/ nged kyis 'di 'dra ba'i sras gser gyi kha dog lta
362a3('bum): thob ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad nu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis
362a4('bum): myi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin da bla na myed pa dang / yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis kyang tshad gzung
362a5('bum): ba'am/ mtha' bstan par myi nus na/ nyan tho sa dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis 'di dag la rab tu don tu gnyer
362a6('bum): ba dang / 'dun pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu don tu gnyer ba dang / 'dun pa la ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no//
362a7('bum): khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shin du gus pa bskyed par bya'o// sangs par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zi nang pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myur tu
362a8('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad
362b1('bum): ces gsol to// bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags/ de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa' ses
362b2('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smind par byas shing yongs su bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang thabs la mkhas pa
362b3('bum): la bslabs so// rigs kyi bu de ni khyed yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis/ des khyod la ji skad bsreb bzhin du zung shig/ rigs kyi 'u ka la te khyod kyis byang chub sems
362b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa gnyis sam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang mgo la mod
362b5('bum): bzhin du thogs shing/ bde ba'i yo byad thams dkyis rem grong byas te/ stong gsum gyi steng chen po la'i garte nad kyi khams da / gzugs dang / ska dang / dri dang /
362b6('bum): reg pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad yul yang / rigs kyis khyod kyis de la skad ceg gcig cam kyi drin la yang yon pa ma yin do// de ci'i phyi zhen/ rigs kyi bu de'i mtham
362b7('bum): kyis ting nge 'dzin 'dis bdag rnyed par gyur da te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dang babs la mkhas pa gos gas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du tu pri nang ma yob yang gyur da to// de nas
362b8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dbugs bya bdas kyi snang bar gyu rad to// rigs kyi bu de yang ting nge 'dzin de dag las la
363a1('bum): langs nas kyang 'di snyam du sems so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam ste/ de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma mtho/
363a2('bum): bas/ rab tu gdung zhing myi dka' bar gyur da to// yang 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni gzungs thob pa/ mngon par shes pa
363a3('bum): lnga dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa ste/ bdag yongs su 'dzin dpa bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin zhing / yun ring po nas des bdag gi dor byas pa
363a4('bum): yin gyis/ bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mngon par song ste/ nye bar phyi nang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas rkyen
363a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces don 'di/ nyid dri'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po rtag tu du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
363a6('bum): chen me ches 'phags la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang ri mo dang gus par bya ba gzhag ste/ nye bar bzhag nas 'di snyam du sems so// bdag gis ji lta bu'i bkur bsti khyabs/ bya ba drab mas
363a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags de'i drung du 'gro bar bya/ bdag ni dbul te/ gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bdag gis bkur spel ba'i gos rim
363a8('bum): me che 'am/ gser ram/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig kas/ bye du ma'am/ rung ngam/ mad shel las/ bu ru 'am/ dngul ngam/ sa ye skam 'am/ me tog kas/ sras sam/ me tog
363b1('bum): 'phreng ngam/ byug pa 'am/ phye ma 'am/ gdugs de lta bu yang bdag la myed na/ bdag 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du song na ni/ bdag
363b2('bum): gis tshul ma yin pa byas par 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba'am rangs pa yang myi skye'o snyam du sems so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de lta bu'i yon tan dag dang /
363b3('bum): bla ma la gus pa yid la byed pa dang ldan par mthard kyis shar phyogs su song ste/ grong khyer chen po shinang tu yangs pa 'byor da pa/ rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang / myos
363b4('bum): yongs su gang ba dag tu phyinang pa dang / de'i grong bar// gyi dbus su de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gi lus btsongs la/ de'i rin gyis byang chub sems dpa'
363b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o// yun ring po nas bdag gi lus stong tsam zhig zad de/ deng sa la btsongs te 'khor ba dpag tu myed pa nas/ 'dod
363b6('bum): pa'i phyir dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus yang dang yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu myed pa dag myong yang 'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram/ 'di lta bu'i sems can chen po la bkur sti bya ba'i
363b7('bum): phyir ma yin no snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus grong bar du 'dug ste/ myi su 'dod/ myi su 'dod ces smra bsgrags shing skad kyis bos so//
363b8('bum): de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ni/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
364a1('bum): chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
364a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ji ltar spyad na/ myur du bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgyab yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / thos pa rgya mtsho yang thob par 'gyur
364a3('bum): bdud dang bdud kyi tshogs kyi lha rnams kyis myi mthong bar 'gyur zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i yon tan thams cad kyang rjes su 'thob par 'gyur la/ bla na myed pa
364a4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog/ sa par sangs rgyas nas/ der sems can mang po dag gi/ don byed par 'gyur zhing / de dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da'
364a5('bum): bar byed par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gzhan dag kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ nga'i yul las 'da' bar
364a6('bum): byed par 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis 'di la bar chad bya'o snyam mo// de nas bdud sdig can gyis ci nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
364a7('bum): rtag tu dus kyi su 'dod/ su zhig nyo bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra myi bos par 'gyur ba de lta bur yongs su bsgribs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu gang gi tshe
364a8('bum): bdag nyo ba ma rnyed pa de'i tshe/ phyogs gcig tu song nas mchi ma phyung ste/ 'di ltar bdag gi lus btsongs la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti
364b1('bum): bya snyam ya su sus nyo ba yang bdag gis ma rnyed de/ kye la bdag de rnyed pa ngan pa rnyed do snyam lo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byed 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
364b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po tig tu du/ 'di lta ste/ ches 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gi lus yongs su gtang bar lhag pa'i bsam pa pun sum tshogs pa yin dam ma yin pa/ byang chub sems dang
364b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po ta ka tu du la/ bdag gis sad par bya'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du kha den par sprul danas byang chub sems dpa'
364b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du ka la ba der song ste phyi na nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyed
364b5('bum): 'di ltar yid kyi dka' zhing yid gdung zhing mchim pa/ da ba ci nyes des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u kho bo 'i chos 'di da pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs te/ chos la mchod par
364b6('bum): bya bar 'dod na/ lus nye ba de khe bas pa rnyed nas/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so// kye ma pa de bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar bcings te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
364b7('bum): pa la mched par bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkang sti bya snyam na/ bdag ki lus nyo ba yang ma rnyed do snyam mo// de nas
364b8('bum): bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo la gyis ni bya ba myed kyi/ kho bo mchod srin zhig byed de/ de gyi'i
365a1('bum): snying dang khrag dang / dus dang / rkang dag kho bo la dgos dang / de rin gyis nyor byed cig ces smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di
365a2('bum): ma du sems te/ gang bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang nyo ba rnyed pa 'di ni bdag gis rnyed pa'i mchog legs par rnyed do// bdag gi lus
365a3('bum): nags rab kyi pa rol tu pa dad pa dang / babs la mkhas pa rnams la yongs su rdzogs par gu rad te snyam ste/ sems dka' ba dang / sems bde ba dang / sems rab tu dga' bar gyur da
365a4('bum): nas bram ze'i khye'u la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u khe bo'i lus 'di las khyod gang 'dod pa sbyin// no// des de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs
365a5('bum): kyi bu khyod rin du ni 'dod pa sbyi de zhes byas pa dang / des de la 'di skad ces smras so// zam ze'i khye'u khyed kyis gang yongs su btang ba de kho bo la byin cig/ de das
365a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du mtshon rnon po bkas nas/ lag pa g.yas pa jug ste/ khrag gzugs so// bsgragayas pa ga byed par btogs nas/ rum
365a7('bum): pa gcig tu cig pa'i drung du song ngo // dems che dpon kyi rtse mo zhig 'dra ba'i yang tog na 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ru/ brdag med par btog
365a8('bum): nas / rus pa gcog du cig pa'i drung du song bas po po das/ 'di mas du sems te/ rigs kyi grwa 'di ba'i phyir bdag nyid la bdag nyid 'dis bu'i sa byed pa bdag rigs kyi bu de'i bu
365b1('bum): song ste/ dri'o snyam nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du
365b2('bum): la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed/ khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang 'dis ci zhig bya/ rtag tu dus bu mo de la 'di
365b3('bum): skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u 'di la btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mchod par bya'o// 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
365b4('bum): la yang bsnyen bkur bya'o// de nas tshong dpon/ gyi bu mos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rta ga tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod
365b5('bum): 'di ltar bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang yang btsongs te/ rigs kyi bu de la bkur sti bya bar 'dod pa khyod la/ yon tan gyi rnam pa ci zhig
365b6('bum): 'grub par 'gyur/ des de la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo rigs kyi bu de ni gang la kho bos bslab par bya ba'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang thabs la mkhas pa dag ston
365b7('bum): par 'gyur te/ kho bos de la bslabs na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur/ lus gas
365b8('bum): gyi kha dog lta bu yang 'thob par 'gyur/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / 'od gzer mtha' yas pa dang / byams
366a1('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dka' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyurasangs rgyas
366a2('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rnam par dag pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang
366a3('bum): shes rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ye shes kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te
366a4('bum): gang gis sems can thams cad la kun tu bgo bsha' bya ba'i bla na myed pa'i chos rin po che yang rab tu 'thob par 'gyur/ ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems
366a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di ltar chos rgya chen po 'di dag yongs su brjod pa ni ngo mtsha rad to// rigs kyi
366a6('bum): bu chos 'di lta bu re re'i phyir yang / bskal pa gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed du lus yongs su gtang bar bya ba yin na/ gcig lta ci smos te/ de tsam du khyod kyis chos 'di dag rgya cher yongs su
366a7('bum): brjod na rigs kyi bu khyod gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i gser ram nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ bye du r+ya 'am/ dngul lam/
366a8('bum): me tog gam/ bdug pa 'am/ spos sam/ me tog 'phreng ngam/ byug pa 'am/ phye ma'am/ gos sam/ gdugs sam/ khyod la ci dgos pa de khyod la sbyin gyis bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i
366b1('bum): sdug bsngal ma byed cig/ bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der do la bdag kyang khyod dang ldan gcig tu 'di lta ste/ de lta bu'i
366b2('bum): chos 'di dag thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad myi snang bar byas nas/ bdag nyid kyi lus su byang chub sems dpa'
366b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i mdun de 'dug nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar yi dam la brtan pa ni legs so legs so// 'di lta bu'i chos 'dod pas sngon gyi de
366b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ 'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang thabs
366b5('bum): la mkhas pa/ yongs su rdzogs par mdzad de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rigs kyi bu kho bo la snying dang sha
366b6('bum): dang khrag gis bya ba myed kyis/ kho bo khyod sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyis rigs kyi tha khyod kyis dam pa spongs shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod la dam pa ji lta bu sbyin par bya/ des de la smras pa/ brgya
366b7('bum): byin sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na myed pa dag bdag la stsol cig/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yul 'di kho bo'i yul du gyur da pa ma yin te/ yul 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
366b8('bum): kyi yul du gyurd pa yin gyis/ dam pa gzhan spongs shig/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dus spras pa/ bdag gi lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i gnas 'di la lha'i dbang po brtson pa chung bar
367a1('bum): gyis shig/ lha'i dbang po bdag nyid kyis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs bya'o// lha'i dbang po bden pa gang gis bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi
367a2('bum): ldog par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan cing / bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo myed par mkhyen ce na/ bden pa de dang /
367a3('bum): bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus sngon bzhin du gyur da cig ces byas pa dang / skad cig thar cig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lhag po'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas/
367a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'o// lus sngon bzhin du gnas par gyur to// de nas wA dbang po brgya byin spobs pa myed par gyur nas/ byang chub
367a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la/ la na glan par spobs pa ma skyes nas/ de nyid du myi snang bar/ gyur da to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub
367a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu tshur sheg/ la mo'i khyim ka la ba der 'dong do/ kho mo'i pha ma las nor blangs te/ des shes
367a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de yang mchod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur sti bya ba sbyin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
367a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo de 'grogs nas/ de rang gi khyim ga la ba der dong ngo po// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu de bdag gi khyim du phyin nas/ pha ma la 'di skad
367b1('bum): ces smras so// yab yum gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang gos dang /
367b2('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo lache byad mang po dka bdag la stsol cig/ bdag kyang khyed kyis tsa lad pa'i g.yog mo lnga brgya 'di dag dang lhan cig dbyer gsol/
367b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dang bdag cag 'gregs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de yang
367b4('bum): bdag cag la chos stond par 'gyur ro//
367b5('bum): bam po nyi shu rtsa gnyis / de nas bu mo de li pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so//
367b6('bum): phra mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de su zhig/ bu mo rigs kyi bu de da ltar gang na 'dug/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de da ltar lo skol gyi sgo drung na mchis te/
367b7('bum): rigs kyi bu de yi lhag pa'i bsam pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu
367b8('bum): ma mchis pa las tha dad par bgyi bar 'tshal bas de chos btsal ba'i slad du/ bdag nyid btsongs la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal/ 'phags pa byang
368a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bgyi bar 'tshal na/ de lus nyo ba su yang ma byung ste/ de sdug bsngal zhing yid myi bde nas myi dga' bar
368a2('bum): sems shing mchis te/ des nga ni lus 'tshong bar 'dod na/ lus nyo ba ma rnyed do zhes bgyis pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur te/ de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod
368a3('bum): gang gi phyir/ lus 'tshong bar 'dod ces bgyis pa dang / rtag tu du des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mchod par bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
368a4('bum): pe chos 'phags de la yang bkur stir bya'o// da nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de la rag las pas 'di/ lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes bgyis pa dang
368a5('bum): brgya byed bram ze'u ldelu'i gzugs su bsgyur bas 'a di skad ces smras so// khyod ni ra myi 'dod der mchod sbyin zhig byed pa der myi'i snying dang / khrag dang rus pa dang
368a6('bum): rkang dag dgos so zhes bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu des ye ma bsad par de la 'di skad du sbyin no zhes smras nas/ de mtshon rnon po thogs te/ bdag gi lag pa phug nas phrag gzugs
368a7('bum): badra'i sha gtogs te/ rus pa gcog tu song nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no snyam nas/ de khrag gzag pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog na mchis pas mthong
368a8('bum): ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid de/ myi 'di ci'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid lan tsha dag bgyid snyam ste/ de'i thad du mchis nas 'di skad ces bgyis so// rigs kyi bu
368b1('bum): 'di ltar bdag nyid kyis lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad mchi ste/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang / snying dang / rus pa dang / rkang
368b2('bum): sbyin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da ni dbul te/ ngal nor gzhan ci yang myed do zhes mchi'o// bdag gis khyod la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad du
368b3('bum): 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la mchod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti'i bya'o zhes mtsha nas
368b4('bum): bdag gis de la 'di skad bgyis te/ rigs kyi bu/ des khyod la yon tan gyi rnam pa'am/ khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bdag la 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi
368b5('bum): yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu myed pa rnams rab tu stond par 'gyur ro// 'di lta bu'i chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi
368b6('bum): ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa de dag thos nas/ bdag kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu mgu ba chen po skyes nas 'di snyam bgyid de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'di lta bu'i gan
368b7('bum): la spro bar bgyid pa ni shi nad du dka' ba bgyis pa ste ngo mtsha rad to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong na/ bdag cag la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod la/
368b8('bum): ci'i phyir chos la mchod pa myi bgyi/ 'di lta bu'i gnas la spro bar bgyid pa ni sha nid tu dka' ba bgyid pa ste ngo mtshard to// 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir/ bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong na
369a1('bum): bdag cag la longs spyod rgya chen po dag la/ ci'i phyir chos la mchod pa myi bgyi/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon lam ci'i phyir myi gdab snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu de la bdag
369a2('bum): gis 'di skad ces bgyis so// rigs kyi bu khyod bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag ma byed cig/ khyod 'dod pa gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
369a3('bum): la bkur sti bgyi ba'i nor mang po dag khyod la sbyin no// bdag kyang yang khyod nyid dang 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der mchi'o// gang gis
369a4('bum): kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod pa bgyi'o// gang khyod kyi// sa yongs su brjod pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na myed pa dag bdag gis kyang thob par bgyi'o zhes bgyis shing
369a5('bum): mchis na/ yab yum gyis dkor gyi phung po chen po ba dag la stsal du stsol da/ bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
369a6('bum): chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi'o// de nas bu mo de'i sems bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de'i dka' ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bstan pa las na/ chos de dag ni gcig
369a7('bum): tu nges par bsam gyis kyi thub pa/ 'jig rtend thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i dka' ba'i gnas pa
369a8('bum): spro bar byed na/ khyod nged kyis gnang gis bu mo nged kyang khyod dang lhan gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags blta zhing / mchod du nged kyang 'gros/ nged 'gro ba'i skam
369b1('bum): phye shig/ de nas bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod par bya ba dang / bkur sti bya ba'i phyir chas te/ pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag/
369b2('bum): ni dge ba'i phyogs gang gi yang bar chad myi bgyid do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des shing rta brgya yang rgyan kyis brgyan/ bu mo lnga bskyed dag kyang brgyan gyis brgyan to// rgyan kyis brgyan
369b3('bum): nas me tog kha dog sna tshogs thogs pa dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba
369b4('bum): dan dag kyang thogs shing/ gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dag thogs rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang thogs te/ bza' ba dang / myang ba mang po mang du
369b5('bum): bskur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / shing rta gcig tu bzhugs te/ bu mo lnga brgya shing rta lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs pa de dag gis yod
369b6('bum): su skor cing mdun du bdar nas/ pha ma la stsogs pa 'khor mang po dang / shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su dong ngo // de mthar kyis song ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
369b7('bum): dpa' chen po rtag tu rus rgyang ring po zhig nas grong khyer spos ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba blta na sdug pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba rim gyis bskor pa/
369b8('bum): babs bdun yod pa 'obs rim pa bdun dang / ta la'i 'breng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor pa dang / chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa
370a1('bum): 'byor da cing rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa/ myi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba grong bar dang srang mnyam zhing / mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/ khyogs/
370a2('bum): khri nyam myang ba dang / bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa/ legs par byas pa mthong ngo // de'i dbus kyi bzhi mngon/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos
370a3('bum): kyi khri la 'dug nas/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / stong phrag du ma dang / 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor dacing / mdun gyis bltas nas/ chos 'chad pa mthong ste/ mthong ma
370a4('bum): thag tu de dga' ba dang / bde ba thob par gyur pa 'a de lta ste dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan dang po rtse gcig/ tu yid la byed pas snyoms par 'jug pa yin no//
370a5('bum): de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag shing rta'o/ nang du zhugs bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba ni bdag myi cha'o//
370a6('bum): snyam nas/ shing rta de las babs pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang / bu mo lnga brgya de dag dang ldan gcig tu shing rta las khabs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
370a7('bum): rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la stsogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bkod pa tshad myed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
370a8('bum): ga la ba der dong ngo // de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chos 'phags kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/
370b1('bum): tsan dan dmar pos brgyan cing/ mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste khang bu brtsegs pa de'i grwa bzhir nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur da te/ de dag sgron ma'i bya
370b2('bum): ba byed do// bdug spos kyi snod dngul las byas pa bzhi yang phyogs bzhir btags ste/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ a ga ru
370b3('bum): nag po 'ba' shig gis bdug par byed do// khang bu brtsegs pa de'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bzhi btsugs te/ de'i steng du rin po che'i sgrom bzhi bzhag nas/ de'i nang du
370b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gser gyi glegs bam la bye dur+ya bzhu bas bres pa bcug ste/ khang du brtsegs pa de yang dar gyi chun po sna tshogs rnam patha
370b5('bum): dad pa 'phyang bas brgyan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du tshong dpon gyi bu mo la stsogs te/ bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas
370b6('bum): khang bu brtsegs pa de bkod pa tshad myed pas brgyan pa mthong zhing / lha stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /
370b7('bum): gA'i gser gyi phye ma dang lha'i dngul gyi bye ma dag gis khang bu brtsegs pa de la 'bor/ mngon par 'bor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor bar mthong po/ skra'i sal snyan dag kyang thos
370b8('bum): mthong zhing thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus/ lnga'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i dbang po khyod lnga stong phrag du ma dag dang
371a1('bum): rin po che'i khang bu brtsegs pa 'di la ci'i phyir me tog man da ra ba dang / tsam dan gyi phye ma dag gis 'thor cing / mngon par rab tu 'thor/ lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang lha rnams
371a2('bum): bar snang la ci'i phyir rdung / de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di
371a3('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang yongs su 'dren pa yin te/ 'di la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
371a4('bum): yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen/ pa nyid kyang myu ra tu 'thob par 'gyur ba yin na/ khyod
371a5('bum): mi shes sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ lha'i bang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka/
371a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang yongs su 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de ni khang bu brtsegs pa 'di'i
371a7('bum): nang na gser gyi glegs bam la bye dur+ya bzhu pas bris pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rgya rim bdun gyis btab nas bzhag ste/ kho bo cag gis khyod
371a8('bum): la bstand par sla ba ma yin gyi/ de nyid stond par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la stsogs te/ bu mo lnga
371b1('bum): brgya dag dang tshogs nas de dag gis me tog dang / me tog 'phreng gi chun po dang / kos rin po che dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / thug pa dang phye ma dang
371b2('bum): gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog ji snyed thogs te/ 'ongs pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mchod pa byas
371b3('bum): te/ de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir shas shes kyis bzhag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
371b4('bum): po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang lhan cig tu me to ka dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs
371b5('bum): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas dang por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la mchod pa byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
371b6('bum): 'phags ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang me tog
371b7('bum): 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dag gis gtor
371b8('bum): mngon par gtor da/ mngon par rab tu gtor nga to// de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng na/ me tog gi khang pa zhig tu
372a1('bum): gyur to// gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dag nam mkhar gzhal myed khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to// chos gos dang / gos rin po che de dag kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyi smin
372a2('bum): kyi dkyil 'khor 'dra bar 'dug par gyur pa to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la stsogs pa lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'
372a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te ngo mtshard to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
372a4('bum): 'di 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing / 'di ltar mthu che la/ 'di ltar gzi brjid che ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa ma yang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par
372a5('bum): sprul pa 'di 'dra na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/ ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo
372a6('bum): l-i sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dgal ba bskyed nas/ de dag thams cad kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
372a7('bum): byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur da cig/
372a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa ma yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis gang thob par gyurd pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur pa cig/ bdag
372b1('bum): tsaka khya tub sems dpa'i smad pa smod pa la yang 'di lta bu'i chos rnams mngon sum du ku rad cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa la yang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
372b2('bum): chen po ches 'phags la bkur sti byed pa 'di bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bkur ste byed par shoka shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags
372b3('bum): ji ltar chos ston pa bzhin du bdag cag kyang skye bo yang po la chas sten par ku rad cig/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu
372b4('bum): phyi nad pa dang thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yo ngas su rdzogs pa 'di bzhin du bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi// pha rold tu phyi nad pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhi pa
372b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par sho ka shig ces smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ shes rab
372b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa la mchod pa byas la/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags la yang bkur sti byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
372b7('bum): ches 'phags kyi rkang pa la mgo bos paka 'tshal nas/ zhes dang bcas pas thal mo sbya rad te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ko/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
372b8('bum): dpa' chen po ches 'phags la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di la bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa tshol zhing / 'brog
373a1('bum): dkon par phyin pa na/ skamos pa rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi dad pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes/ bad ka kaMs sgra de thos nas/ shar phyogs/
373a2('bum): ga la ba de logs su mchis nas/ 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis sgra de la ji srid cig tu mchi bar bgyi/ su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa nyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba ma dris so
373a3('bum): snyam ste/ des bdag yid kyi bde zhing shi na tu gdung bar kru rang nas/ sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te/ de ltar shin tu gdung bas zas la sems pa ni ma thung gi gzhan dun/
373a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyi nad pa 'ba' shi ka yid la bgyis te/ ji srid cig tu mchi bar bgyi ba dang / shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di su las mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur
373a5('bum): ba sgra de la ma dris so snyam pa dang / de nas bdaka/ ki mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs shig byung ste/ 'di skad ces gsung ngo // rigs kyi bu khyod 'di nas
373a6('bum): dpag tshad lnga brgyar song dang / gleng khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes
373a7('bum): gsung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de las bdag gis 'di mas nas/ ji ltar gdams pa bzhin du/ shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su zhugs te mchis pa dang / rgyang ring po
373a8('bum): zhig nas 'phags pa chos ston pa mabong ste/ mther ma la ka tu bdaka la bde ba 'di lta bu skyes pa ni dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan dang po la zhugs pa bzhin te/ bdag dga' ba dang /
373b1('bum): rab tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur pa nas/ sa phyogs de las ma bskyod par khyod las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos so// de nyan pa na ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo mang po skyes par
373b2('bum): gru rad to// bdag de na mchis pa ma/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rte nad kyi khams kyi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dbugs dbyung ba mdzad do// rigs kyi bu legs
373b3('bum): so legs so// khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa las skyes pa yin te/ 'di la gnas pas nged kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su
373b4('bum): rdzogs par byas so zhes de bzhin gshegs/ pa de dag gis bdag la shi nad tu legs par bstan nas myi snang bar gyur to// bdag kyang ting nge 'dzind de
373b5('bum): las langs nas 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhi na gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam mo// de nas yang
373b6('bum): bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa chos 'phags ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa shes
373b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang thabs la mkhas pa la shinang du bslabs pa lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byond pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud
373b8('bum): pa de bdag la ston par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa bdag zhu na// ci nas
374a1('bum): bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa 'tshal da cing / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / myi 'bral bar 'gyur bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
374a2('bum): byo nad pa dang / bzhud pa bdag la bshad du gsol// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ rtag tu ngu'i le'u ste/ bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o/
374a3('bum): de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad
374a4('bum): ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin ga shegs pa de dag ni gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du yangam bzhud de/ de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos so//
374a5('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu myi skye ba'i la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba myed de/ myi skye ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi
374a6('bum): bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba myed de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba myed de/ stong
374a7('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu ji lta ba bzhin la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba myed de/ ji lta ba bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi
374b1('bum): bu 'dod chags dang bral ba 'am 'ong ba'am 'gro ba myed de/ 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'gog pa la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba myed de/ 'gog
374b2('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu nam mkha' khams la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba myed de/ nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos
374b3('bum): de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa gud na myed de/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
374b4('bum): ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid ni gnyis su byar/ myed do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ 'di lta ste/ myed pa'i phyir gnyis sam/ gsum du bgrang ba
374b5('bum): las 'das pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dpe ra na/ myi nyi mas gdungs pas/ sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la nyi ma'i gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ smyig rgyu g.yo ba
374b6('bum): mthong nas/ der chu btung ngo zhes te/ de dang der rgyug na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems// mud gang nas 'ongs gang du song / chu de shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ lho phyogs kyi rgya mtshol
374b7('bum): nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho gang du song / rtag tu dus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu smyig rgyul chu ma mchis na/ 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba lha ga la mchis te/ rigs kyi mu m+bi
374b8('bum): mas gdungs shing/ byis pa'i rang bzhin can shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyis smyig rgyu mthong nas/ chu ma mchis pa la chur 'du shes bskyed kyi/ de la chu ni rang bzhin gyis ma mchis
375a1('bum): chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam/ sgrar mngon par zhen
375a2('bum): par byed pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am/ bzhud par rtog go// gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am/ bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa'i rang bzhin
375a3('bum): can shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can zhes brjod par bya ste/ dper na myi de chu myed pa la chur 'du shes skyed pa bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi skur myi
375a4('bum): blta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o// rigs kyi bu chos nyid ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba myed de/ rig sa kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byon
375a5('bum): pa 'am bzhud pa myed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma spruld pa'i glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta pa'i tshogs sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung
375a6('bum): gi tshogs la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba myed do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la yang byon pa 'am bzhud pa myed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu gnyid
375a7('bum): kyis log pa'i gyis ma ru/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig mthong ba'am/ gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lA 'am/ bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'am/ sum bcu 'am/ bzhi bcu
375a8('bum): 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ brgya 'am/ de las lhag pa zhig mthong ba las sad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems// de bzhin gan/
375b1('bum): pa de dag gang nas byon de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud rtag tu dus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rmi lam la chos gang yang grub pa mya gda'o// rmyi la ma ni brdzun te yang dag pa ma lag
375b2('bum): ches 'phags kyis smras pa de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pas rmi lam lta bu'o zhes gsungs so// rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos
375b3('bum): thams cad rmyi lam lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa myi shes pa de dag na mying mtshan kyi sku dang / gzugs kyi skur mngon par zhend par byed do// de ltar chos nyid
375b4('bum): myi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa da nga bzhud par rtog go// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la/ byin pa dang bzhud par 'dod pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo
375b5('bum): dag thams cad ni 'khor ba 'gro ba drug par song ba dang / dong ba dang / dong bar 'gyur ba'o// de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las rgyang ring du gyur
375b6('bum): pa'o// de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring du gyu rad pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu gang dag chos thams cad rmyi lam lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams
375b7('bum): cad kyil ma lta bu'o zhes yang dag pa ji sa pa bzhin du bstan pa shes pa de dag ma chos gang la yang 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par gyi rtog go// gang dag chos
375b8('bum): gang la yang 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par myi rtog pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes so// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab
376a1('bum): tu zhes pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang / bzhud par myi rtog go// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid 'di lta bur rab tu shes pa de dag ni bla na byed
376a2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar gru rad pa ste/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'o// des na bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni yul 'khor gyi bsod
376a3('bum): snyoms don yod par za ste/ de dang de dag ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che dag yod pa ni/ shar phyogs nas kyang
376a4('bum): ma 'ongs lho dang dub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtsham/ sa dang / steng dang 'og dang / phyogs bcu'i kang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ sems can dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la
376a5('bum): brten nasargya mtsho chen po'i ning nas rin po che dag 'byung ste/ de dag kyang rmya myed par 'byung ba ma yin kyi/ rgyu dang rkye nad dang / gzhi la ra ga las pa yin te/ brten
376a6('bum): nas 'byung ngo // rin po che de dag 'gag pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du yang myi 'pho mod kyi/ rkye nad de dag yod na rin po che de dag rab tu 'byed do// rkye nad de dag myed na
376a7('bum): rin po che de dag rab tu dbye ba yang myed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku mngon par grub pa yang gang nas kyang ma byon/ phyogs bcu 'i 'jig
376a8('bum): rtend gang du yang ma bzhud do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu myed pa yang ma yin te/ sngon gyi spyad pas yongs su grub pa yin pas/ rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa/
376b1('bum): sngon gyi 'phrin las rnam par sbyin pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no// de dag kyang rkyend rnams yod na/ sku mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag myed na sku mngon par 'grub pa yang myi sna
376b2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pi bang gi sgra 'byung ba yang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gag pa yang gang du yang myi 'gro/ gang du yang myi 'ong ste/ brten nas 'byung ba/ rgyu la rag las
376b3('bum): brkyend la rag las pa'o// 'di lta ste pi bang gi log pa la brten/ pags pa la brten/ rgyud la brten/ shing gul brten/ rgyud rtend la brten/ myi de las skyes pa'i rtsol
376b4('bum): ba la brten nas/ pa~M bang de las sgra 'byung ste/ de yang pi bang gi khog pa las ma byung / pags pa las ma byung / rgyud las ma byung / shing bu las ma byung /
376b5('bum): rgyud rten las ma byung / mya de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las sgra ma byung mod kyi/ de dag thams cad 'dus pa las sgrar grag la/ sgra de 'gags pa yang gang du yang
376b6('bum): myi 'gro ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa yang rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyend la rag las pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba du mas yongs su
376b7('bum): grub pa yin te/ rgyu gcig gis ma yin/ rkye nad gcig gis ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/ chu myed pa yang ma yin no// rgyu dang rkyen
376b8('bum): mang po tshogs pa las byung ba yin te/ de ni gang nas kyang ma byon no// rgyu dang rkye nang tshogs pa myed kyang gang du yang myi bzhud de/ rigs kyi bu khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa
377a1('bum): dang bzhud pa de ltar blta'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis de bzhin du khong du chud par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang tshun chad de ltar de bzhin
377a2('bum): gshegs pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed par shes pa de tshun chad khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges shing / shes rab kyi pha rol
377a3('bum): tu phyi nad pa dang thabs la mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang / bzhud pa myed pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sa g.yo ba chen po g.yos par
377a4('bum): gyurd te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte/ nad gyi khams 'di dag thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa 'di lta ste/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu
377a5('bum): g.yos 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul te/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang dkrogs shing / swa bkong bar gyur da to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
377a6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams na rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / nags tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba de logs su
377a7('bum): rab tu btud par gyur to// dus ma yin pa'i me tog kyang steng gi bar snang las 'thor zhing / me tog gi char dag kyang bab bo// lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi
377a8('bum): dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang lha'i me tog dag gis gtor/ mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'bor zhing / tshig 'dzi
377b1('bum): skad ces rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus dang / bdag cag gis kyang don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam/ 'jig rten thams cad dang myi 'thun pa gang 'jig tshogs la gnas pa thams cad kyi
377b2('bum): sa ma yin pa bstan pa mos so zhes 'dzedad to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di
377b3('bum): skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bus g.yos pa chen po 'byung ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/ chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
377b4('bum): ma byon myi bzhud pa 'di khyod kyis dris te/ khe bos pa stan pas/ srog chags brgyad stong myi skye ba'i chos la ba zod pa thob par gyurd pa dang / khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu
377b5('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu se mas skyes pa dang / srog chags drug khra bzhi stong chos rnam sa la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing / dri ma dang bral ba rnam
377b6('bum): par dag par gyurd pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur da te/ bdag
377b7('bum): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzhud pa myed pa bstand pa 'di dris pas/ sems cad ji snyed kyi don byas par gyur da pa ni/ bdag
377b8('bum): gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// 'di nyid kyis bdag bla ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par bya ba'i/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
378a1('bum): chub la phyir the tsom myi bya'o// bdag ni the tsom myed par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / de dga' ba dang rangs
378a2('bum): pa de dang ldan pas/ ta la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ ta la bdun tsam na 'dug ste/ bdag nam mkha' la 'dug 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
378a3('bum): 'phags la bkur sti bya'o snyam du sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du/ mngon par 'phags pa mthong nas/ de'i ses
378a4('bum): sems kyis shes nas/ de la lha'i me tog man dar ba dag byin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu me tog 'di dag gi/ sa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
378a5('bum): 'phags la bkur sti gyis shig/ 'di ni khyod yongs/ su gzung ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus/ srog chags stong phrag mang po'i don byas te/ rigs kyi bu
378a6('bum): gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir/ ji ltar khyod spro bar byed pa de lta bur/ bskal pa grangs myed dpag tu myed par spro bar byed pa'i/ sems can de dag ni rnyed par dka'o zhes smras so//
378a7('bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor/
378a8('bum): mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor de nas/ bdag gi lus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bkab ste/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so//
378b1('bum): rigs kyi bu dang slan cad khyod kyi rim gro dang / zham 'bring bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag gi lus khyod la 'bul lo// des bdag gi lus phul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
378b2('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi mdun tu thal mo sbyar te 'dug go// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang / 'khor lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
378b3('bum): tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu ba dag cag kyang khyod la lus 'bul gyis/ bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ chos de dag thob par gyu rad cig/ khyod nyid
378b4('bum): dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub/ sems dpa' rnams la bkur stir bgyis pa dang / de ngag dang nye bar gyurd par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub
378b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus tshed da bon gyi bu mo la stsogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgyal 'di skad sa smras so// bu mo dag khyed cag kho bo la lhag pa
378b6('bum): bsam pas gnas par byed na/ kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig dang / bu mo khyed kho bos blang ngo po// bu mo de dag gis smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i sa
378b7('bum): bathag pa nas/ khyed kyi rjes su 'thun par 'jug go/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa ci 'dod pa bya bar bdag nyid 'bul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtaH
378b8('bum): tu dus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ shing rta lnga brgya yang brgyan nas/ thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
379a1('bum): chos 'phags la phul te/ rigs kyi bu bdag ni 'khor 'di dag dang shing rta lnga brgya 'di dag kyang yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir khyod la dbul lo// de nas
379a2('bum): lha'i dbang po brgya byin kyis/ rigs kyi bu de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis
379a3('bum): bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o// yongs su gtong ba'i sems de lta bus/ myu rang tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
379a4('bum): de ltar na chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas nas// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa dang / thabs la mkhas dpa nyan nus te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
379a5('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
379a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa yongs su dris so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
379a7('bum): chen po chos 'phags kyis tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsab
379a8('bum): yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te/ blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu de nyid la byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags stan las langs te/
379b1('bum): bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang / nyi ma nub par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di snyam du sems te/ de la bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs
379b2('bum): la 'dug pa'am/ nyal ba byed pa ni bdag gi myi cha la/ 'di ni ma lags kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di lta ste/ chos ston tu phyir ma byung gi
379b3('bum): bar du bdag 'greng ba dang / 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du
379b4('bum): ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur da cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag dang / thabs la mkhas pa las
379b5('bum): byung ba la gnas par gyur da te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du yang / lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung / gnod sems kyi rtog
379b6('bum): pa ma byung / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma byung / ro la brkam pa ma skyes te/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags nam ldang bar 'gyur/ bdag cag kyang
379b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos 'phags chos kyi khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas/ stond par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri bsham na/ bdag gis sa phyogs 'di chag
379b8('bum): chag legs par gdab pa dang / legs par thugs la/ me tog sna tshogs gtor te/ sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol
380a1('bum): tu phyind pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa/ rab tu stond par 'gyur ba der/ legs par byug par bya'o snyam mo// tshong dpon gyi bu mo la stsogs pa bu mo lnga brkya
380a2('bum): dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob cing / spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'das par byed de/ bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go//
380a3('bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i sgra thos te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhag bdun na/ ting nge 'dzin
380a4('bum): 'di las ldang ste/ langs nas grong khyer gyi dbu sa su 'dug ste/ chos stond par 'gyur ro zhes grag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
380a5('bum): tu dus lha'i sgra de thos pa dang / dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu mgu zhing ga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo
380a6('bum): la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang / sa phyogs de phyags nas/ chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa bshams so// de nas bu mo de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos phud de/
380a7('bum): stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas/ chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
380a8('bum): rtag tu dus/ sa phyogs de chag chag btab par 'dod sa/ bdud sdig can gyis/ chu thams cad kyi snang bar byas nas/ ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
380b1('bum): rtag tu du chu ma rnyed nas/ yid myi dga' zhing / sems sdug bsngal te/ sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur pa dang / mchod pa de yang mya mdzes par
380b2('bum): bya ba'i phyir/ chu de dag myi snang bar byas nas/ kund tu chu btsal na chu ma rnyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
380b3('bum): gi lus phug la khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di ni rdul che ste/ rdul gyi khams 'di nas byung bas/ byang chub
380b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na myi rung na/ bdag gi lus gdon myi za bar 'jig pa 'dis ci zhig byas/ bdag ga lus
380b5('bum): 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni bla'i/ nus pa myed pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir dang / 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khor ba dag na/ bdag gi lus brgya stong mang po de
380b6('bum): lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni carare yang ma rung ngo snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus mtshon rnon po blangs te/ bdag gi lus la kun tu phug nas
380b7('bum): rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu chag chag btab bo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la stsogs pa bu
380b8('bum): mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad kyis kyang / mtshon non po blangs te/ rang rang gi lus phug nas/ rang rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de chag chag btab ste/ gang de dag la bdud sdig can
381a1('bum): gyis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad bya ba'i grags rnyed par myi 'gyur bar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / bu mo de dag sems gzhan du
381a2('bum): gyu rad pa myed do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du/ 'di ltar chos 'dod pa dang / 'di ltar yaM dam la
381a3('bum): brtan pa dang / 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang / srog dang / longs spyod rnams la myi blta ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i
381a4('bum): phyir/ 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu myed pa la/ sems
381a5('bum): can thard par bya'o snyam lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa ni ngo mtsha rad to// snyam du sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ khrag de dag thos
381a6('bum): cad lnga'i tsan dan gyi chung byin gyis brlabs te/ lha'i tsan dan gyi chu de'i dri dam pa rgya che ba/ bsam gyis myi khyab pas/ sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad brgya tshang bar
381a7('bum): dris khyab bo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la/ 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu legs so leg so//
381a8('bum): khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis myi khyab bo// khyod kyi chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba bla na myed do// rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
381b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang / brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
381b2('bum): chub yang dag par bsgrubs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
381b3('bum): chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan ni bteng / sa phyogs 'di phyag dar ni byas/ chag chag ni btab da / bdag gis me tog gang dag gis/ sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub
381b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad pa la gtor bar bya ba'i me tog de dag gang nas/ rnyed par 'gyur snyam sems so// de nas lba
381b5('bum): dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu lha'i me tog man dar ba 'di dka lo la
381b6('bum): khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tu/ me tog bkram pa kyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos stond cing / seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa la yang gtor cig ces
381b7('bum): des de la/ lha'i me tog 'al stong byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus me tog de dag blangs te/ me tog kha cig gis ni sa phyogs der ma
381b8('bum): tog bkram pa byas so// me tog kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos 'phags la gtor da to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
382a1('bum): po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang / ting nge 'dzind de las langs te/ chos kyi stan gang na yod pa der 'ongs nas/ stan bting ba la 'dug ste/ 'khor 'bum phrag du
382a2('bum): mas yongs su bskor cing / mdun gyis bltas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa stond to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus/ byang chub
382a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde
382a4('bum): ba de lta bu thob bo// de nas byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags/ shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa stond pa ni 'di lta ste/
382a5('bum): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
382a6('bum): tu phyi med pa dben pa nyid do// chos thams cad g.yo ba myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa g.yo ba myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad rlom sems myed pa nyid
382a7('bum): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rlom sems myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad khengs pa myed pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa khengs pa myed pa nyid do//
382a8('bum): chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ro gcig pa nyid do// chos thams cad mu myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
382b1('bum): su med pa nyid do// chos thams cad skye ba myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa skye ba myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad 'gag pa myed pa nyid pas
382b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa 'gag pa myed pa nyid do// nam mkha' mu myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mu myed pa nyid do// rgya mtsho mu myed pa nyid pas
382b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mu myed pa nyid do// ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sna tshogs pa nyid do// nam mkha' rtog pa myed
382b4('bum): pa nyid pasashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa myed pa nyid do// gzugs mu myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mu myed
382b5('bum): pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
382b6('bum): pa su myed pa nyid do// sa'i khams su myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa su myed pa nyid do// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / rtse'i khams da /
382b7('bum): rlung gi khams su med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su med pa nyid do// nam mkha'i khams su myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa mu myed pa
382b8('bum): nyid do// rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas/ shes rab
383a1('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa ma 'dres pa nyid do// chos thams cad dmyigs su myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dmyigs su myed pa nyid do//
383a2('bum): chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad byed pa myed pas/ shes
383a3('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa byed pa myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad bsam gyis myi khyab pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa nyid du rig par
383a4('bum): bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de ltar 'dug bzhin du/ de// 'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge
383a5('bum): 'dzin thob par gyurd to// chos thams cad dben ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang
383a6('bum): chos thams cad rlom sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad khengs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting
383a7('bum): nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mu myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad skye ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa myed pa zhes
383a8('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / nam mkha' mu myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rgya mtsho mu myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / r-i rab sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
383b1('bum): dang / nam mkha' rtog pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / gzugs mu myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
383b2('bum): par shes pa mu myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mu myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams su myed pa zhes bya
383b3('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / nam mkha'i khams mu myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
383b4('bum): dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmyigs su myed pa/ zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
383b5('bum): dang / chos thams cad byed pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzind dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis myi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du thob par gyur pa te
383b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de dag la stsogs pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob par gyur to// / shes rab kyi pha
383b7('bum): rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ chos 'phags kyi le'u ste/ bdun nu rtsa lnga pa'o//
